The scream of a woman reached our ears from far away.
这种植物的叶子尖溜溜的，很容易刺伤手。

The leaves of this plants are pointed, so we are easily hurt by them.

It is saves time and energy to split wood with a wedge.

她新买的皮鞋是尖头的，款式很新颖。

She bought a new type of leather shoes with pointed ends.

还是你了解他，这些话都说到他心尖上了。

It is you who really know him; you have said exactly what he wants to say.

Tā bǎ tā de qiānbǐ jiān nòng duàn le。
他把他的铅笔尖弄断了。
He stuck the point of the knife into a tree.
Tā bǎ dāo jiāncì jìn yì kē shù zhōng。
他把刀尖刺进一棵树中。
How sharper than a serpent\'s tooth it is to have a thankless child!
Yǎngyù yí gè wàng\'ēnfùyì de háizi，yóurú yǎngle dúshé de jiānyá。
养育一个忘恩负义的孩子，犹如养了毒蛇的尖牙。
The church steeple provided a convenient landmark.
Jiàotáng de jiāntǎ tígōngle yí gè fāngbiàn de dìbiāo。
教堂的尖塔提供了一个方便的地标。
Seeing himself trapped, he cried out direfully.
Kàndào zìjǐ bèi zhuā，tā jiānjiào qǐlái。
看到自己被抓，他尖叫起来。
The second baseman sharpened his spikes before every game.
Nàgè èrlěi shǒulěiyuán měi chǎng bǐsài qián dōuyào mójiān tā de xiédīng。
那个二垒守垒员每场比赛前都要磨尖他的鞋钉。
Her sharp questions punctuated the speaker\'s drone.
Tā jiānruì de tíwèn dǎduànle Zhòngyìzhǎng chénmèn de fāyán。
她尖锐的提问打断了众议长沉闷的发言。
My pencils are all pointless.
Wǒ de qiānbǐ dōu shì méiyǒu jiāntóu de。
我的铅笔都是没有尖头的。
Her foot pointed artfully toward tapering toes.
Tā de jiǎo qiǎomiào de shēn xiàng le qiánduān jiān xì de xiézǐ lǐ。
她的脚巧妙地伸向了前端尖细的鞋子里。
He clutched a jag of the rock.
Tā zhuāzhù shítou de jiānduān。
他抓住石头的尖端。
He complained sourly that the new rules only benefitted the managers.
Tā jiānkè de bàoyuàn shuō xīn guīdìng zhǐ duì guǎnlǐ rényuán yǒu hǎochù。
他尖刻地抱怨说新规定只对管理人员有好处。
The screaming redoubled.
Jiānjiàoshēng yílànggāoguòyílàng。
尖叫声一浪高过一浪。
She was being sharply questioned.
Tā zhèng shòudào jiānruì de zhìwèn。
她正受到尖锐的质问。
She screamed blue murder.
Tā de jiānjiào shēngsīlìjié。
她的尖叫声嘶力竭。
She screamed hysterically when she heard the news.
Tā tīngdào nàgè xiāoxi hòu xiēsīdǐlǐ de jiānjiào qǐlái。
她听到那个消息后歇斯底里地尖叫起来。
Beyond his preternatural affability there is some acid and some steel.
Zài tā yìcháng hé\'ǎi-kěqīn de biǎoqíng zhī xià，yǒuzhe jiānkè de xìnggé hé gāngtiěbān jiānyì de yìzhì。
在他异常和蔼可亲的表情之下，有着尖刻的性格和钢铁般坚毅的意志。
The boys bobbed down the hill screaming with pleasure.
Zhèxiē xiǎonánhái chéngzuò dàxuěqiāo、xīngfèn de jiānjiàozhe huáxià shānpō。
这些小男孩乘坐大雪橇、兴奋地尖叫着滑下山坡。
He wrote pungently about his contemporaries.
Tā tōngguò xiě wénzhāng jiānruì de pīpànle tā tóng shídài de rén。
他通过写文章尖锐地批判了他同时代的人。
He made displeasingly cutting remarks about his friends.
Tā duì tā de péngyou jìnxíngle jiānsuānkèbó de pīpíng。
他对他的朋友进行了尖酸刻薄的批评。
He was incisively critical.
Tā shòudàole jiānruì de pīpíng。
他受到了尖锐的批评。
The saltiness of their language was inappropriate.
Tāmen yǔyán de jiānruì pōlà shì bú qiàdàng de。
他们语言的尖锐泼辣是不恰当的。
The pointedness of his sarcasm was unmistakable.
Tā jiānruì de fěngcì zhī yì shì hěn míngxiǎn de。
他尖锐的讽刺之意是很明显的。
The toe box may be rounded or pointed.
Xié de tàotóu kěyǐ shì yuán de huò jiān de。
鞋的套头可以是圆的或尖的。
Her pinched toes in her pointed shoes were killing her.
Gūsuō zài jiāntóuxié lǐ de jiǎozhǐ shǐ tā tòngkǔ wànfēn。
箍缩在尖头鞋里的脚趾使她痛苦万分。
Her screaming attracted the neighbors.
Tā de jiānjiào shēng yǐnqǐle línjū de zhùyì。
她的尖叫声引起了邻居的注意。
His scathing remarks about silly lady novelists.
Tā guānyú yúchǔn de nǚ xiǎoshuōjiā de jiānkè pínglùn。
他关于愚蠢的女小说家的尖刻评论。
The visor was acutely peaked.
Zhège màoyán fēicháng jiān。
这个帽檐非常尖。
Her shoes had acutely pointed toes.
Tā de xiézǐ qiánduān fēicháng jiānr。
她的鞋子前端非常尖儿。
Her acrid remarks make her many enemies.
Jiānkè de pínglùn shǐ tā sìchù shùdí。
尖刻的评论使她四处树敌。
AIG was America\'s leading insurance company.
Měiguó Guójìjítuán (AIG) shì Měiguó dǐngjiān de Bǎoxiǎngōngsī。
美国国际集团(AIG)是美国顶尖的保险公司。
飞机尖啸着飞过顶空。
Fēijī jiānxiào zhe fēiguò dǐngkōng。
A plane whizzed overhead.

一个顶尖的法国报纸专栏作家表扬了这场表演。
In music, the world\'s top artists are most often with the world\'s top record companies.
Zài yīnyuèjiè，shìjiè shàng dǐngjiān de yìshùjiā dàbùfèn zài shìjiè shàng zuìhǎo de chàngpiàn gōngsī。
在音乐界，世界上顶尖的艺术家大部分在世界上最好的唱片公司。
It cannot be questioned that most of the leading scholars were included among them.
Háowú yíwèn ，tāmen zhōng jué dà duō shù shì dǐngjiān xuézhě。
毫无疑问，他们中绝大多数是顶尖学者。

美国国际集团(AIG)是美国顶尖的保险公司。
The top of church broke off a long time ago.
Hěnjiǔyǐqián，jiàotáng de jiāndǐng tāxiàlái le。
很久以前，教堂的尖顶塌下来了。
A short spire crowns the central tower of the church.
Yí gè duǎn jiān dǐng lì zài jiàotáng de zhōngxīn tǎshàng。
一个短尖顶立在教堂的中心塔上。
Apical initials are the initial cells in the root or shoot apical meristem.
顶端原始细胞是跟或茎尖分生组织中的原始细胞。
No sharp edges anywhere on the tip so it will not scratch up your screen.
Dǐngduān rènhé yí chù dōu méiyǒu fēnglì de jiān，suǒyǐ tā búhuì guāhuài nǐ de píngmù de。
顶端任何一处都没有锋利的尖，所以它不会刮坏你的屏幕的。
棉花打尖
走了好几个钟头，该打尖了
Her voice was shrill with urgency and rioted in the dark.
Tā de shēngyīn yīn jípò ér yìcháng jiānruì，dǎpòle hēi\'àn。
她的声音因急迫而异常尖锐，打破了黑暗。

Tā jiānruì de tíwèn dǎduànle Zhòngyìzhǎng chénmèn de fāyán。

In addition, Conran\'s company had by now developed some advanced management systems of its own.

He called the dog with a sharp click of his tongue.

钢笔尖儿戳了。

gāngbǐjiān 
the point of a pen
铅笔尖
qiānbǐjiān 
the tip of a pencil

This nib\'s broken—it can\'t be used.

bǐjiān
pen tip

Tā bǎ tā de qiānbǐ jiān nòng duàn le。

xiàng zuǒ qīng
incline to the left

The cameraman signaled me to tilt my head a little to the right.
左倾
左倾盲动。
左倾路线。
to slope to the right/left
向右/左倾斜
The pole tilts to the left.
柱子向左倾斜。

向右/左倾斜

把全部心血倾注到工作中去
bǎ quánbùxīnxuè qīngzhù dào gōngzuò zhōng qù
throw all one\'s energy into one\'s work
她把全部的爱倾注在独生子身上。
Tā bǎ quánbù de ài qīngzhù zài dúshēngzǐ shēnshàng。
She poured all her affection on her only son.
父母对儿女倾注几多希望。
Fùmǔ duì érnǚ qīngzhù jǐ duō xīwàng。
Parents put a lot of hopes on their children.

The mountain torrents poured into the river.
他把自己的精力都倾注在事业上。
Tā bǎ zìjǐ de jīnglì dōu qīngzhù zài shìyè shàng.
He threw all his energy into the undertaking.
要注意一种倾向有可能掩盖另一种倾向。
Yào zhùyì yìzhǒng qīng xiàng yǒu kěnéng yǎngài lìng yìzhǒng qīng xiàng。
One must be alive to the possibility that one tendency may conceal another.

在这片土地上倾注了他全部的心力
对孩子他不知倾注了多少心血。

哥哥死了，他把所有的悲痛都倾注在了日记里。
I have taken the greatest pains to put every entry onto this website.
Wèile bǎ měi yí gè shítǐ fàngzài zhège wǎngzhàn shàng wǒ qīngzhùle quánbù xīnxuè。
为了把每一个实体放在这个网站上我倾注了全部心血。
He sat with his head cocked, as if listening for far-off sounds.

他坐着，脑袋偏向一边，好像在注意倾听远方的声音。

倾心交谈
qīngxīn jiāotán 
have a heart-to-heart talk
她倾心于那个戴眼镜的老师。
Tā qīngxīn yú nàgè dài yǎnjìng de lǎoshī.
She likes that teacher with the glasses.
老师和学生在倾心交谈。
Lǎoshī hé xuésheng zài qīngxīn jiāotán.
The teacher is having a heart-to-heart talk with his student.
现在想找个人倾诉心曲可真不容易。
Xiànzài xiǎng zhǎo gè rén qīngsù xīnqǔ kě zhēn bùróngyì。
It is so hard to find someone to pour out your secret concerns to.
倾吐心中的苦水
qīngtǔ xīnzhōng de kǔshuǐ
pour out one\'s pain
离心倾向
líxīn qīnɡxiànɡ 
a centrifugal tendency
把全部心血倾注到工作中去
bǎ quánbùxīnxuè qīngzhù dào gōngzuò zhōng qù
throw all one\'s energy into one\'s work
他向她倾诉埋藏在心底的感情。
Tā xiàng tā qīngsù máicáng zài xīndǐ de gǎnqíng。
He revealed his innermost feelings to her.
他一腔心血都倾洒在这部词典里。
Tā yì qiāng xīnxuè dōu qīngsǎ zài zhèbù cídiǎn lǐ。
In carrying out this dictionary project he spat out, so to speak, the blood of his heart.
我愿意敞开自己的心扉，向你倾诉一切。
Wǒ yuànyì chǎngkāi zìjǐ de xīnfēi，xiàng nǐ qīngsù yíqiè。
I wish to open my heart and tell you everything.
郁积在他心中的委屈，终于倾诉出来了。
Yùjī zài tā xīnzhōng de wěiqu，zhōngyú qīngsù chūlái le。
He finally poured out all the grievances that he\'d kept repressed.
他那非凡的才华令人倾心。
倾心长谈。
倾心著作。
倾诉心气。
倾诉心中的痛苦。
倾吐心声
互相倾吐心肠。
对孩子他不知倾注了多少心血。
在这片土地上倾注了他全部的心力
She was more content in death than she had ever been in life.
Tā yìshēngzhōng cóngwèi rúcǐ qīngxīn yú sǐ。
她一生中从未如此倾心于死。
The young couple clicked with each other.
Zhè duì niánqīng fūfù dōu duì duìfāng yíjiànqīngxīn。
这对年轻夫妇都对对方一见倾心。
We have to bear with his attitude if we are going to finish this job.
Rúguǒ wǒmen xiǎng wánchéng zhè fèn gōngzuò，wǒmen bìxū nàixīn qīngtīng tā de yìjiàn。
如果我们想完成这份工作，我们必须耐心倾听他的意见。
She would have taken a very different career path had she not listened to her inner voice.
Qīngtīng tā nèixīn yìyuàn zhīhòu，tā juédìng jìnrù yìtiáo hěn bùtóng de zhíyè dàolù。
倾听她内心意愿之后，她决定进入一条很不同的职业道路。
I have taken the greatest pains to put every entry onto this website.
Wèile bǎ měi yí gè shítǐ fàngzài zhège wǎngzhàn shàng wǒ qīngzhùle quánbù xīnxuè。
为了把每一个实体放在这个网站上我倾注了全部心血。
I can\'t keep this secret anymore and I just need to get it off my chest.
Wǒ bùnéng zài bǎoshǒu zhège mìmì le，wǒ xūyào bǎ wǒ Xīnli de fánnǎo qīngtǔ chūlái。
我不能再保守这个秘密了，我需要把我心里的烦恼倾吐出来。

倾销货物
qīngxiāo huòwù
dump goods
现在只能压库倾销了，不然赔得更多。
Xiànzài zhǐnéng yākù qīngxiāo le，bùrán péi de gèngduō。
The only way now is to sell the products piled up in stock, or we will lose even more money.
制定反倾销措施

这两种方案我倾向于第一种。
Zhè liǎngzhǒng fāng\'àn wǒ qīng xiàng yú dìyī zhǒng。
Of the two plans, I prefer the first.
观众们倾向于同情比赛中的弱者。

这两种观点我倾向于前者。

I incline to the first of these two views.

in preference to sth
更倾向于某事

人们在不熟悉的环境倾向于结成群体。

我倾向于凯特的周日去野餐的建议。

我在艺术方面喜爱创新，但是文化方面倾向于保守。

顾客总是倾向于买质量可靠的产品。

很多年轻人都倾向于频繁跳槽来改善现有状况。
She has a tendency to follow the person with the highest rank.

民主党倾向于自由思想。

离心倾向

这个组织的宗旨是满足穷人及无家可归者的需要。
I wish I had some bread to give the poor.
Wǒ xīwàng wǒ yǒu yìxiē miànbāo kěyǐ fāgěi qióngrén men。
我希望我有一些面包可以发给穷人们。
As far as I am aware there is nothing preventing the government from helping the poor.

据我所知，政府救济穷人并没有受到什么阻碍。
The poor will never cease out of the land.
Qióngrénmen yǒng búhuì mièjué。
穷人们永不会灭绝。
He believes the poor have been cheated of their rights.
Tā xiāngxìn nàxiē qióngrén bèi bōduóle tāmen de quánlì。
他相信那些穷人被剥夺了他们的权利。
There\'s been a lot of publicity given, from time to time , to the poor and the disadvantaged.

时不时地会有大量关于穷人及弱势群体的宣传报道见诸媒体。
He went on living among the poor，about whom he was to write his book.
Tā jìxù shēnghuó zài qióngrénmen dāngzhōng，zhuóshǒu xiě yì běn yǒuguān tāmen shēnghuó de shū。

He used to minister to the poor.
Tā guòqù céng bāngzhù qióngrén。

他短暂的首相任期没有给穷人带来真正的好处。

He gave out money to the poor.
Tā bǎ qián fēnfā gěi qióngrén。
他把钱分发给穷人。
It is wrong for the rich to take advantage of the poor.
Fùrén qīfu qióngrén shì bú dàodé de。
富人欺负穷人是不道德的。
She ascended from a life of poverty to one of great.
Tā cóng yí gè qióngrén hùnchéngle yí gè hěn liǎobùqǐ de rénwù。
她从一个穷人混成了一个很了不起的人物。

一副穷凶极恶的样子
yí fù qióngxiōngjí\'è de yàngzi
with the look of a fiendish brute
他理屈词穷，只好求助于诡辩。
Tā lǐqūcíqióng，zhǐhǎo qiúzhù yú guǐbiàn。
As he had a weak case and could not defend himself, he had to resort to sophistry.
趣味无穷
qùwèi wúqióng
be of infinite interest; afford the greatest delight; be fascinating
她不愿受穷。
Tā bú yuàn shòuqióng。
She doesn\'t like being poor.
无穷的烦恼和忧虑
wúqióng de fánnǎo hé yōulǜ 
endless troubles and worries
循环往复，以至无穷
xúnhuán wǎngfù，yǐ zhì wúqióng
repeat itself in endless cycles
改变我国“一穷二白”的面貌
gǎibiàn wǒguó“yìqióngèrbái”de miànmào
lift our country from the state of &quot;poverty and blankness&quot;
这首诗意味无穷。
Zhèshǒushī yìwèi wúqióng。
This is a poem of unlimited interest.
无穷的忧虑
wúqióng de yōulǜ 
endless worries
余味无穷
yúwèi wúqióng
leave a lasting and pleasant impression or aftertaste
招致无穷后患
zhāozhì wúqiónghòuhuàn 
lead to endless trouble
追穷根
zhuī qiónɡɡēn 
trace the root cause of one\'s poverty
穷困潦倒，走投无路
qióngkùn liáodǎo，zǒutóuwúlù 
be down-and-out and have no place to turn
穷兵黩武
qióngbīngdúwǔ
use all one\'s armed might to wage wars of aggression; wantonly engage in military ventures
技穷
jìqióng
exhaust one\'s whole bag of tricks; come to the end of one\'s rope
穷奢极欲
qióngshējíyù
(indulge in) luxury and extravagance; (live a life of) wanton extravagance
图穷匕首见
tú qióng bǐshǒu jiàn
when the map was unrolled, the dagger was revealed—hidden intentions are revealed in the end
“上穷碧落下黄泉，两处茫茫皆不见。”
“Shàngqióng bìluò xiàhuángquán，liǎngchù mángmáng jiēbújiàn。”
He searched heaven and hell, but failed to find her.
“接天莲叶无穷碧，映日荷花别样红”。
“Jiētiān liányè wúqióngbì，yìngrì héhuā biéyànghóng”。
The green lotus leaves stretch to the horizon, and the lotus looks extremely bright under the sunshine.
他根本没有必要这样藏富装穷。
Tā gēnběn méiyǒu bìyào zhèyàng cángfù zhuāngqióng。
There is no need for him to pretend to be poor.
那时候，我家穷得连个草刺儿也没有。
Nà shíhou，wǒjiā qióng de lián gè cǎocìr yě méiyǒu。
At that time, we were so poor that we didn\'t have anything valuable.
他词穷理屈，一句话也说不出来。
Tā cíqióng lǐqū，yíjù huà yě shuō bùchūlái。
He was condemned by his own words, and had nothing to say.
他穷途得济，算是幸运的了。
Tā qióngtú déjì，suàn shì xìngyùn de le。
He is lucky to have financial help in such poor conditions.
那些乱坟堆，都是解放前穷人的墓地。
Nàxiē luànfénduī，dōushì jiěfàng qián qióngrén de mùdì。
Those mounds were the tombs of poor people before 1945.
上个世纪20年代，奶奶以缝穷为“职业”。
Shàng gè shìjì èrshí niándài，nǎinai yǐ féngqióng wéi“zhíyè”。
My grandmother sewed and mended clothes for a pittance in order to make a living in the 1920s.
过惯了穷日子，突然有钱反而受不了了。
Guòguàn le qióng rìzi，tūrán yǒu qián fǎnér shòubuliǎo le。
Being accustomed to being poor, people can not easily adapt to a wealthy life in a short period of time.
他不愿回到荒寂的家乡，因为那里实在是太穷了。
Tā búyuàn huídào huāngjì de jiāxiāng，yīnwèi nàlǐ shízai shì tài qióng le。
He was unwilling to return to his desolate and bleak hometown because it was too poor.
美好的事物总使人回味无穷。
Měihǎo de shìwù zǒng shǐ rén huíwèi wúqióng。
Niceness always leaves endless aftertaste in people.
以车会友，其乐无穷！
Yǐ chē huì yǒu，qílè wúqióng！
It\'s extremely interesting to make friends through an interest in cars!
面对敌人的进攻，将军已计穷智短，无能为力。
Miànduì dírén de jìngōng，jiāngjūn yǐ jìqióng zhìduǎn，wúnéng wéilì。
The general had exhausted all his means and could do nothing to hold back the enemy\'s attack.
明朝季世，农民起义层出不穷。
Míngcháo jìshì，nóngmín qǐyì céngchūbùqióng。
At the end of the Ming Dynasty, peasant revolts broke out again and again.
这个读书人真是穷得可怜，冬天只穿着件夹衣。
Zhège dúshūrén zhēnshì qióng de kělián，dōngtiān zhǐ chuān zhe jiàn jiá yī。
The student is so poor that he only wears one lined garment in the cold winter.
这位蒙古族跤手力大无穷。
Zhèwèi ménggǔzú jiāoshǒu lìdà wúqióng。
The Mongolian wrestler is a brawny man.
禅学是穷理尽性之学，可以使人明智。
Chánxué shì qiónglǐ jìnxìng zhī xué，kěyǐ shǐ rén míngzhì。
Buddhism can fully develop one\'s nature and make one wise.
富人与穷人在生活质量上的差异可谓是九天九地。
Fùrén yǔ qióngrén zài shēnghuó zhìliàng shàng de chāyì kěwèi shì jiǔtiān jiǔdì。
The rich and poor live drastically different lives in terms of quality.
对于贫困地区最好的救穷法不是输血而是造血。
Duìyú pínkùn dìqū zuìhǎo de jiùqióngfǎ búshì shūxiě ér shì zàoxiě。
The best way to relieve a poor area is not to give transfusions, but to help them produce blood.
江姐曾经在华蓥山带领穷苦百姓抗粮抗丁。
Jiāngjiě céngjīng zài Huáyíng Shān dàilǐng qióngkǔ bǎixìng kàngliáng kàngdīng。
Miss Jiang used to lead the poor common people in resisting the grain levy and compulsory conscription.
古代，穷苦百姓抗捐多是因为被逼无奈。
Gǔdài，qióngkǔ bǎixìng kàngjuān duōshì yīnwèi bèibī wúnài。
In ancient times, poor common people fought against unreasonable levies because they had no other choice.
国家对于老少边穷地区进行政策扶持是十分必要的。
Guójiā duìyú lǎoshǎobiānqióng dìqū jìnxíng zhèngcè fúchí shì shífēn bìyào de。
It is very necessary for the country to support old liberation areas, minority areas, frontier areas, and poverty stricken areas through favorable policies.
封建礼教对人的毒害不只是当时当地，对后代也贻害无穷。
Fēngjiàn lǐjiào duì rén de dúhài bùzhǐshì dāngshí dāngdì，duì hòudài yě yíhài wúqióng。
Feudal ethical codes did not poison people of that time, but also brought endless harm to generations to come.
他家很穷，总用麻经儿当裤腰带。
Tā jiā hěnqióng，zǒng yòng májīngr dāng kùyāodài。
He is very poor, and always uses flaxen rope as a waistband.
奶奶出嫁时家里太穷，根本没什么陪奁。
Nǎinai chūjià shí jiā lǐ tài qióng，gēnběn méi shénme péilián。
My grandma\'s family was poor at the time she got married, so she had only a small dowry.
他因家境贫穷而不得不弃学回家。
Tā yīn jiājìng pínqióng ér bùdébùqìxué huíjiā。
He cannot help dropping out of school, because his family is poor.
他宁愿饿着肚子也不出来要饭，真是个穷棒子。
Tā nìngyuàn è zhe dùzi yě bùchūlái yàofàn，zhēnshì gè qióngbàngzi。
He prefers to be hungry rather than beg for food, he is really a poor person with high aspirations.
看着他穷愁的样子，我心酸极了。
Kàn zhe tā qióngchóu de yàngzi，wǒ xīnsuān jí le。
I was extremely sad when I saw him poverty-stricken and full of worries.
不要等到国力穷乏的时候才知道节俭！
Búyào děngdào guólì qióngfá de shíhou cái zhīdào jiéjiǎn！
Don\'t wait until our country is impoverished before we realize the importance of thrift.
你的穷根就是没有志气。
Nǐ de qiónggēn jiùshì méiyǒu zhìqì。
The root of your poverty is a lack of aspirations.
这孩子好奇心重，一个事总是穷根究底地问。
Zhè háizi hàoqíxīn zhòng，yígè shì zǒngshì qiónggēn jiūdǐ de wèn。
The kid is full of curiosity and likes to get to the bottom of things.
你们家代代都没钱，我看你也是一个穷骨头。
Nǐmen jiā dàidài dōu méiqián，wǒ kàn nǐ yěshì yígè qiónggǔtou。
Your family has been poor for generations, I think you are also a poor wretch.
又不买东西，在商场里面穷逛什么呀？
Yòu bùmǎidōngxi，zài shāngchǎng lǐmian qióngguàng shénme ya？
Why should we stroll aimlessly in the department store when we don\'t intended buy anything?
这件衣服很贵，你这穷鬼根本买不起！
Zhèjiàn yīfu hěnguì，nǐ zhè qióngguǐ gēnběn mǎibùqǐ！
The garment is expensive, paupers like you could never afford it!
你这不是穷讲究吗，吃顿饭还要弄这么多花样。
Nǐ zhè búshì qióngjiǎngjiū ma，chī dùn fàn háiyào nòng zhèmeduō huāyàng。
Aren\'t you overly fussy to make so many things for just one meal?
没想到他竟过着如此穷匮的生活。
Méi xiǎngdào tā jìng guò zhe rúcǐ qióngkuì de shēnghuó。
We never expect a man like he should lead such a poor life.
小康家庭应该帮助穷匮一同致富。
Xiǎokāng jiātíng yīnggāi bāngzhù qióngkuì yìtóng zhìfù。
Comfortably-off families should help the poor to get rich together.
不要认为自然资源是永不穷匮的。
Búyào rènwéi zìrán zīyuán shì yǒngbùqióngkuì de。
Don\'t believe that natural resources are inexhaustible.
他整日穷忙，全都是为了这个家呀。
Tā zhěngrì qióngmáng，quán dōushì wèi le zhège jiā ya。
He works hard all day long every day to eke out a living for his family.
他穷忙了一个月，却没能拿到应得的工资。
Tā qióngmáng le yígè yuè，què méi néng nádào yīngdé de gōngzī。
He has worked too hard for a month but has been underpaid.
他过惯了穷奢极侈的生活。
Tā guòguàn le qióngshē jíchǐ de shēnghuó。
He is used to living in extreme luxury.
旧式文人的身上难免有些穷酸气。
Jiùshì wénrén de shēnshàng nánmiǎn yǒuxiē qióngsuānqì。
Old-type intellectuals are inevitably a little poor and pedantic.
他一生穷途潦倒，没发过什么财。
Tā yìshēng qióngtú liáodǎo，méi fāguò shénme cái。
He has been poor and wretched all his life, never making any real money.
如果有一天你穷途末路了，请记得有我这个朋友。
Rúguǒ yǒu yìtiān nǐ qióngtúmòlù le，qǐng jìde yǒu wǒ zhège péngyou。
When you are at an impasse some day, please remember I am your friend and you can turn to me for help.
对于当事人的民事责任，我们必须穷追到底。
Duìyú dāngshìrén de mínshì zérèn，wǒmen bìxū qióngzhuī dàodǐ。
We should search thoroughly for any civil liabilities of the client.
小猫对那只老鼠穷追不舍。
Xiǎomāo duì nàzhī lǎoshǔ qióngzhuībùshě。
The cat keeps on chasing after the mouse.
人家说不知道，你就不要再穷追不舍地问了。
Rénjiā shuō bùzhīdào，nǐ jiù búyào zài qióngzhuībùshě de wèn le。
When someone says he has no idea, you should not question him closely.
别看我现在穷困潦倒，我家上世可是有名的富翁。
Bié kàn wǒ xiànzài qióngkùnliáodǎo，wǒjiā shàngshì kěshì yǒumíng de fùwēng。
Though I am poor and wretched now, my progenitors were famously wealthy.
春节前医疗小分队到农村为穷苦病人施诊，受到了村民的欢迎。
Chūnjié qián yīliáo xiǎofēnduì dào nóngcūn wèi qióngkǔ bìngrén shīzhěn，shòudào le cūnmín de huānyíng。
Before Spring Festival, small medical groups went to the countryside to treat poor people\'s illnesses and were welcomed by the villagers.
由于反抗暴政，他过得很穷苦，晚境凄凉。
Yóuyú fǎnkàng bàozhèng，tā guò de hěnqióngkǔ，wǎnjìng qīliáng。
Opposing tyranny, he led a poor life, and was very miserable in his late years.
世界上的事物都处在无穷无尽的运动变化之中。
Shìjièshàng de shìwù dōu chǔzài wúqióng wújìn de yùndòng biànhuà zhī zhōng。
Everything in the world is in endless changes.
因为家里穷，她从小就被卖去当像生。
Yīnwéi jiā lǐ qióng，tā cóng xiǎo jiù bèi mài qù dāng xiàng shēng。
She was sold to be an actress when she was young because her family was very poor.
过去家里穷，值钱的东西都押当了。
Guòqù jiā lǐ qióng，zhíqián de dōngxi dōu yādàng le。
We were poor in the past. Anything which worthes a little was pawned.
染上赌博的恶习将贻害无穷。
Rǎnshàng dǔbó de èxí jiāng yíhài wúqióng。
Getting into the bad habit of gambling will bring continuous evil consequences.
鸦片祸国殃民，贻患无穷，我们反对吸食鸦片。
Yāpiàn huòguó yāngmín，yíhuàn wúqióng，wǒmen fǎnduì xīshí yāpiàn。
Opium causes grave harm to the state and the people, leading to endless troubles, so we should object to the use of opium.
剧中女主角幽婉的曲调让人回味无穷。
Jù zhōng nǚzhǔjué yōuwǎn de qǔdiào ràng rén huíwèi wúqióng。
The exquisite tunes sung by the heroine in the play gave the audience endless afterthoughts.
乡里的土财主们把穷人统称为愚氓。
Xiānglǐ de tǔcáizhǔmen bǎ qióngrén tǒngchēng wéi yúmáng。
The rich men in the village call every poor person a fool.
小张离家打工是因为家里实在太穷了。
Xiǎo Zhāng líjiā dǎgōng shì yīnwèi jiā lǐ shízai tài qióng le。
Xiaozhang left home to work because his family was so poor.
在农村改革中，治穷是关键。
Zài nóngcūn gǎigé zhōng，zhìqióng shì guānjiàn。
Eliminating poverty is the key in reforming rural areas.
由于家境贫穷，她每晚只能睡在简朴的竹榻上。
Yóuyú jiājìng pínqióng，tā měiwǎn zhǐnéng shuìzài jiǎnpǔ de zhútà shàng。
Due to poverty, she has to sleep on a simple bamboo couch every night.
警员全力追堵这名穷凶极恶的逃犯。
Jǐngyuán quánlì zhuīdǔ zhè míng qióngxiōng jíè de táofàn。
The police are chasing an extremely vicious escaped criminal with all their resources.
他现在穷得连租钱都不能付了，更不用说押金了。
Tā xiànzài qióng de lián zūqián dōu bùnéng fù le，gèng búyòng shuō yājīn le。
He is too poor to pay the rent right now, let alone the cash pledge.
我现在穷得只能吃阳春面 了。
Wǒ xiànzài qióng de zhǐnéng chī yángchūnmiàn le。
I am now so poor that I can only afford a bowl of noodles in plain sauce.
他大学毕业后，自愿到穷困的山乡支教，做了一个民办教师。
Tā dàxué bìyè hòu，zìyuàn dào qióngkùn de shānxiāng zhījiào，zuòle yígè mínbàn jiàoshī。
After graduation, he volunteered to be a community-supported teacher in the poor countryside.
他们从此不再贫穷。
Tāmen cóngcǐ búzài pínqióng。
After that they were no longer poor.
他穷得丁当响。
Tā qióngde dīngdāngxiǎng。
He\'s penniless.
山穷水尽
shānqióngshuǐjìn
at the end of one\'s tether
贫穷是造成犯罪的原因之一。
Pínqióng shì zàochéng fànzuì de yuányīn zhīyī.
Poverty is one of the causes of crime.
无穷无尽
wúqióngwújìn
limitless
他们穷年累月在这儿工作。
Tāmen qióngniánlěiyuè zài zhèr gōngzuò.
They\'ve worked here for years on end.
穷乡僻壤
qióngxiāngpìrǎng
remote backwater
股市还没到山穷水尽的地步。
Gǔshì hái méi dào shānqióngshuǐjìn de dìbù。
The stock market still hasn\'t reached its lowest point.
穷闾隘巷
理屈词穷
穷蹙
穷光蛋
穷凶极恶
穷山恶水
欲穷千里目，更上一层楼
穷山沟
他以前也穷过，现在富裕了。
受惠无穷
山穷水尽
穷原竟委。
力大无穷
穷乡僻壤
贫穷
黔驴技穷
无穷无尽
山穷水尽
层出不穷
理屈词穷
日暮途穷。
穷凶极恶
穷奢极侈。
追本穷源
皓首穷经。
穷追猛打
穷究。
穷兵黩武
穷毕生精力，完成此巨著。
穷则思变
穷寇。
家里很穷
穷人
穷日子
贫穷。
穷开心
穷讲究
穷凑合
穷对付。
穷乡僻壤
穷巷。
理屈词穷。
穷乡僻壤。
穷儒
穷奢极欲
穷原竟委。
图穷匕首见。
穷凶极恶。
子子孙孙，无穷匮也。
穷原竟委。
原本穷末。
穷则思变。
抱憾无穷。
上穷碧落下黄泉，两处茫茫皆不见。
藏富装穷。
触法不究，贻害无穷。
山脚下过去是穷人的丛冢。
靠缝穷度日。
常感喟宇宙之无穷。
格物穷理。
过去有名的穷山沟，如今变成了花果山。
穷理尽性。
科技扶贫是救穷的好办法。
男家穷，女家比较富裕。
穷棒子精神。
穷愁潦倒。
连年内战，国力穷乏。
勤劳致富，挖掉穷根。
事情多如牛毛，你还在那里穷逛什么呢？
量入为出，不要穷讲究。
穷匮不堪。
体恤穷匮，扶助孤寡。
万物滋衍，永不穷匮。
为养家糊口，终日穷忙。
整天穷忙，连理发都顾不上。
《儒林外史》里的那些旧知识分子大多带有穷酸气。
穷追猛打
穷追到底。
对残敌穷追不舍。
记者们连连发问，穷追不舍。
无穷无尽。
万物变化无穷无尽。
人民群众中蕴含着无穷的智慧和巨大的创造力。
宜将剩勇追穷寇，不可沽名学霸王。
图穷匕首见(ｘｉàｎ)。
此事如果处理不善，将后患无穷
那时候家里穷啊，吃不上，穿不上
他在戏里串演一个穷书生
时穷节乃见，一一垂丹青
穷兵黩武
皓首穷经。
过去一个穷山村里，能有几个喝墨水的？
黔驴技穷
自感技穷。
小说的结尾余味无穷。
穷途末路。
穷乡僻壤。
家境贫穷
贫穷落后的地区。
欣赏京剧名段其乐无穷。
真理不可穷尽。
科学探索是没有穷尽的。
宜将剩勇追穷寇
穷寇勿追。
家境穷苦。
发展经济，改变穷困面貌。
穷酸潦倒的孔乙己。
受惠无穷
竟然穷到了这般田地。

穷折腾一气。

穷街陋巷的卑贱
far from poor
一点儿也不穷

救济穷人
infinite set
无穷集，无限集

为贫穷所困
through in politics
政治上智穷

他虽然不穷，却无现金。
a hack writer
穷文人，雇佣文人，卖身投靠的文人

战争使各国民穷财尽。

我敬佩这些人，尽管贫穷但他们仍保持微笑，就好像自己是世界上最富有的人一样。

昨天的会议上提出了一个消灭贫穷的新建议。

真是奇怪，穷人是如何做到对政府没有怨气的呢。

他以前在巴西居住的地方，是个相当穷的地区。

最近北京的街道上到处都是是讨钱的穷人。

美国人谈及“下层阶级”时，通常是指目前没有或者将来也没有工作的穷人和年轻人。
A huge quantity of food was donated to poor people.
大批的食物捐赠给穷人。
The organization is trying to reach out to the areas where poor people live.
这个组织正在深入调查那些穷人居住的地区。

在贫穷国家，平均每一百个孩子中只有一个能有机会上大学。
The rivers of blood still run deep in many poor countries involved in civil war.
在很多卷入内战的贫穷国家，血流成河仍是屡见不鲜。
The headmaster drew the meeting out for another hour with a series of tedious questions.
校长问了几个穷极无聊的问题，把会议又拖长了一个小时。
it seemed to last for an eternity
[inf] 时间长得似乎无穷无尽
he\'s not exactly rich/poor
他一点也算不上富/穷
She devoted her life to fighting poverty.
她一生都在与贫穷作斗争。
the rich and the poor
穷人和富人

首相巡视了利物浦最贫穷的地区。

有些生活在极度贫穷地区人得不到足够的食物。

在世界很多地方，贫穷仍是一个亟待重视的问题。

他们靠一小块土地过着贫穷的生活。

一些人认为贫穷滋生犯罪。

富人和穷人之间不平等的现象一直存在。

他曾经很富有，但最终陷入了贫穷的泥沼。

Dà xiāotiáo shǐ jiātíng xiànrù pínqióng。

很长一段时间以来，穷人并没有得到公平对待。

Qióngrén jiēshòule jiùjì。

Zhè zhǒng shíhuì de báijiǔ ràng rén huíwèiwúqióng。

层出不穷
新生事物层出不穷。
Xīnshēng shìwù céngchūbùqióng。 
New things are emerging one after another.

At the end of the Ming Dynasty, peasant revolts broke out again and again.

Búyào rènwéi zìrán zīyuán shì yǒngbùqióngkuì de。
Don\'t believe that natural resources are inexhaustible.
人家说不知道，你就不要再穷追不舍地问了。
Rénjiā shuō bùzhīdào，nǐ jiù búyào zài qióngzhuībùshě de wèn le。
When someone says he has no idea, you should not question him closely.
你这不是穷讲究吗，吃顿饭还要弄这么多花样。

她不愿受穷。

基督徒。
虔诚的基督教徒。
The American Midwest is commonly referred to as the Bible belt of America because of the high population of Christians living in the area.
美国中西部通常被称为圣经地带，因为在那儿居住着很多基督徒。
Her mother is a delicate and gentile dark woman.
她母亲肤色浅黑，是位谈吐优雅的基督徒。
His election is also of great significance to Christians everywhere.
Tā de dāngxuǎn duì gèdì jīdūtú yìyì zhòngdà。
他的当选对各地基督徒意义重大。
Christians accept and believe that Jesus Christ is their personal savior.
Jīdūtú men jiēshòu bìng xiāngxìn cǐ zhǒng guāndiǎn，jí Yēsū shì tāmen de jiùshìzhǔ。
基督徒们接受并相信此种观点，即耶稣是他们的救世主。
Good Christians still communicated once a week.
Qiánchéng de jīdūtú réngrán měi zhōu dào jiàotáng jiēshòu shèngcān。
虔诚的基督徒仍然每周到教堂接受圣餐。
God has a definite plan for the gentiles.
Shàngdì duì Jīdūtú yǒu míngquè de ānpái。
上帝对基督徒有明确的安排。
The concept is strange to Christian minds.
Zhè yī gàiniàn duì jīdūtú láishuō hěn mòshēng。
这一概念对基督徒来说很陌生。
Christians refer to themselves as gentiles.
Jīdūtú bǎ tāmen chēngwéi yìjiàotú。
基督徒把他们称为异教徒。
Christians refer to the mother of Jesus as the virgin Mary.
Jīdūtú bǎ Yēsū de mǔqīn chēngwéi shèngmǔ Mǎlìyà。
基督徒把耶稣的母亲称为圣母玛利亚。
To christians, protology refers to god\'s fundamental purpose for humanity.
Duì jīdūtú láishuō，chuàngshìlùn jiēshìle shàngdì chuàngzào rénlèi de gēnběnmùdì。
对基督徒来说，创世论揭示了上帝创造人类的根本目的。
As a Christian I want to follow Jesus Christ.
Zuòwéi yí gè jīdū jiàotú，wǒ yào xìnfèng Yēsū。
作为一个基督教徒，我要信奉耶稣。
To be a Christian means actively to follow Jesus Christ in faith.
Yào chéngwéi yí gè jīdū jiàotú，yìwèizhe yào zài xìnyǎng shàng jījí de xìnfèng Yēsū。
要成为一个基督教徒，意味着要在信仰上积极地信奉耶稣。
The Israeli government is occasionally rebuked for its oppression of Christians.
Yǐsèliè zhèngfǔ bùshí huì yīnwèi yāpò Jīdūjiàotú ér shòu qiǎnzé。
以色列政府不时会因为压迫基督教徒而受谴责。
Believers believe, as long as they have Jesus\' words embedded in them, they can stand strong and not be shaken.
信徒们相信，只要牢记基督的教导，他们就能坚强地站起来，不被动摇。
圣诞节对基督教徒来说是个重要节日。
Shèngdànjié duì jīdū jiàotú láishuō shì gè zhòngyào jiérì。
Christmas Day is an important holiday for Christians.
基督教徒相信是造物主创造了万物。
Jīdū jiàotú xiāngxìn shì zàowùzhǔ chuàngzào le wànwù。
Christians believe that it is God who creates everything.
犹大背叛了耶稣，是基督教中的叛徒。

他声称一些琐罗亚斯德教的思想影响着基督教。

早期的基督教著作家用他们的著作影响教会教义。

神学家影响了基督教思想。

他们在很短的一段时间内便接受了基督教信仰。

我在那里遇到了许多很好的新朋友，作为真正的基督教兄弟姐妹，我们共同祈祷。

这本书给予了基督教思想一种当代的诠释。

基督教的信仰有清晰的关于造物顺序的思想体系。
I was raised in the Christian faith.

他刷房时沾了一鼻子白灰。
Tā shuāfáng shí zhān le yìbízi báihuī。
He got himself dirty from whitewashing the wall.
他是生意上的败军之帅，可他并不灰心。
Tā shì shēngyì shàng de bàijūn zhī shuài，kě tā bìng bùhuīxīn。
Though he has failed a lot in business, he is not dejected.
她扫地总是很用力，灰尘都播扬起来了。
Tā sǎodì zǒngshì hěnyònglì，huīchén dōu bōyáng qǐlái le。
She sweeps the ground with too much force, raising a lot of dust.
他不想再吃粉笔灰了，年后辞职离开了学校。
Tā bùxiǎng zài chī fěnbǐhuī le，niánhòu cízhí líkāi le xuéxiào。
He didn\'t want to eat chalk-powder any more, so he quit and left the school in the new year .
“春蚕到死丝方尽，蜡炬成灰泪始干”。
“Chūncándàosǐ sīfāngjìn，làjùchénghuī lèishǐgàn”。
Spring silkworms produce silk until the last minute of their lives and candles send out light until they are completely burned out.
吊顶上沾满了灰尘，我们要把它清扫一下。
Diàodǐng shàng zhānmǎn le huīchén，wǒmen yào bǎ tā qīngsǎo yíxià。
The ceiling is covered with dust. We have to clean it.
面对噩运，她从来不灰心和悲观。
Miànduì èyùn，tā cónglái bùhuīxīn hé bēiguān。
She was never dejected by bad luck and stayed optimistic.
哪怕事情再烦难，你也别灰心啊！
Nǎpà shìqing zài fánnán，nǐ yě bié huīxīn a！
No matter how complex things are, don\'t lose heart!
和同龄人相比，他的生活实在是灰不溜丢。
Hé tónglíngrén xiāngbǐ，tā de shēnghuó shízai shì huībùliūdiū。
Compared with his peers, his life was really gloomy.
灰不溜秋的衣服显得人更加沉闷。
Huībùliūqiū de yīfu xiǎnde rén gèngjiā chénmèn。
People dressed in dark look even more depressing.
食用野生的灰菜应注意安全。
Shíyòng yěshēng de huīcài yīng zhùyì ānquán。
When eating wild pigweed, you should pay attention to your safety.
这房子建得太久了，灰顶都破了个洞。
Zhè fángzi jiàn de tài jiǔ le，huīdǐng dōu pò le gè dòng。
The house was built too long ago, there is even a hole in the roof.
她从灰度等级来判断图片的质量。
Tā cóng huīdù děngjí lái pànduàn túpiàn de zhìliàng。
She judged the picture quality according to the grey degree scale.
他购买了许多灰膏准备新建房屋。
Tā gòumǎi le xǔduō huīgāo zhǔnbèi xīnjiàn fángwū。
She bought a lot of white lime, preparing to build a new house.
他喜欢穿灰蓝色的衣服。
Tā xǐhuan chuān huīlánsè de yīfu。
He loved to wear grey-blue clothes.
因为打扫屋子，他把自己弄得灰头土脸的。
Yīnwéi dǎsǎo wūzi，tā bǎ zìjǐ nòng de huītóu tǔliǎn de。
He was covered with dirt because he just swept the room.
因为比赛失败，队员们都灰头土脸的。
Yīnwéi bǐsài shībài，duìyuánmen dōu huītóu tǔliǎn de。
All the players were depressed, because they lost the game.
桌面沉积了厚厚的一层灰土。
Zhuōmiàn chénjī le hòuhòu de yì céng huītǔ。
There was a thick layer of dust on the desk.
工地里堆放了大量建房用的灰土。
Gōngdì lǐ duīfàng le dàliàng jiànfáng yòng de huītǔ。
On the building site, there was a lot of limestone soil piled up for house building.
我爱我生命中的晦暝时刻，虽然灰暗但是可以让我更珍惜阳光。
Wǒ ài wǒ shēngmìng zhōng de huìmíng shíkè，suīrán huīàn dànshì kěyǐ ràng wǒ gèng zhēnxī yángguāng。
I love those depressing times in my life. Although dark, they made me cherish the sunshine more.
地上的这些物质其实全部都是火山爆发时喷出的火山灰。
Dìshàng de zhèxiē wùzhì qíshí quánbùdōushì huǒshān bàofā shí pēnchū de huǒshānhuī。
These things on the earth are actually all volcanic ash from volcanic eruptions.
高处的灰尘一定要用鸡毛帚才打扫得到。
Gāochù de huīchén yídìng yào yòng jīmáozhǒu cái dǎsǎo de dào。
You have to use a chicken-feather duster to clean the dust in high places.
这个不幸的孩子，因为患脊髓灰质炎而留下了条瘸腿。
Zhège búxìng de háizi，yīnwèi huàn jǐsuǐhuīzhìyán ér liúxià le tiáo quétuǐ。
This poor child was left with two paralyzed legs due to polio.
他要求死后把骨灰空葬在这片美丽的草原上。
Tā yāoqiú sǐ hòu bǎ gǔhuī kōngzàng zài zhèpiàn měilì de cǎoyuán shàng。
He demands that his ashes be scattered over the beautiful plain.
这座立窑是专门用来烧制石灰石的。
Zhèzuò lìyáo shì zhuānmén yònglái shāozhì shíhuīshí de。
The erected stove is specially made for firing limestone.
这种磷肥的主要原料就是磷灰石。
Zhèzhǒng línféi de zhǔyào yuánliào jiùshì línhuīshí。
The main material of the phosphate fertilizer is apatite.
扒灰这种行为是法律和道德都不允许的。
Bāhuī zhèzhǒng xíngwéi shì fǎlǜ hé dàodé dōu bùyǔnxǔ de。
The act of sleeping with one\'s daughter-in-law is not allowed, neither legally nor morally.
他适合穿葡萄灰色的衣服。
Tā shìhé chuān pútao huīsè de yīfu。
Light reddish grey clothes suit him.
他家的谱牒已在一次大火中化为灰烬。
Tā jiā de pǔdié yǐ zài yícì dàhuǒ zhōng huàwéi huījìn。
The genealogy of his family was reduced to ashes in the fire.
他那件铅灰色上衣是爸爸从香港带回来的。
Tā nà jiàn qiānhuīsè shàngyī shì bàba cóng Xiānggǎng dài huílái de。
His lead grey jacket was brought by his father from Hong Kong.
他家新房的墙面是用青灰上的色。
Tā jiā xīnfáng de qiángmiàn shì yòng qīnghuī shàng de sè。
The wall surfaces of his new house were brushed with greenish lime.
青灰色的上衣配上这条裤子一定好看。
Qīnghuīsè de shàngyī pèishàng zhètiáo kùzi yídìng hǎokàn。
A greenish jacket will surely match the trousers well.
石灰岩的俗称是青石。
Shíhuīyán de súchēng shì qīngshí。
Limestone is colloquially called cyan stone.
我要用这些泥灰苫背屋顶。
Wǒ yào yòng zhèxiē níhuī shànbèi wūdǐng。
I will lay the foundation of the roof with the marl.
这一带民居的屋顶都使用深灰色的瓦片。
Zhèyídài mínjū de wūdǐng dōu shǐyòng shēn huīsè de wǎpiàn。
Dark gray tiles are used on the roof of ordinary people\'s houses in this neighborhood.
石灰岩的主要成分是碳酸钙。
Shíhuīyán de zhǔyào chéngfèn shì tànsuāngài。
The main component of limestone is calcium carbonate.
他们在矿上开采出了一些石灰质矿石。
Tāmen zài kuàngshàng kāicǎi chū le yìxiē shíhuīzhì kuàngshí。
They extracted some calcium carbonate ores in the mine.

Zhèzuò pòmiào lǐ de shí xiàng yǐjing pòlàn bùkān，shàngmiàn bùmǎn le zhīzhūwǎng hé huīchén。
The stone figures in this dilapidated temple are already in decay, covered with cobwebs and dust.
不知道发生了什么事，他的脸色铁灰。
Bùzhīdào fāshēng le shénme shì，tā de liǎnsè tiěhuī。

请帮我把办公桌上的那个瓦灰色封皮的笔记本拿过来。

Please bring me the notebook with a slate-gray cover on my desk.
香炉里堆满了香灰，你应该好好打扫一下了。

The incense burner is full of incense ash, you should clean it.

Xiāoshíhuī jìnrù rén de yǎnjīng kěnéng huì dǎozhì shīmíng。

He demands that his ashes be scattered over the beautiful plain.
我们把爷爷的骨灰安厝在了殡仪馆。
Wǒmen bǎ yéye de gǔhuī āncuò zài le bìnyíguǎn。
We have got a place at the funeral service hall for our grandfather\'s ashes.
骨灰。
After he died, we scattered his ashes at the river he used to go fishing to.
他去世后，我们把他的骨灰撒在了他生前常去钓鱼的那条河里。
The box with the ancestors\' ashes was emplaced on the top shelf of the house altar.
Xiānbèimen de gǔhuīhé bèi ānfàng zài shìnèi shèngtán de zuì gāo yì céng jiàzi shàng。
先辈们的骨灰盒被安放在室内圣坛的最高一层架子上。
The calcareous skeletons of this distinctive species have weathered out from the limestone matrix.
Zhè yì dútè wùzhǒng de gàizhì gǔgé yǐ zài shíhuīshí jǔzhèn zhōng fēnghuà。
这一独特物种的钙质骨骼已在石灰石矩阵中风化。
他不费吹灰之力就通过了考试。
Tā búfèichuīhuīzhīlì jiù tōngguòle kǎoshì。
He got through the exam with very little effort.

Winter coats had been navy or dark grey.

It was not dull grey as distance had suggested, but a mottle of khaki and black and olive-green.
Nà qíshí búshì cóng yuǎnchù kànqǐlái de àn huīsè，érshì huánghèsè 、hēisè hé gǎnlǎnlǜ zǔchéng de zásè。

Zài gāoguāng bùfen，tā bèi rǎnchéng àndàn de yínhuīsè。
在高光部分，它被染成暗淡的银灰色。

他们有时是浅灰色，有时是暗红色或褐色。

South China has the custom of drinking realgar wine during the Dragon Boat Festival.

对这种事我们有约定俗成的解决办法。
Duì zhèzhǒng shì wǒmen yǒu yuēdìngsúchéng de jiějuébànfǎ。
We have established practice for dealing with this kind of thing.

Dragon Boat Festival is In memory of Quyuan, and we row dragon boats in that day.

Chongyang Festival is a traditional festival in our country.  Climbing hills to appreciate the chrysanthemum is one traditional custom during this festival.
《创世纪》对于研究纳西族的历史和习俗有很多可以借鉴的地方。
《Chuàngshìjì》 duìyú yánjiū nàxīzú de lìshǐ hé xísú yǒu hěnduō kěyǐ jièjiàn de dìfāng。

按照习俗，订婚是一定要有定礼的。

According to custom, betrothal gifts are necessary for an engagement.
在中国有端阳吃粽子的习俗。
Zài Zhōngguó yǒu Duānyáng chī zòngzi de xísú。
It is a custom in China to have zongzi (pyramid-shaped dumplings made of glutinous rice wrapped in bamboo or reed leaves) on the Dragon Boat Festival.
逛灯是每年正月十五的传统习俗。
Guàngdēng shì měinián zhēngyuè shíwǔ de chuántǒng xísú。
Going to the streets and seeing the lanterns is a traditional custom of every year\'s Chinese Lantern Festival.
国别不同，生活习俗、思想意识往往也不同。
Guóbié bùtóng，shēnghuó xísú、sīxiǎng yìshí wǎngwǎng yě bùtóng。
People in different countries always have varied habits, customs, and ideologies.
回回不吃猪肉，这是他们的习俗。
Huíhuí bùchī zhūròu，zhè shì tāmen de xísú。
The Hui people\'s religious conventions prevent them from eating pork.
在惊蛰这一天民间有吃梨的习俗。
Zài jīngzhé zhè yìtiān mínjiān yǒu chī lí de xísú。
On one of the 24 solar terms, March 5th,6th or 7th, it is the custom to eat pears.
破五的习俗是指正月初五这天家人团聚一堂，吃饺子。
Pòwǔ de xísú shì zhǐ zhēngyuè chūwǔ zhè tiān jiārén tuánjù yìtáng，chī jiǎozi。
The custom of Po Wu means that family members reunite to eat dumplings on the fifth day of the first lunar month.
这个台历用民间的习俗标注月份，比如将五月写成蒲月。
Zhège táilì yòng mínjiān de xísú biāozhù yuèfèn，bǐrú jiāng wǔyuè xiěchéng púyuè。
This desk calendar marks the months according to folk customs, such as writing the fifth month of the lunar year as Pu month.
各个地方的守丧习俗不太相同。
Gè gè dìfāng de shǒusàng xísú bú tài xiāngtóng。
The rites for the dead vary from one place to another.
我们这里每年五月节都有赛龙舟的习俗。
Wǒmen zhèlǐ měinián wǔyuèjié dōu yǒu sàilóngzhōu de xísú。
It is our custom to hold a boating contest every May.
我国许多少数民族都有配戴银饰的习俗。

People from many ethnic groups in China have the habit of wearing silver ornaments.
小镇端午节赛龙舟的习俗可是由来已久。
Xiǎozhèn duānwǔjié sàilóngzhōu de xísú kěshì yóulái yǐjiǔ。
The custom of dragon boat competitions at the Dragon Boat Festival in this town has a long history.

The rituals known as male bonding do not necessarily involve drinking beer together.

Tā kuángyě bùjī de xíngwéi shì duì yāyì xísú de fǎnkàng。
他狂野不羁的行为是对压抑习俗的反抗。

Some Mexican native customs and traditions are still alive.

通俗易懂
tōngsúyìdǒng
easy to understand
This is a lucidly written book.

qiǎnxiǎn tōngsú de kēxué dúwù
simple popular scientific literature
他用通俗的笔调写了许多科学读物。
Tā yòng tōngsú de bǐdiào xiě le xǔduō kēxué dúwù。
He wrote many books on science in a popular style.
给小学生阅读的科普文章要注意其通俗性。

The articles on popular science that primary school students read should be easy and general.

tōngsú dúwù
popular literature
浅显通俗的科学读物
qiǎnxiǎn tōngsú de kēxué dúwù
simple popular scientific literature
通俗易懂
tōngsúyìdǒng
easy to understand
拿一句通俗的话来讲
ná yíjù tōngsú de huà lái jiǎng
to use a common expression
通俗歌手一般都用本嗓演唱。
Tōngsú gēshǒu yìbān dōu yòng běnsǎng yǎnchàng。
Popular singers usually sing with their natural voice.
他说话喜欢打譬方，能把深奥的道理讲得生动通俗。
Tā shuōhuà xǐhuan dǎ pìfāng，néng bǎ shēnào de dàolǐ jiǎng de shēngdòng tōngsú。
He likes to make analogies when he speaks, which makes profound truth easy to understand.
这场晚会上歌手演唱的都是通俗歌曲。
Zhèchǎng wǎnhuì shàng gēshǒu yǎnchàng de dōushì tōngsú gēqǔ。
At the evening party, the singers all sang pop songs.
他能够把很深奥的理论通俗化，所以得到了学生们的认可。
Tā nénggòu bǎ hěnshēnào de lǐlùn tōngsúhuà，suǒyǐ dédào le xuéshengmen de rènkě。
He can make profound theories sound easy, which is why all the students like him.
给小学生阅读的科普文章要注意其通俗性。
Gěi xiǎoxuésheng yuèdú de kēpǔ wénzhāng yào zhùyì qí tōngsúxìng。
The articles on popular science that primary school students read should be easy and general.
我不太懂这种雅言，你能讲得通俗点吗？
Wǒ bú tài dǒng zhèzhǒng yǎyán，nǐ néng jiǎng de tōngsú diǎn ma？
I can\'t understand literary language, can you make it more simple?
我不喜欢严肃音乐，来点通俗的。
Wǒ bùxǐhuan yánsù yīnyuè，lái diǎn tōngsú de。
I don\'t like serious music, give me something more popular.
通俗诗并非意味着它是卑俗和浅薄的。
Tōngsúshī bìngfēi yìwèizhe tā shì bēisú hé qiǎnbó de。
Popular poems are not necessarily vulgar and shallow.
我们对全国各地的婚姻风俗进行了通考。
Wǒmen duì quánguó gè dì de hūnyīn fēngsú jìnxíng le tōngkǎo。
We made an investigation of the marriage customs in different places in the country.
通俗文章不宜用典太多

通俗的见解
I have tried to popularize, rather than vulgarize the subject.
我试着使主题通俗化，而不是庸俗化。
I think it\'s proper to  classify her novels as serious literature instead of mere entertainment.
我认为她的小说应该归入文学类作品而不仅仅是通俗读物。

世界是通过通俗语言连接起来的。

It is said that one can not live according to the old almanac, so forget old debts.

Súhuà shuō“kàoshān chīshān，kàoshuǐ chīshuǐ”，yúshì tā jiù xiǎngchū le kàoshā chīshā de diǎnzi，kāifā chū le shāmò tànxiǎn de tèsè lǚyóu xiàng mù。

As the saying goes, eating fruit is good for your health, so we need to eat more fruit.
俗话说得好，忠言逆耳利于行。

说话粗俗
shuōhuà cūsú 
use coarse or vulgar language
过年了，按老风俗，见面都要说一些吉祥话。
Guònián le，àn lǎo fēngsú，jiànmiàn dōuyào shuō yìxiē jíxiánghuà。
It\'s the lunar New Year. According to the old custom, when you meet someone, you should say a few auspicious words.
他说话喜欢打譬方，能把深奥的道理讲得生动通俗。
Tā shuōhuà xǐhuan dǎ pìfāng，néng bǎ shēnào de dàolǐ jiǎng de shēngdòng tōngsú。
He likes to make analogies when he speaks, which makes profound truth easy to understand.

他们和他们的朋友说话语气都很粗俗。

as the saying goes

As the saying goes, &quot;you cannot tie two jackasses to the same trough,&quot; just as one mountain does not allow two tigers.
俗话说久别胜新婚，他们虽然很久才见一次面，但却十分甜蜜。

It is said a little separation is better for the newly wedded.They meet only once in a while, but find it very sweet.

It is said that one can not live according to the old almanac, so forget old debts.
俗话说“靠山吃山，靠水吃水”，于是他就想出了靠沙吃沙的点子，开发出了沙漠探险的特色旅游项目。
Súhuà shuō“kàoshān chīshān，kàoshuǐ chīshuǐ”，yúshì tā jiù xiǎngchū le kàoshā chīshā de diǎnzi，kāifā chū le shāmò tànxiǎn de tèsè lǚyóu xiàng mù。

俗话说千金一诺，他是个讲信用的人，许下的诺言是不会轻易改变的。

As the saying goes, a promise is worth a thousand ounces of gold. He is a man of his word, and never breaks his promises rashly.

pò jiùsú, lì xīnfēnɡ

niǔ yú xísú

此人气宇轩昂，不同流俗。

As the saying goes that “Food and fodder should go ahead of troops and horses”, ample funds must be prepared in the first place when establishing a company .
将第一杯茶水倒掉，这是我们这里的茶俗。

Wèile jìniàn Qūyuán，wǒmen yǒu zài chóngwǔ huá lóngzhōu de xísú。
Dragon Boat Festival is In memory of Quyuan, and we row dragon boats in that day.
重阳节是我国的传统节日，登高赏菊则是重阳节的传统习俗。
Chóngyángjié shì wǒguó de chuántǒng jiérì，dēnggāo shǎngjú zé shì chóngyángjié de chuántǒng xísú。
Chongyang Festival is a traditional festival in our country.  Climbing hills to appreciate the chrysanthemum is one traditional custom during this festival.
《创世纪》对于研究纳西族的历史和习俗有很多可以借鉴的地方。
《Chuàngshìjì》 duìyú yánjiū nàxīzú de lìshǐ hé xísú yǒu hěnduō kěyǐ jièjiàn de dìfāng。
Genesis can be used as a reference when studying the history and customs of the Naxi nationality.
我们懂得入乡从俗的道理，一切按你们的安排办。
Wǒmen dǒngdé rùxiāng cóngsú de dàolǐ，yíqiè àn nǐmen de ānpái bàn。
We understand the saying &quot;when in Rome, do as the Romans&quot;, so we will just follow your arrangements.
你总说别人做事从俗，其实你自己也如此。
Nǐ zǒng shuō biérén zuòshì cóngsú，qíshí nǐ zìjǐ yě rúcǐ。
You always accuse others of following traditions. Actually you are the same.
没想到她竟然嫁给了一个村夫俗子。
Méi xiǎngdào tā jìngrán jiàgěi le yígè cūnfū súzǐ。
It is so surprising that she married an uneducated and ordinary person.
每到过年，这个村仍保留村社习俗。
Měidào guònián，zhège cūn réng bǎoliú cūnshè xísú。
Every time when celebrating the New Year, the village still maintains its customary celebrations.
按照村俗，我们必须喝了这碗酒。
Ànzhào cūnsú，wǒmen bìxū hē le zhèwǎnjiǔ。
According to the customs of the village, we must drink this cup of alcohol.
这些村俗的话，怎么能写在信里。
Zhèxiē cūnsú de huà，zěnme néng xiě zài xìn lǐ。
How can you put such vulgar words in your letter?

我向你介绍一下德昂族的风俗习惯吧。
Wǒ xiàng nǐ jièshào yíxià déángzú de fēngsú xíguàn ba。
Let me introduce you to some customs of the De\'ang ethnic minority.
这部电影的情调太低俗了。
Zhèbù diànyǐng de qíngdiào tài dīsú le。
The emotional appeal of that film is too vulgar.
按照习俗，订婚是一定要有定礼的。
Ànzhào xísú，dìnghūn shì yídìng yào yǒu dìnglǐ de。
According to custom, betrothal gifts are necessary for an engagement.
在中国有端阳吃粽子的习俗。
Zài Zhōngguó yǒu Duānyáng chī zòngzi de xísú。
It is a custom in China to have zongzi (pyramid-shaped dumplings made of glutinous rice wrapped in bamboo or reed leaves) on the Dragon Boat Festival.
他不愿意做阿世媚俗的人。
Tā bú yuànyì zuò ēshìmèisú de rén。
He hates to drift with the stream and do as others do.
她生气的时候竟然能骂出那么恶俗的话来。
Tā shēngqì de shíhou jìngrán néng mà chū nàme èsú de huà lái。
Unexpectedly, she used so many vulgar words when she was angry.
都二十一世纪了，应当用新观念来战胜这种恶俗。
Dōu èrshíyī shìjì le，yīngdāng yòng xīn guānniàn lái zhànshèng zhèzhǒng èsú。
Since we have entered the 21st century, we should adopt new ideas instead of these bad customs.
东北有句俗话：“宁舍三顿饭，不舍二人转”，充分表达了人们对这个地方剧种的喜爱。
Dōngběi yǒu jù súhuà:“Nìng shě sāndùn fàn，bú shě èrrénzhuǎn”，chōngfèn biǎodá le rénmen duì zhège dìfāngjùzhǒng de xǐ\'ài。
As the saying goes in Norheastern China, &quot;We\'d rather give up our three meals than our song and dance duets.&quot; Local people enjoy going to these kind of operas
他经常到山乡写生，画了许多关于农村庙会赶集、过年嫁娶的风俗画。
Tā jīngcháng dào shānxiāng xiěshēng，huà le xǔduō guānyú nóngcūn miàohuì gǎnjí、guònián jiàqǔ de fēngsúhuà。
He often draws sketches in the countryside and has painted a lot of paintings of temple fairs and marriage scenes.
逛灯是每年正月十五的传统习俗。
Guàngdēng shì měinián zhēngyuè shíwǔ de chuántǒng xísú。
Going to the streets and seeing the lanterns is a traditional custom of every year\'s Chinese Lantern Festival.
国别不同，生活习俗、思想意识往往也不同。
Guóbié bùtóng，shēnghuó xísú、sīxiǎng yìshí wǎngwǎng yě bùtóng。
People in different countries always have varied habits, customs, and ideologies.
回回不吃猪肉，这是他们的习俗。
Huíhuí bùchī zhūròu，zhè shì tāmen de xísú。
The Hui people\'s religious conventions prevent them from eating pork.
这个地方的婚俗与众不同，很有特色。
Zhège dìfāng de hūnsú yǔzhòngbùtóng，hěnyǒu tèsè。
The matrimonial customs in this place are unique and have special features.
我们吉林人都喜欢看吉剧，这是地方风俗。
Wǒmen Jílínrén dōu xǐhuan kàn jíjù，zhè shì dìfāng fēngsú。
It\'s a local custom that people in Jilin province all like watching Ji opera.
她只是松松的挽了个髻子，显得很清新脱俗。
Tā zhǐshì sōngsōng de wǎn le gè jìzi，xiǎnde hěnqīngxīn tuōsú。
She casually wears her hair in a bun, and looks elegant and refined.
俗话说一个槽子栓不了两头叫驴。
Súhuà shuō yígè cáozi shuānbùliǎo liǎng tóu jiàolǘ。
As the saying goes, &quot;you cannot tie two jackasses to the same trough,&quot; just as one mountain does not allow two tigers.
在惊蛰这一天民间有吃梨的习俗。
Zài jīngzhé zhè yìtiān mínjiān yǒu chī lí de xísú。
On one of the 24 solar terms, March 5th,6th or 7th, it is the custom to eat pears.
俗话说久别胜新婚，他们虽然很久才见一次面，但却十分甜蜜。
Súhuà shuō jiǔbié shèng xīnhūn，tāmen suīrán hěnjiǔ cái jiàn yícì miàn，dàn què shífēn tiánmì。
It is said a little separation is better for the newly wedded.They meet only once in a while, but find it very sweet.
俗话说，旧皇历翻不得，你不要再翻旧帐了。
Súhuà shuō，jiùhuánglì fānbùdé，nǐ búyào zài fān jiùzhàng le。
It is said that one can not live according to the old almanac, so forget old debts.
俗话说“靠山吃山，靠水吃水”，于是他就想出了靠沙吃沙的点子，开发出了沙漠探险的特色旅游项目。
Súhuà shuō“kàoshān chīshān，kàoshuǐ chīshuǐ”，yúshì tā jiù xiǎngchū le kàoshā chīshā de diǎnzi，kāifā chū le shāmò tànxiǎn de tèsè lǚyóu xiàng mù。
As a popular saying goes: &quot;Those living on a mountain live off the mountain, those living near the water live off the water.&quot; Therefore he had the idea of making use of the sand and developed a special tourism item of desert exploration.
清节时，按照家乡的风俗，他们给爷爷烧了些锞子。
Qīngjié shí，ànzhào jiāxiāng de fēngsú，tāmen gěi yéye shāo le xiē kèzi。
In Pure Brightness, people burn some mock bank money notes for grandpa, according to their hometown custom.
中国民族众多，礼俗也相应地丰富，研究起来很有趣。
Zhōngguó mínzú zhòngduō，lǐsú yě xiāngyìng de fēngfù，yánjiū qǐlái hěnyǒuqù。
There are many people in China, and accordingly their conventions and rituals are abundant. Thus studying  them is very interesting.
有些俚谚俗语中蕴含的道理是很有意义的。
Yǒuxiē lǐyàn súyǔ zhōng yùnhán de dàolǐ shì hěnyǒu yìyì de。
The truth contained in some proverbs speaks volumes.
我们要彻底改变这种不好的流俗。
Wǒmen yào chèdǐ gǎibiàn zhèzhǒng bùhǎo de liúsú。
We should get rid of this bad current fashion.
对于世俗名利，他总是漠然置之，不放在心上。
Duìyú shìsú mínglì，tā zǒngshì mòrán zhìzhī，bú fàngzài xīnshàng。
He is indifferent to fame and gain, and never cares about them.
春节的时候燃放炮竹，是个古老的民俗。
Chūnjié de shíhou ránfàng pàozhú，shì gè gǔlǎo de mínsú。
It\'s an old custom to set off firecrackers during Spring Festival.
他说话喜欢打譬方，能把深奥的道理讲得生动通俗。
Tā shuōhuà xǐhuan dǎ pìfāng，néng bǎ shēnào de dàolǐ jiǎng de shēngdòng tōngsú。
He likes to make analogies when he speaks, which makes profound truth easy to understand.
破五的习俗是指正月初五这天家人团聚一堂，吃饺子。
Pòwǔ de xísú shì zhǐ zhēngyuè chūwǔ zhè tiān jiārén tuánjù yìtáng，chī jiǎozi。
The custom of Po Wu means that family members reunite to eat dumplings on the fifth day of the first lunar month.
这个台历用民间的习俗标注月份，比如将五月写成蒲月。
Zhège táilì yòng mínjiān de xísú biāozhù yuèfèn，bǐrú jiāng wǔyuè xiěchéng púyuè。
This desk calendar marks the months according to folk customs, such as writing the fifth month of the lunar year as Pu month.
俗话说千金一诺，他是个讲信用的人，许下的诺言是不会轻易改变的。
Súhuà shuō qiānjīn yínuò，tā shì gè jiǎng xìnyòng de rén，xǔxià de nuòyán shì búhuì qīngyì gǎibiàn de。
As the saying goes, a promise is worth a thousand ounces of gold. He is a man of his word, and never breaks his promises rashly.
抢婚的风俗现在已经很少见了。
Qiǎnghūn de fēngsú xiànzài yǐjing hěnshǎojiàn le。
The grabbing-bride ceremony is a rare custom nowadays.
石灰岩的俗称是青石。
Shíhuīyán de súchēng shì qīngshí。
Limestone is colloquially called cyan stone.
十三辙是戏曲、曲艺约定俗成要遵照的韵脚辙口。
Shísānzhé shì xìqǔ、qǔyì yuēdìng súchéng yào zūnzhào de yùnjiǎo zhékǒu。
The Thirteen Rhymes are the established rhymes in operas and other folk art forms.
时俗流弊是我们应当反对的，不可以随波逐流。
Shísú liúbì shì wǒmen yīngdāng fǎnduì de，bùkěyǐ suíbōzhúliú。
Prevailing abuses are what we should oppose. We shouldn\'t follow others blindly.
他连交朋友都遵循实用主义原则，未免有些过于世俗了。
Tā lián jiāo péngyou dōu zūnxún shíyòngzhǔyì yuánzé，wèimiǎn yǒuxiē guòyú shìsú le。
He is so vulgar, he sticks to pragmatic principles even when making friends.
各国各地的食俗都带有各自的地域、文化特点。
Gè guó gè dì de shísú dōu dàiyǒu gèzì de dìyù、wénhuà tèdiǎn。
Eating customs in different nations and different places have their own geographical and cultural characteristics.
各个地方的守丧习俗不太相同。
Gè gè dìfāng de shǒusàng xísú bú tài xiāngtóng。
The rites for the dead vary from one place to another.
送灶迎灶是我们那里的一个重要民俗。
Sòngzào yíngzào shì wǒmen nàlǐ de yígè zhòngyào mínsú。
Worshipping and welcoming the kitchen god is an important custom in our place.
山楂在天津俗称红果。
Shānzhā zài Tiānjīn súchēng hóngguǒ。
Haws are generally called &quot;hongguo&quot; in Tianjin.
手机是移动电话的俗称。
Shǒujī shì yídòng diànhuà de súchēng。
&quot;Shouji&quot; is a popular name for mobile phone.
陕北的俗曲小调很有地方特色。
Shǎnběi de súqǔ xiǎodiào hěnyǒu dìfāng tèsè。
Shanbei\'s ditties have many unique local characteristics.
我的家乡俗尚淳朴、风景秀丽。
Wǒ de jiāxiāng súshàng chúnpǔ、fēngjǐng xiùlì。
In my hometown, customs are simple, and the scenery is beautiful.
许多民间的俗谚都很富于哲理性。
Xǔduō mínjiān de súyàn dōu hěnfùyú zhélǐxìng。
There is philosophical meaning in many aphorisms.
我们对全国各地的婚姻风俗进行了通考。
Wǒmen duì quánguó gè dì de hūnyīn fēngsú jìnxíng le tōngkǎo。
We made an investigation of the marriage customs in different places in the country.
这场晚会上歌手演唱的都是通俗歌曲。
Zhèchǎng wǎnhuì shàng gēshǒu yǎnchàng de dōushì tōngsú gēqǔ。
At the evening party, the singers all sang pop songs.
他能够把很深奥的理论通俗化，所以得到了学生们的认可。
Tā nénggòu bǎ hěnshēnào de lǐlùn tōngsúhuà，suǒyǐ dédào le xuéshengmen de rènkě。
He can make profound theories sound easy, which is why all the students like him.
给小学生阅读的科普文章要注意其通俗性。
Gěi xiǎoxuésheng yuèdú de kēpǔ wénzhāng yào zhùyì qí tōngsúxìng。
The articles on popular science that primary school students read should be easy and general.
我不了解这里的土俗，希望你们不要怪罪。
Wǒ bùliǎojiě zhèlǐ de tǔsú，xīwàng nǐmen búyào guàizuì。
I don\'t know local customs here, so please forgive me for my improper behavior.
我从老家给你带来了些土俗食品。
Wǒ cóng lǎojiā gěi nǐ dàilái le xiē tǔsú shípǐn。
I\'ve brought some local specialties for you from my hometown.
在村里举行这种活动简直就是颓风败俗。
Zài cūn lǐ jǔxíng zhèzhǒng huódòng jiǎnzhí jiùshì tuífēng bàisú。
Holding such an activity in the village is indeed corrupting to public morals.
俗话说“兔子不吃窝边草”。
Súhuà shuō tùzi bùchī wōbiāncǎo。
There is a old saying that &quot;a rabit does not eat the grass near its nest&quot;.
我们这里每年五月节都有赛龙舟的习俗。
Wǒmen zhèlǐ měinián wǔyuèjié dōu yǒu sàilóngzhōu de xísú。
It is our custom to hold a boating contest every May.
根据我们这里的风俗，小年夜家家户户都要祭灶。
Gēnjù wǒmen zhèlǐ de fēngsú，xiǎoniányè jiājiāhùhù dōuyào jìzào。
It is our custom to make a sacrifice to the kitchen god on the night before lunar New Year\'s Eve.
中国南方有端午节喝雄黄酒的风俗。
Zhōngguó nánfāng yǒu duānwǔjié hē xiónghuángjiǔ de fēngsú。
South China has the custom of drinking realgar wine during the Dragon Boat Festival.
他去年还俗后就开始蓄发了。
Tā qùnián huánsú hòu jiù kāishǐ xùfà le。
He started growing hair after resuming his secular life last year.
我不太懂这种雅言，你能讲得通俗点吗？
Wǒ bú tài dǒng zhèzhǒng yǎyán，nǐ néng jiǎng de tōngsú diǎn ma？
I can\'t understand literary language, can you make it more simple?
我不喜欢严肃音乐，来点通俗的。
Wǒ bùxǐhuan yánsù yīnyuè，lái diǎn tōngsú de。
I don\'t like serious music, give me something more popular.
俗话说，宁欠阎王债，不欠小鬼钱。
Súhuà shuō，níngqiàn yánwang zhài，búqiàn xiǎoguǐ qián。
As the saying goes, it\'s better to owe a debt to Hades than to the little devils.
俗话说吃水果有益健康，因之，我们要多吃水果。
Súhuà shuō chī shuǐguǒ yǒuyì jiànkāng，yīnzhī，wǒmen yào duō chī shuǐguǒ。
As the saying goes, eating fruit is good for your health, so we need to eat more fruit.
我国许多少数民族都有配戴银饰的习俗。
Wǒ guó xǔduō shǎoshù mínzú dōu yǒu pèidài yínshì de xísú。
People from many ethnic groups in China have the habit of wearing silver ornaments.
小镇端午节赛龙舟的习俗可是由来已久。
Xiǎozhèn duānwǔjié sàilóngzhōu de xísú kěshì yóulái yǐjiǔ。
The custom of dragon boat competitions at the Dragon Boat Festival in this town has a long history.
元夜赏灯的习俗在中国已经有几千年的历史了。
Yuányè shǎngdēng de xísú zài Zhōngguó yǐjing yǒu jǐqiān nián de lìshǐ le。
The Chinese custom of seeing the lanterns on the night of the 15th of the 1st lunar month has a history thousands of years old.
中国人有中秋团聚的习俗。
Zhōngguórén yǒu zhōng qiū tuánjù de xísú。
Chinese people have a custom of gathering together with family during the Mid-Autumn Festival.
俗话说得好，忠言逆耳利于行。
Súhuà shuō de hǎo，zhōng yán nìěr lìyú xíng。
As thea saying goes, honest advice, though unpleasant to the ear, benefits conduct.
让我们比较一下两个民族的风俗习惯。
Ràng wǒmen bǐjiàoyíxià liǎnggè mínzúde fēngsúxíguàn。
Let us compare for a moment the customs of the two peoples.

This novel was widely condemned as an offence to public decency.

We have established practice for dealing with this kind of thing.

这种习俗是祖辈流传下来的。

我试着使主题通俗化，而不是庸俗化。

这个古老的风俗在我的家乡很流行。

今天客队表现不俗。我希望他们能赢。

自从上次考试表现不俗之后，他的成绩就开始提高了。

中国有许多古老的习俗。

[remark，joke+] 格调高雅/低俗

你能告诉我这个习俗的由来吗？

她的相貌有些粗俗，但各部分之间显得优美和谐。

Tāmen hé tāmen de péngyou shuōhuà yǔqì dōu hěn cūsú。

Gè gè dìfāng de shǒusàng xísú bú tài xiāngtóng。
The rites for the dead vary from one place to another.

我不了解这里的土俗，希望你们不要怪罪。

tā bú guò shì gè fánsú zhī bèi，suǒyǐ cái xiě chū rúcǐ sútào de zuòpǐn lái。

The matrimonial customs in this place are unique and have special features.
俗话说，好马不吃回头草，我不准备再次接受她。

As a good steed never turns back to graze on a trodden pasture, I don\'t plan to accept her again.
他不愿意做阿世媚俗的人。
Tā bú yuànyì zuò ēshìmèisú de rén。
He hates to drift with the stream and do as others do.
俗话说“兔子不吃窝边草”。
Súhuà shuō tùzi bùchī wōbiāncǎo。
There is a old saying that &quot;a rabit does not eat the grass near its nest&quot;.
东北有句俗话：“宁舍三顿饭，不舍二人转”，充分表达了人们对这个地方剧种的喜爱。
Dōngběi yǒu jù súhuà:“Nìng shě sāndùn fàn，bú shě èrrénzhuǎn”，chōngfèn biǎodá le rénmen duì zhège dìfāngjùzhǒng de xǐ\'ài。

Súhuà shuō，jiùhuánglì fānbùdé，nǐ búyào zài fān jiùzhàng le。
It is said that one can not live according to the old almanac, so forget old debts.
回回不吃猪肉，这是他们的习俗。
Huíhuí bùchī zhūròu，zhè shì tāmen de xísú。
The Hui people\'s religious conventions prevent them from eating pork.
俗话说一个槽子栓不了两头叫驴。
Súhuà shuō yígè cáozi shuānbùliǎo liǎng tóu jiàolǘ。
As the saying goes, &quot;you cannot tie two jackasses to the same trough,&quot; just as one mountain does not allow two tigers.
我不喜欢严肃音乐，来点通俗的。
Wǒ bùxǐhuan yánsù yīnyuè，lái diǎn tōngsú de。
I don\'t like serious music, give me something more popular.
俗话说，宁欠阎王债，不欠小鬼钱。
Súhuà shuō，níngqiàn yánwang zhài，búqiàn xiǎoguǐ qián。
As the saying goes, it\'s better to owe a debt to Hades than to the little devils.
对于世俗名利，他总是漠然置之，不放在心上。

He is indifferent to fame and gain, and never cares about them.
我不太懂这种雅言，你能讲得通俗点吗？

I can\'t understand literary language, can you make it more simple?
时俗流弊是我们应当反对的，不可以随波逐流。
Shísú liúbì shì wǒmen yīngdāng fǎnduì de，bùkěyǐ suíbōzhúliú。
Prevailing abuses are what we should oppose. We shouldn\'t follow others blindly.
俗话说千金一诺，他是个讲信用的人，许下的诺言是不会轻易改变的。

As the saying goes, a promise is worth a thousand ounces of gold. He is a man of his word, and never breaks his promises rashly.

I wish he would stop being such a clown.

The U.S. armed the freedom fighters in Afghanistan.

The effect of using a colon is to suggest that what comes next is a more specific example.
Shǐyòng màohào，jiù yìwèizhe jiēxiàlái huì gěichū yí gè míngquè de lìzi。
使用冒号，就意味着接下来会给出一个明确的例子。
He took &quot;The Guardian&quot; home to watch.
他带着《惊涛大冒险》回家看。
They played chicken with the waves on the beach.
Tāmen zài hǎitān shàng wánzhe hǎilàng dàmàoxiǎn yóuxì。
他们在海滩上玩着海浪大冒险游戏。
He describes his adventures vivaciously.
Tā xīngfèn de tánlùnzhe zìjǐ de màoxiǎn jīnglì。
他兴奋地谈论着自己的冒险经历。
Gay young blades bragged of their amorous adventures.
Kuàihuo ér jīngshéndǒusǒu de niánqīngrén chuīxūzhe tāmen de liàn\'ài màoxiǎn jīnglì。
快活而精神抖擞的年轻人吹嘘着他们的恋爱冒险经历。
There is something stuck in the chimney throat. The smoke is coming back into the house.
烟囱入口处有东西堵着，烟都从房子后面冒出来了。

They had lit a torch which was flaring and smoking in an iron bracket.
Tāmen diǎnzhe le yí gè zài tiě jià shàng shǎnshuò bìng màoyān de huǒbǎ。
他们点着了一个在铁架上闪烁并冒烟的火把。
冒着枪林弹雨冲锋陷阵
mào zhe qiānglíndànyǔ chōngfēngxiànzhèn
charge under a hail of bullets; charge under heavy fire

The field troop is marching hurriedly in the cold rain and snow.

Flying was still an exciting adventure for him.
Fēixíng duì tā láishuō réngrán shì yí xiàng jīdòng-rénxīn de màoxiǎn。
飞行对他来说仍然是一项激动人心的冒险。
Extremely risky going out in the tide and fog.
Zài zhǎngcháo hé yǒu wù shí wàichū shì jíduān màoxiǎn de。
在涨潮和有雾时外出是极端冒险的。
The risk is as nothing compared to the gain.
所冒风险与所得相比不足挂齿。
The latter reform cannot be introduced without hazarding some risks.
Tuīxíng hòu yī jiēduàn de gǎigé bù kěnéng bú mào fēngxiǎn。
推行后一阶段的改革不可能不冒风险。
You must take a chance on the new future with faith.
Nǐ bìxū zìxìn de wèi xīn de wèilái mào diǎn xiǎn。
你必须自信地为新的未来冒点险。
If you want to thrill an audience, taking risks is essential.
Rúguǒ nǐ xiǎng zhènhàn guānzhòng，mào diǎn fēngxiǎn shì bìbùkěshǎo de。
如果你想震撼观众，冒点风险是必不可少的。
No man of any honest degree would have adventured his life and his goods among them.
Rènhé shāoshāo chéngshí de rén dōu búhuì ná zìjǐ de shēngmìng hé měidé qù mào nàzhǒng xiǎn。
任何稍稍诚实的人都不会拿自己的生命和美德去冒那种险。
They would not venture to help him，either for love or money.
Bùguǎn zěnyàng，tāmen yě bú huì màozhe fēngxiǎn qù bāng tā。
不管怎样，他们也不会冒着风险去帮他。
It was on pain of death that he revealed the truth.
Tā mào zhe wēixiǎn jiēlù le zhēnxiàng。
他冒着危险揭露了真相。
The explorers dared the dangers of the ice north.
探险者们敢冒北方冰天雪地的危险。
to risk one\'s life(或neck, head)
冒生命危险
I better take a plane since I don\'t want to take any chances.
我不想冒任何风险，所以还是坐飞机好些。
He would like to risk his life to save his friend.
他甘愿冒生命危险去救他的朋友。
If you go on a train，you take your life in your hands.
Rúguǒ nǐ chéng huǒchē，nà jiùděi mào shēngmìng wēixiǎn。
如果你乘火车，那就得冒生命危险。
to venture one\'s life
冒着生命危险
There is serious risk of injury while operating that kind of heavy machinery.
操作那种笨重的机器要冒受伤的危险。
The plan could work, but we just can\'t afford to chance it.
这计划也许会有用，但我们冒不起这个险。
to raise the stakes
[fig] 冒更大的风险
Security program was based on calculated risk.
保安工作准备冒一定的风险。
He is not willing to run the risk of losing his money.
他不愿冒赔钱的风险。
People who work outdoors all the time are more at risk here.
Zài zhèli，zài hùwài gōngzuò de rénmen zǒngshì mào gèng duō de fēngxiǎn。
在这里，在户外工作的人们总是冒更多的风险。
A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush means that we should be happy with what we have and not risk losing it by being greedy.
Yì niǎo zài shǒu，shèngyú èr niǎo zài lín，shì shuō wǒmen yīngdāng duì yiyou de zhīzú，ér bùyīng yīn tānlán ér mào shīqù de wēixiǎn。
一鸟在手，胜于二鸟在林，是说我们应当对已有的知足，而不应因贪婪而冒失去的危险。
We risked everything but couldn\'t get the breaks we needed.
Wǒmen màole yíqiè fēngxiǎn，dàn méiyǒu dédào hǎoyùn。
我们冒了一切风险，但没有得到好运。
Rose risked life to find her only child.
Luósī màozhe shēngmìng wēixiǎn qù xúnzhǎo tā wéiyī de háizi。
罗斯冒着生命危险去寻找她唯一的孩子。
They risked their necks for my sake.
Tāmen wèi wǒ màole shēngmìng wēixiǎn。
他们为我冒了生命危险。
No journalist will risk prison to put an article in the paper.
Méiyǒu jìzhě màozhe zuòláo de fēngxiǎn ér fābiǎo zhè lèi wénzhāng。
没有记者冒着坐牢的风险而发表这类文章。
They venture past invisible boundaries at the risk of being shot.
Tāmen màozhe bèi shèshā de wēixiǎn，chuānguò wúxíng de biānjiè。
他们冒着被射杀的危险，穿过无形的边界。
You took a long chance when you decided to go travelling with that strange man.
Dāng nǐ juédìng hé mòshēngrén yìqǐ lǚxíng， nà nǐ kěshì màole xiāngdāng dà de fēngxiǎn。
当你决定和陌生人一起旅行，那你可是冒了相当大的风险。
to run the risk of sth/doing sth
冒着某事/做某事的危险
I was putting myself at risk to be noticed by the police.
Wǒ zhèng màozhe bèi jǐngchá fāxiàn de wēixiǎn。
我正冒着被警察发现的危险。
He also risked being arrested and put in gaol.
Tā hái màole bèi dàibǔ hé bèi guānyā de fēngxiǎn。
他还冒了被逮捕和被关押的风险。
我一定冒死完成这次冲锋任务。
Wǒ yídìng màosǐ wánchéng zhècì chōngfēng rènwù。
I will risk my life to finish this charge.
冒死冲过敌人封锁线
冒死相救。
席间言语多有冒犯，死罪，死罪。
I told her the secret on pain of death.
Wǒ màosǐ gàosu tā zhège mìmì。
我冒死告诉她这个秘密。
这个冒失鬼不小心打碎了我的花瓶。
Zhège màoshīguǐ bùxiǎoxīn dǎsuì le wǒ de huāpíng。
The hot head carelessly broke my vase
冒生命危险

他冒着生命危险，把我从地震废墟里抢救出来，真是恩重如山

虚报冒领
xūbào màolǐng
fraudulent applications and claims
冒领

Tā gēnběn jiù méiyǒu cānyǔ zhè xiàng gōngzuò，jūrán gǎn màogōng lǐngshǎng。

jízào màojìn 
advance impetuously
冒进
màojìn
jump the gun
他今天感冒了，只能低八度进行演唱了。

Having caught a cold today, he has to sing one octave lower.

在护照和驾照中嵌入微型芯片能有效减少假冒身份进行的诈骗。
In 1998 I launched out into a venture that has proved to be significantly life-changing for me.
Yījiǔjiǔbā nián，wǒ kāishǐ zhuóshǒu jìnxíng yì chǎng màoxiǎn，shìhòu zhèngmíng zhè chǎng màoxiǎn duì wǒ yìshēng mìngyùn de gǎibiàn yǒuzhe shífēn zhòngdà de yìyì。

标点符号有逗号、句号、冒号等等。
Biāodiǎn fúhào yǒu dòuhào、jùhào、màohào děngděng。
Punctuation marks are commas, full stops, colons, etc.
The effect of using a colon is to suggest that what comes next is a more specific example.
Shǐyòng màohào，jiù yìwèizhe jiēxiàlái huì gěichū yí gè míngquè de lìzi。
使用冒号，就意味着接下来会给出一个明确的例子。
冒风险
mào fēngxiǎn
take risks
你再考虑考虑，这样做太冒风险了。
Nǐ zài kǎolǜ kǎolǜ，zhèyàng zuò tài mào fēngxiǎn le。
You’d better think it over. It is too risky to do so.
做这件事情要冒很大的风险，他慎之又慎。
Zuò zhèjiàn shìqing yào mào hěndà de fēngxiǎn，tā shèn zhī yòu shèn。
It\'s very risky to do this, so he considers it time and again.
The risk is as nothing compared to the gain.
所冒风险与所得相比不足挂齿。
The latter reform cannot be introduced without hazarding some risks.
Tuīxíng hòu yī jiēduàn de gǎigé bù kěnéng bú mào fēngxiǎn。

他不愿冒赔钱的风险。

冒犯禁令
màofàn jìnlìng
violate a prohibition
冒犯尊严
màofàn zūnyán 
offend sb\'s dignity
我失口冒犯了她。
Wǒ shīkǒu màofàn le tā。
I let slip some remark that offended her.
小生不才，多有冒犯，还请姑娘不要见怪。
Xiǎo hēng bùcái，duōyǒu màofàn，hái qǐng gūniang búyào jiànguài。
I am so sorry to offend you, I hope you don\'t mind.
由于冒犯了朝廷，他被贬为中州知府。
Yóuyú màofàn le cháotíng，tā bèi biǎnwéi zhōng zhōu zhīfǔ。
For offending the royal court, he was demoted to a prefect of Zhongzhou.
无人敢冒犯军纪。
Wú rén gǎn màofàn jūnjì.
No one dares to violate military discipline.
犯不上为这件事去冒那么大的险。
Fàn bu shàngwèi zhèjiànshì qù mào nàme dà de xiǎn。
It\'s not worthwhile taking such a big risk over this job.
冒犯。
决非有意冒犯。
多有冒犯，尚祈宽宥。

冒犯的比较

冒犯(某人)
I\'m sorry if I offended you
如果我冒犯了你，我很抱歉
Your words are a severe violence to the leader\'s authority.
你的话严重冒犯了领导的权威。

任何可能导致关系破裂的冒犯都不能被置若罔闻。
The Hindus claimed that it was an offence to their religion.
Yìndù jiàotú xuānchēng zhè shì duì tāmen zōngjiào de màofàn。
印度教徒宣称这是对他们宗教的冒犯。
Domestic broadcasters decided to ban any songs or plays that could cause offence.

国内播音员决定禁止任何可能招致冒犯的歌曲或者剧目。
They were both in a bad skin after being insulted.
Shòudào màofàn hòu，tāmen dōu zài fā píqì。
受到冒犯后，他们都在发脾气。
Defendant said he never laid a finger on his wife.
Bèigào shuō tā cóngwèi màofàn tā de qīzǐ。
被告说他从未冒犯他的妻子。
He intended no offence to you.
Tā wúyì màofàn nǐ。
他无意冒犯你。
Those who offended the girls in some way were paid back with interest.
Yǐ mǒu zhǒng fāngshì màofàn nǚhái de nàxiē rén shōudàole jiābèi chéngfá。
以某种方式冒犯女孩的那些人收到了加倍惩罚。
In our own situation we react against what offends us.
Zài wǒmen de qíngkuàng xià，wǒmen huì duì rènhé màofàn zuòchū fǎnyìng。
在我们的情况下，我们会对任何冒犯作出反应。
Her tactless remark offended me.
Tā bù détǐ de jiǎnghuà màofànle wǒ。
她不得体的讲话冒犯了我。
I was offended and so was he.
Wǒ shòudào màofàn hěn bù gāoxìng，ér tā yě shì rúcǐ。
我受到冒犯很不高兴，而他也是如此。
He took offence at my question.
Wǒ de wèntí ràng tā juéde bèi màofàn le。
我的问题让他觉得被冒犯了。
The action was not offensive to him but proved somewhat disobliging.
Zhège dòngzuò duì tā bìng méiyǒu màofàn，dàn xiǎnde búgòu tǐtiē。
这个动作对他并没有冒犯，但显得不够体贴。
He behaved rather bumptiously and offended the hostess.
Tā biǎoxiàn de xiāngdāng àomàn，jiéguǒ màofànle nǚzhǔrén。
他表现得相当傲慢，结果冒犯了女主人。
The offense was unintentional.
Búshì gùyì màofàn de。
不是故意冒犯的。
She looked offended.
Tā kànshàng yǒuxiē bèi màofàn zhī yì。
她看上有些被冒犯之意。
冒充内行
màochōngnèiháng
pretend to be an expert; pose as an expert
用次品冒充正品
yòngcìpǐn màochōngzhèngpǐn 
pass off defective goods as certified goods
他冒充记者。
Tā màochōngjìzhě。
He passed himself off as a journalist.
你不要冒充鬼物吓唬人了，没人怕你。
Nǐ búyào màochōng guǐwù xiàhǔ rén le，méi rén pà nǐ。
Stop pretending to be a ghost, you frighten no one.
每年都有很多人在冒充注册商标行诈。
Měinián dōu yǒu hěnduōrén zài màochōng zhùcè shāngbiāo xíngzhà。
Every year, a lot of people commit crimes by counterfeiting registered brands.
他冒充记者招摇撞骗，诈取了不少钱财。
Tā màochōng jìzhě zhāoyáo zhuàngpiàn，zhàqǔ le bùshǎo qiáncái。
He pretended to be a journalist, and swindled lots of money.
这个店将商品冒充名牌出售。
Zhège diàn jiāng shāngpǐn màochōng míngpái chūshòu.
This store sells products which are passed off as brand names.
冒充
假货冒充正品。
She passed him off as her young brother.
她把他冒充作自己的弟弟。
to pass o.s. off as sth
自己冒充作某物
He passed himself off as an expert.
Tā màochōng yì míng zhuānjiā。
他冒充一名专家。
He passed off the ideas as his own.
Tā bǎ zhèxiē yìjiàn màochōng shì tā zìjǐ de。
他把这些意见冒充是他自己的。
He senses that the woman knows he is   sailing under false colors.
Tā gǎnjué zhège nǚrén zhīdào tā shì màochōng de。
他感觉这个女人知道他是冒充的。
She posed as the czar\'s daughter.
Tā màochōng Kǎisà de nǚer。
她冒充凯撒的女儿。
Cunning men often pass for wise.
Jiǎoxiá de rén jīngcháng màochōng cōngmíngrén。
狡黠的人经常冒充聪明人。
这样冒冒失失去找他可不好。
Zhèyàngmàomaoshīshī qù zhǎo tā kě bùhǎo。
It\'s not appropriate to drop in on him so casually.
冒着枪林弹雨冲锋陷阵
mào zhe qiānglíndànyǔ chōngfēngxiànzhèn
charge under a hail of bullets; charge under heavy fire
我们不是冒险，是出奇制胜！
Wǒmen búshì màoxiǎn，shì chūqízhìshèng！
We wouldn\'t be running any risk; we\'d be winning by means of a surprise attack!
感冒初起
gǎnmào chūqǐ
with the first symptoms of a cold
感冒很容易传染。
Gǎnmào hěn róngyì chuánrǎn。
Colds are highly infectious.
标点符号有逗号、句号、冒号等等。
Biāodiǎn fúhào yǒu dòuhào、jùhào、màohào děngděng。
Punctuation marks are commas, full stops, colons, etc.
动不动就感冒
dòngbudòng jiù gǎnmào
catch cold easily
山区气候多变，小心感冒。
Shānqū qìhou duō biàn，xiǎoxīn gǎnmào。
The weather in the mountains is very changeable. Be careful not to catch cold.
冒风险
mào fēngxiǎn
take risks
患感冒
huàngǎnmào
catch cold; have a cold
郭嫂对女儿每几个月就换男朋友带回家来的做法不感冒。
Guōsǎo duì nǚ\'ér měi jǐgè yuè jiù huàn nánpéngyou dài huí jiā lái de zuòfǎ bùgǎnmào。
Aunt Guo was not happy about her daughter\'s practice of bringing a new boyfriend home every few months.
身体不好，容易感染流行性感冒。
Shēntǐ bùhǎo，róngyì gǎnrǎn liúxíngxìng gǎnmào。
If one is feeling physically low, it\'s easy to catch the flu.
泉水咕嘟咕嘟地往外冒。
Quánshuǐ gūdū gūdū de wǎngwài mào。
The spring kept bubbling up.
我渴得喉咙里冒烟。
Wǒ kě de hóulónglǐ mào yān。
My throat feels parched.
蔫儿不唧地冒坏水
niānrbùjī de mào huàishuǐ
be full of tricks though quiet
他气得两眼直冒火星。
Tā qì de liǎngyǎn zhí mào huǒxīng。
His eyes flashed with anger.

jízào màojìn

谨防假冒。
Jǐnfángjiǎmào。
Beware of imitations.
你的身子也太娇气了，淋这么几滴雨就感冒。
Nǐ de shēnzi yě tài jiāoqì le，lín zhème jǐ dī yǔ jiù gǎnmào。
You\'re really too delicate, catching cold from just a few drops of rain.
感冒了就容易咳嗽。
Gǎnmào le jiù róngyì késòu。
A cold can easily cause a cough.
略微有点感冒
lüèwēi yǒudiǎn gǎnmào

kòngzhì liúxíngxìnggǎnmào de mànyán。

冒泡
mào pào 
send up bubbles; be bubbling
水壶正冒着气。
Shuǐhú zhèngmào zhe qì。
The kettle is giving off steam.
泥浆从地下冒出来。
Níjiāngcóngdìxià mào chūlái。
Mud oozed from underground.
错误思想总是要冒出来的。
Cuòwù sīxiǎngzǒngshì yào mào chūlái de。
Wrong ideas are bound to manifest themselves.
冒着风浪出海
mào zhe fēnglàngchūhǎi 
put to sea in spite of wind and wave; venture out on a stormy sea
冒猜一下
màocāi yíxià
make a bold guess; venture a guess

Kànjiàn nà rén hǎo xiàng shì Lǎo Lǐ，wǒ màohǎn yì shēng。
As he looked very much like Lao Li, I made bold as to call out to him.

màorèn 
lay a false claim to
那人冒称是部长的亲戚。
Nà rén màochēngshì bùzhǎng de qīnqi。

gōngzuòmiàn màodǐng

dà màodǐng

冒犯禁令
màofàn jìnlìng

冒犯尊严
màofàn zūnyán

Gǎigé chūqī，nóngmín hàipà bèi chēngzuò fùyùhù; jīntiān yǐ màofù ér zìháo。
In the early stages of reform, farmers were afraid to be considered well-off, but today they are proud of doing better than average.
他急得直冒汗。
Tā jí de zhí mào hàn。
He was so worried that he kept sweating.

Yǒu huà hǎohāo shuō，mào shénme huǒ！

筐里的土豆装得冒尖儿了。
Kuānglǐ de tǔdòu zhuāng de màojiānr le。

pà màojiānr

她就爱冒尖儿。

She likes to be in the limelight. or She\'s too pushing.
问题一冒尖儿，就及时采取了措施。
Wèntí yí màojiānr，jiù jíshí cǎiqǔ le cuòshī。
Proper measures were taken as soon as the problem cropped up.
我一头撞在门上，眼前直冒金星。
Wǒ yìtóu zhuàngzài mén shàng，yǎnqián zhí mào jīnxīng。
I banged my head on the door and saw stars.

xūbào màolǐng

Wǒ kěyǐ màomèi de tí yígè wèntí ma?

Gǎnmào de shíhou chī dōngxi méiyǒu wèidao。

冒着炎热
mào zhe yánrè
braving the sweltering heat
易患感冒
yì huàn gǎnmào 
catch cold easily; be susceptible to colds
小人有眼不识泰山！ 一时冒渎兄长，望乞恕罪！
Xiǎorén yǒuyǎnbùshítàishān！yìshí màodú xiōngzhǎng，wàngqǐ shùzuì！
I failed to recognize your eminence and I hope that you will forgive me for that blunder.

他一感冒，扁桃腺就会发炎。

These pills have the effect of making one sweat, driving the cold out of your body and guarding you against flu.
如今敢于“冒天下之大不韪”的人已经越来越少了 。

Now we have few people who dare to go against the majority.

He hurried off to visit a friend even as dust, and sand blew outside.
春夜还是很凉的，小心感冒。
Chūnyè háishì hěnliáng de，xiǎoxīn gǎnmào。

这几种感冒药最好单用。
Zhè jǐzhǒng gǎnmàoyào zuìhǎo dānyòng。
These cold cures should be taken separately.
感冒了，你最好多吃淡食。
Gǎnmào le，nǐ zuìhǎo duō chī dànshí。

他今天感冒了，只能低八度进行演唱了。
Tā jīntiān gǎnmào le，zhǐnéng dībādù jìnxíng yǎnchàng le。
Having caught a cold today, he has to sing one octave lower.
天气炎热，他走得顶颠冒汗。
Tiānqì yánrè，tā zǒu de dǐngdiān màohàn。
It was so hot that even the top of his head was sweating as he walked.
入冬以来，天气骤冷，感冒的发病率大增。
Rùdōng yǐlái，tiānqì zhòulěng，gǎnmào de fābìnglǜ dàzēng。
As winter comes and the temperature drops sharply, the number of people who get colds increases a lot.
你今天说话声音有些发闷，是不是感冒了？
Nǐ jīntiān shuōhuà shēngyīn yǒuxiē fāmèn，shìbushì gǎnmào le?
Your voice is a bit muffled, have you got a cold?

Gōngshāngjú gānggāng cháhuò le yì pī fǎngmào shāngpǐn。
The industrial and commercial bureau has just seized an array of fake products.

Tā dé le zhòng gǎnmào，shēngyīn gěngsè。
He has caught a cold, his voice is choked.
你不要冒充鬼物吓唬人了，没人怕你。

Stop pretending to be a ghost, you frighten no one.

我被雨淋得精湿，差点就感冒了。
Wǒ bèi yǔ lín de jīngshī，chàdiǎn jiù gǎnmào le。
I was soaked by rain and nearly caught a cold.

He made an early entrance  in the performance yesterday due to nervousness.
这些骗子都是冒称自己是银行职工进行诈骗的。
Zhèxiē piànzi dōushì màochēng zìjǐ shì yínháng zhígōng jìnxíng zhàpiàn de。
These cheaters swindled under the asssumed names of bank employees.
你再考虑考虑，这样做太冒风险了。

You’d better think it over. It is too risky to do so.
他根本就没有参与这项工作，居然敢冒功领赏。

He has not taken part in the task, yet he dares to take credit and seek awards.
缸里的大米已经装得冒尖了，要再换一个容器了。
Gāng lǐ de dàmǐ yǐjing zhuāng de màojiān le，yào zài huàn yígè róngqì le。

他在班里的学习成绩一直都是冒尖的。
Tā zài bān lǐ de xuéxí chéngjì yìzhí dōushì màojiān de。
He has been top notch in his class.
学校严禁学生们冒名顶替参加考试。
Xuéxiào yánjìn xuéshengmen màomíng dǐngtì cānjiā kǎoshì。
Sitting for an examination by masquerading under a false name is banned in schools.
他没想到我会冒然来访，感到十分惊讶。
Tā méi xiǎngdào wǒ huì màorán láifǎng，gǎndào shífēn jīngyà。
He is very surprised, because he never thought I would visit him without an appointment.
人家现在可是大官了，你不要冒认官亲。

他总是在众人面前冒傻气。
Tā zǒngshì zài zhòngrén miànqián mào shǎqì。
He always acts and speaks like a fool in public.
这个冒失鬼不小心打碎了我的花瓶。
Zhège màoshīguǐ bùxiǎoxīn dǎsuì le wǒ de huāpíng。
The hot head carelessly broke my vase
我一定冒死完成这次冲锋任务。
Wǒ yídìng màosǐ wánchéng zhècì chōngfēng rènwù。
I will risk my life to finish this charge.
保护国有财产，要从防止跑冒滴漏开始！
Bǎohù guóyǒu cáichǎn，yào cóng fángzhǐ pǎomàodīlòu kāishǐ！

这药具有清肺的功效，较适合于热感冒患者服用。

This drug can be used to cool and refresh the lungs and is suitable for people who have caught a heat cold.
感冒了还是多喝些热水吧。
Gǎnmào le háishi duō hē xiē rèshuǐ ba。
Drink more hot water, because you have caught a cold.
做这件事情要冒很大的风险，他慎之又慎。
Zuò zhèjiàn shìqing yào mào hěndà de fēngxiǎn，tā shèn zhī yòu shèn。
It\'s very risky to do this, so he considers it time and again.
入冬以来医院收诊的感冒病人越来越多。
Rùdōng yǐlái yīyuàn shōuzhěn de gǎnmào bìngrén yuèláiyuè duō。
The hospital has taken in and cured more and more patients with colds since the winter.
在没有风的时候，我们可以看到烟囱里冒出的烟是竖直上升的。
Zài méiyǒu fēng de shíhou，wǒmen kěyǐ kàndào yāncōng lǐ màochū de yān shì shùzhí shàngshēng de。
We can see that when there is no wind, smoke from a chimney is straight.
我患了重感冒，浑身酸懒难受。
Wǒ huàn le zhòng gǎnmào，húnshēn suānlǎn nánshòu。
I\'ve caught a heavy cold and feel limp, with aches all over my body.
你看看他的穿着，再听听他说的话，简直就是一个土老冒儿。
Nǐ kànkàn tā de chuānzhuó，zài tīngtīng tā shuō de huà，jiǎnzhí jiùshì yígè tǔlǎomàor。
Look at his clothes, and listen to him speaking. He is really a country bumpkin!
真不明白你的这些妄念是从哪里冒出来的！
Zhēn bùmíngbai nǐ de zhèxiē wàngniàn shì cóng nǎlǐ mào chūlái de！
I really don\'t know where you got these absurd ideas!
这次冒险吉凶未卜，你们都要加倍小心。
Zhècì màoxiǎn jíxiōng wèibǔ，nǐmén dōuyào jiābèi xiǎoxīn。
This adventure is unpredicable, you must take care of yourselves.
你今天是不是感冒了？你的声音好象有点齆鼻哦！
Nǐ jīntiān shìbushì gǎnmào le？Nǐ de shēngyīn hǎo xiàng yǒudiǎn wèngbí o！
You a speaking with a nasal twang, you must have a cold today.
这个班的学生无一例外地被传染了感冒。
Zhège bān de xuésheng wúyī lìwài de bèi chuánrǎn le gǎnmào。
All the students got infected with the cold.
小生不才，多有冒犯，还请姑娘不要见怪。
Xiǎo hēng bùcái，duōyǒu màofàn，hái qǐng gūniang búyào jiànguài。
I am so sorry to offend you, I hope you don\'t mind.
每年都有很多人在冒充注册商标行诈。

患感冒
huàngǎnmào
catch cold; have a cold
郭嫂对女儿每几个月就换男朋友带回家来的做法不感冒。
Guōsǎo duì nǚ\'ér měi jǐgè yuè jiù huàn nánpéngyou dài huí jiā lái de zuòfǎ bùgǎnmào。
Aunt Guo was not happy about her daughter\'s practice of bringing a new boyfriend home every few months.
身体不好，容易感染流行性感冒。
Shēntǐ bùhǎo，róngyì gǎnrǎn liúxíngxìng gǎnmào。
If one is feeling physically low, it\'s easy to catch the flu.

易患感冒
yì huàn gǎnmào 
catch cold easily; be susceptible to colds

Tā gǎnmào le，ātìshēngr búduàn。
He has a cold, and can\'t stop sneezing.
他一感冒，扁桃腺就会发炎。

你今天说话声音有些发闷，是不是感冒了？

Your voice is a bit muffled, have you got a cold?

Tā dé le zhòng gǎnmào，shēngyīn gěngsè。
He has caught a cold, his voice is choked.

感冒了还是多喝些热水吧。

Drink more hot water, because you have caught a cold.

“Catch cold”(伤风，感冒)是习惯用语。
He did not go to school with a cold.
因为感冒，所以他没有去上学。
You\'ll catch a bad cold if you go out today.
如果你今天出去会得重感冒的。

最根本的问题是，没有人想花300元人民币去看一场演唱会。

用餐人均消费五十元人民币。

兑付人民币
duìfù rénmínbì
cash (a cheque, etc.) in Renminbi
把外币兑换成人民币
bǎ wàibì duìhuàn chéng rénmínbì
exchange foreign money for Renminbi
把美元换成人民币
bǎ Měiyuán huànchéng Rénmínbì
convert (or change) U. S. dollars into Renminbi
以人民币为计算单位
yǐ rénmínbì wéi jìsuàn dānwèi

用人民币计价结算
yòngrénmínbì jìjià jiésuàn
use Renminbi for quoting prices and settling accounts

金融货币危机
jīnrónɡ huòbì wēijī
financial and monetary crises

a stringent money market
银根紧的货币市场

货币的价值是由市场机制决定的。
通货膨胀是由于货币供应量供大于求引发的。
Tōnghuò péngzhàng shì yóuyú huòbì gōngyìngliàng gòng dàyú qiú yǐnfā de。
Inflation has been triggered because the currency supply volume exceeds market demand.
High interest rates increased the effective money supply.

高利率增加了硬货币供应量。
由于恶性通货膨胀该国货币大大贬值了。
Yóuyú èxìng tōnghuòpéngzhàng，gāi guó huòbì dàdà biǎnzhí le。
Owing to runaway inflation, that country\'s currency has greatly depreciated.

the functions of money
