to remonetize silver
使银子再作货币通用
a stringent money market
银根紧的货币市场
During the last 6 months the basket of currencies has gained 18%.
在过去的六个月里，一篮子货币获利18%。
Before the Euro was introduced in Germany, the Mark was the common monetary unit.
在欧元引入德国之前，马克是最常用的货币单位。
The £10 (ten pound) note is the second lowest denomination in value.
十英镑纸币是面额倒数第二小的货币。
The dollar symbol &quot;$&quot; is the international sign for money.
美元符号 “$”是国际通用的货币符号。
The standard unit of currency in Russia is the Ruble.
俄罗斯的标准流通货币是卢比。
The company was used as a front for illegal money transactions.
这个公司成了非法货币交易的场所。
They might not accept British money.
他们可能不接受英国货币。
The value of currencies is regulated by the market mechanism.
货币的价值是由市场机制决定的。
The local currency in China is the Renminbi.
中国本土使用的货币是人民币。
&quot;$&quot; is the symbol for dollars in the United States and some other countries.
“$”这一符号，在美国和一些其他国家代表货币单位“元”。
The United Nations is calling on several countries to appreciate their currencies.
Liánhéguó zhèngzài hūyù jǐ gè guójiā tíshēng qí huòbì de jiàzhí。
联合国正在呼吁几个国家提升其货币的价值。
The circulation of money is therefore improved, creating more economic activity.
Huòbì liútōng yīncǐ dédào gǎishàn bìng chuàngzàole gèng duō de jīngjì huódòng。
货币流通因此得到改善并创造了更多的经济活动。
The currency in El Salvador is called the colon.
Sà\'ěrwǎduō de huòbì jiàozuò Kēláng。
萨尔瓦多的货币叫作科郎。
There are no charges for currency conversion or handling.
Huòbì duìhuàn huò chǔlǐ búhuì shōuqǔ fèiyòng。
货币兑换或处理不会收取费用。
The European Commission made its first concrete proposal on monetary union.
Ōuméng Wěiyuánhuì zuò de dì-yī gè jùtǐ jiànyì jiùshì huòbì de tǒngyī le。
欧盟委员会做的第一个具体建议就是货币的统一了。
A single currency zone had operated in the European states since the twentieth century.
Cóng èrshí shìjì kāishǐ ōuzhōu guójiā jiù cǎiyòngle tōngyòng huòbì。
从二十世纪开始欧洲国家就采用了通用货币。
Between May 1986 and May 1991,222 companies issued sterling commercial paper.
Cóng 1986 nián 5 yuè dào 1991 nián 5 yuè，yǒu 222 jiā gōngsī fāxíng yīngbàng huòbì shāngyèpiàojù。
从1986年5月到1991年5月，有222家公司发行英镑货币商业票据。
High interest rates increased the effective money supply.
Gāo lìlǜ zēngjiāle yìng huòbì gōngyìngliàng。
高利率增加了硬货币供应量。
Our currency has inflated enough that coins aren\'t worth anything anymore.
Wǒmen de huòbì yǐjīng tōngzhàng de tài lìhai le，yìngbì gēnběn bùzhí shénme qián le。
我们的货币已经通胀的太厉害了，硬币根本不值什么钱了。
Greek cities kept Greek municipal law and issued their own coinage.
Xīlà chéngshì bǎoliú Xīlà shìzhèng fǎlìng，bìng fābù tāmen gèzì de huòbì。
希腊城市保留希腊市政法令，并发布他们各自的货币。
A premium is deducted from the existing spot rate.
Huòbì tiēxī cóng dāngqián jíqī huìlǜ zhōng kòuchú。
货币贴息从当前即期汇率中扣除。
They changed the currency, so these bills are a dead loss.
Tāmen gǎibiànle huòbì，suǒyǐ zhèxiē chāopiào yǐjīng chéngwéi fèizhǐ。
他们改变了货币，所以这些钞票已经成为废纸。
Investors were lured to money markets by high interest rates.
Tóuzīzhě bèi gāo lìlǜ xīyǐn dào huòbì shìchǎng zhōng。
投资者被高利率吸引到货币市场中。
The dollar is the United States unit of currency.
Měiyuán shì měiguó de huòbìdānwèi。
美元是美国的货币单位。
The weak currency was pegged to the us dollar.
Zhè zhǒng ruòshì huòbì yǔ měiyuán guàgōu。
这种弱势货币与美元挂钩。
He changed his money into francs.
Tā bǎ shǒushàng de huòbì duìhuàn chéngle Fǎláng。
他把手上的货币兑换成了法郎。
Prices tumbled after the devaluation of the currency.
Huòbì biǎnzhí zhīhòu，wùjià bàodiē。
货币贬值之后，物价暴跌。
The countries agreed to conduct their bilateral trade in hard currency，replacing previous barter arrangements.
Gèguó dōu tóngyì yǐ yìnghuòbì kāizhǎn shuāngbiān màoyì，qǔdài yǐqián de shíwù jiāoyì。
各国都同意以硬货币开展双边贸易，取代以前的实物交易。
The problem was to match receivables and payables in the same currency.
Wèntí zàiyú shǐyòng tóngyìzhǒng huòbì shǐ yīngshōukuǎn yǔ yīngfùkuǎn bǎochí pínghéng。
问题在于使用同一种货币使应收款与应付款保持平衡。
There is a desperate shortage of hard cash.
Yìnghuòbì yánzhòng duǎnquē。
硬货币严重短缺。
Monetary unification precipitated the reunification of the German state in October 1990.
Huòbì tǒngyī yùshìle Déguó zài yījiǔjiǔlíng nián de chóngxīn tǒngyī。
货币统一预示了德国在1990年的重新统一。
He earns his living from the interchange of currency.
Tā yǐ huòbì duìhuàn de yíngshēng guòhuó。
他以货币兑换的营生过活。
The country decimalized the currency in 1975.
Zhège guójiā zài 1975 nián bǎ huòbì gǎiwéi shíjìnzhì。
这个国家在1975年把货币改为十进制。
In a bimetallistic system both gold and silver can constitute legal tender.
Zài jīnyín èrběnwèi tǐzhì zhōng，huángjīn hé báiyín kěyǐ gòuchéng fǎdìng huòbì。
在金银二本位体制中，黄金和白银可以构成法定货币。
They monetized the lira.
Tāmen bǎ lǐlā dìngwéi fǎdìnghuòbì。
他们把里拉定为法定货币。
The most obvious example is China\'s monetary and fiscal stimulus.
zuì míngxiǎn de lìzi shì Zhōngguó de huòbì hé cáizhèng cìjī zhèngcè。
最明显的例子是中国的货币和财政刺激政策。
Monetary policy must not neglect asset-price movements.
huòbìzhèngcè juébùnéng hūshì zīchǎn jiàgé zǒushì。
货币政策决不能忽视资产价格走势。
A fully fledged currency requires both a central bank and a Treasury.
wánshàn de huòbì yāoqiú Yāngháng hé Cáizhèngbù liǎngzhě jiānbèi。

一枚古币
yì méi ɡǔbì
an ancient coin
我认识一个收集古币的叔叔，他的收藏非常丰富。

I know an old man who collects ancient coins and possesses an extensive collection.
他收藏了很多古代刀币。
Tā shōucáng le hěnduō gǔdài dāobì。
He has collected plenty of knife money of ancient times.
金锭、银锭、银票曾是古人的货币。

The gold ingot, silver ingot and notes are ancient currencies.
这些金锞子在古代是货币，在现在则成了很好的收藏品。
Zhèxiē jīnkèzi zài gǔdài shì huòbì，zài xiànzài zé chéng le hěnhǎo de shōucángpǐn。
These small gold ingots were money in ancient times, and are precious relics nowadays.
收藏古钱币。
I have never seen before original pieces of eight.
我以前从没见过八个瑞尔的西班牙古银币。
We can not recognise the legend on the ancient coins.
我们认不出来这些古代钱币上刻的文字。

币值稳定
bìzhí wěndìng 
a stable currency
中国政府承诺人民币不贬值。
Zhōngguó zhèngfǔ chéngnuò rénmínbì bùbiǎnzhí。
The Chinese government promised not to devalue Renminbi.
由于恶性通货膨胀该国货币大大贬值了。
Yóuyú èxìng tōnghuòpéngzhàng，gāi guó huòbì dàdà biǎnzhí le。
Owing to runaway inflation, that country\'s currency has greatly depreciated.
纪念币有很强的保存价值和升值空间。
Jìniànbì yǒu hěnqiáng de bǎocún jiàzhí hé shēngzhí kōngjiān。
Commemorative coins strongly retain value and have great potential to appreciate in value.
货币贬值。
物价上涨，货币贬值。
货币增值。
硬币的面值铸在正面。
The impact of the RMB appreciation influences our exports.
人民币升值会对我们的出口造成冲击。

货币的价值是由市场机制决定的。
The United Nations is calling on several countries to appreciate their currencies.

人民币不宜升值。
Our currency has inflated enough that coins aren\'t worth anything anymore.

我们的货币已经通胀的太厉害了，硬币根本不值什么钱了。

A euro was valued at eight point seven yuan at that time.
一欧元当时价值8.7元人民币。

把外币兑换成人民币
bǎ wàibì duìhuàn chéng rénmínbì
exchange foreign money for Renminbi
外币贷款按外币计收利息。
Wàibì dàikuǎn àn wàibì jì shōu lìxi。
Interest on a foreign currency loan shall be computed and charged in foreign currency.
这笔外币折成人民币是多少？
Zhèbǐ wàibì zhéchéngRénmínbì shì duōshǎo? 
How much does this sum of foreign money amount to in Renminbi?
按照规定，国内的企业所有的财务报表都要以人民币为记帐本位币。
Ànzhào guīdìng，guónèi de qǐyè suǒyǒu de cáiwùbàobiǎo dōuyào yǐ rénmínbì wéi jìzhàng běnwèibì。
According to the regulations, the financial reports of all the domestic enterprises have to be kept with Renminbi as the standard accounting unit.
他是个钱币收藏爱好者，在他的藏品中有几张法币。
Tā shì gè qiánbì shōucáng àihàozhě，zài tā de cángpǐn zhōng yǒu jǐzhāng fǎbì。

ancient coin

Chūguó rényuán bìxū xiàng hǎiguān shēnbào qí xiédài chūjìng de wàibì。
Travellers leaving the country must declare the amount of foreign currency they are taking with them.

yígè wǔ fēn de yìngbì

yònɡ yìnɡbì zhīfù

bú duìxiàn zhǐbì

Rénmínbì shàng de ànjì yǒu duōzhǒng xíngshì。
There are many counterfeitproof features on a Renminbi bill.
不同国家规定的本位货币标准是不同的。
Bùtóng guójiā guīdìng de běnwèi huòbì biāozhǔn shì bùtóng de。
The standards for basic unit of a national currency vary by country.
“五一”期间液晶电视大降价，引发消费者持币待购。

银行储币量过多，说明消费者的消费欲望不强。
Yínxíng chǔbìliàng guòduō，shuōmíng xiāofèizhě de xiāofèi yùwàng bùqiáng。
When bank deposits remain high it means that consumers don\'t have strong desire to make purchases.
把人民币打斜看，会发现上面有暗纹。
Bǎ rénmínbì dǎxiékàn，huì fāxiàn shàngmiàn yǒu ànwén。

Zhèjiā shāngchǎng zài wéiguī fāfàng dàibìquàn。
The store is illegally issuing token money.
他收藏了很多古代刀币。
Tā shōucáng le hěnduō gǔdài dāobì。
He has collected plenty of knife money of ancient times.
他在密切关注人民币兑美元的浮动汇率。
Tā zài mìqiè guānzhù rénmínbì duì měiyuán de fúdòng huìlǜ。
He pays close attention to the floating exchange rate of the RMB.
通货膨胀是由于货币供应量供大于求引发的。
Tōnghuò péngzhàng shì yóuyú huòbì gōngyìngliàng gòng dàyú qiú yǐnfā de。
Inflation has been triggered because the currency supply volume exceeds market demand.
我认识一个收集古币的叔叔，他的收藏非常丰富。
Wǒ rènshi yígè shōují gǔbì de shūshu，tā de shōucáng fēicháng fēngfù。
I know an old man who collects ancient coins and possesses an extensive collection.
民国时期，光洋是主要货币。
Mínguó shíqī，guāngyáng shì zhǔyào huòbì。
During the time of the Republic of China, the silver dollar was the major currency.
金锭、银锭、银票曾是古人的货币。

这些金锞子在古代是货币，在现在则成了很好的收藏品。

Tā bùjīngyì bǎ chábēi pèngdǎo le。
He accidentally knocked over a cup.
谁碰到这种事也不免要发牢骚。
Shuí pèngdào zhèzhǒng shì yě bùmiǎn yào fā láosāo。
Anyone in such a situation cannot help but complain.
碰到碗碴儿上，手指头拉了个口子。
Pèngdào wǎnchár shàng，shǒuzhǐtou lá le gè kǒuzi。
I happened to touch the sharp edge of the broken bowl and cut my finger.
到处碰壁
dàochù pèngbì 
run into snags everywhere
碟子碗碰得丁丁当当的。
Diézi wǎn pèng de dingdingdangdang de。
The dishes and bowls slid together with a clatter.
我把茶杯碰翻了。
Wǒ bǎ chábēi pèngfān le。
I knocked the teacup over.
有一回我在路上碰到他。
Yǒu yì huí wǒ zài lùshàngpèngdào tā。
Once, I ran into him in the street.
碰到这种事真是晦气！
Pèngdào zhèzhǒng shì zhēn shì huìqì！
What rotten luck to have this happen to me!
这几个女孩儿碰到一起就唧唧喳喳说个没完。
Zhè jǐgè nǚháir pèngdào yìqǐ jiù jijizhazha shuō gè méiwán。
Whenever these girls get together, they chatter away nonstop.
一大群人磕头碰脑地挤在一起看热闹。
Yídàqúnrén kētóupèngnǎo de jǐ zài yìqǐ kàn rènao。
A large crowd of people are pushing and jostling each other, trying to get a look at the excitement.
碰到严重事情的时候，他的理智总控制不住感情。
Pèngdào yánzhòngshìqing de shíhou，tā de lǐzhì zǒngkòngzhì bú zhù gǎnqíng。
When confronted with a serious matter, his reason always gives way to emotion.
他碰得前额隆起一个大包。
Tā pèng de qián\'é lóngqǐ yígè dà bāo。
He got a bad bump on his forehead.
我在回来的路上碰见了他。
Wǒ zài huílái de lùshàngpèngjiàn le tā。
I came across him on my way back.
这样一味盲干，结果非碰壁不可。
Zhèyàngyíwèi mánggàn，jiéguǒ fēi pèngbì bùkě。
Such rashness is bound to land you in great difficulties.
两人的目光碰到一起。
Liǎngrén de mùguāngpèngdào yìqǐ。
Their eyes met.
碰到这么一个人，你有什么办法？
Pèngdào zhème yígè rén，nǐ yǒu shénme bànfǎ?
What can you do with a person like that?
这件精密仪器，你可别碰。
Zhèjiàn jīngmì yíqì，nǐ kě bié pèng。
Mind you don\'t touch this precision instrument.
把墨水瓶碰翻了
Bǎ mòshuǐpíng pèngfān le。
knock the inkbottle over
头碰在门上
tóu pèngzài mén shàng
bump one\'s head against the door
在街上碰到一个熟人
zài jiē shàngpèngdào yígè shúrén
run into an acquaintance in the street
碰到困难
pèngdào kùnnan
run up against difficulties
我没碰着他。
Wǒ méi pèngzhao tā。
I didn\'t see him.
如果我是你，我就不去碰这个钉子。
Rúguǒ wǒ shì nǐ，wǒ jiù bú qù pèngzhège dīngzi。
If I were you, I wouldn\'t run my head against a brick wall.
碰了个软钉子
pèng le gè ruǎndīngzi
be mildly rebuffed
你猜我昨晚在首都体育馆碰见谁了？
Nǐ cāi wǒ zuó wǎn zài shǒudū tǐyùguǎn pèngjiàn shuí le?
Who do you think I ran into at the Capital Stadium last night?
明天我们还在这儿碰面。
Míngtiān wǒmen hái zài zhèr pèngmiàn。
Let\'s meet here again tomorrow.
我碰巧也在那儿。
Wǒ pèngqiǎo yě zài nàr。
I happened to be there too. or It just so happened that I was there too.
正要送孩子上县医院，碰巧医疗队到村里来了。
Zhèngyào sòngháizi shàngxiànyīyuàn，pèngqiǎo yīliáoduì dào cūn lǐ lái le。
They were going to send the child to the county hospital when a medical team arrived in the village.

juédìngxià cì pèngtóu de shíjiān

Tāmen yí pèngtóu，hěn kuài jiù bǎ wèntí jiějué le。
They put their heads together and promptly solved the problem.

Yí liàngkǎchē cónghòumiàn pèngzhuàng le wǒmen de qìchē。

hépèngzhuàng
nuclear collision
碰撞负载
pèngzhuàngfùzǎi
impact load

Wǎnbiānr shàng pèng le gè quēkǒur。

pèngshàng kùnnan jiù suō bózi

zài shìshí miànqián pèng de tóupòxuèliú 
bump one\'s head against a wall of hard facts

Xǔduō rén pèngdào xiàyǔ tiān jiù wújīngdǎcǎi。

改山造田可是硬碰硬的事。

有一天我在街上碰见他了。
Yǒu yìtiān wǒ zài jiēshàngpèngjiàn tā le。

我们约好下星期一碰头。
Wǒmen yuēhǎo xià xīngqīyī pèngtou。

咱们两点钟左右在大门口碰头，不见不散

他在大街上碰见了老师，一闭眼就过去了。

他一不小心，碰伤了臂肘。

用吹拍的手段来取悦别人，有时也会碰钉子。

他一不小心把玻璃杯碰到地上摔碎了。

He carelessly dropped a glass onto the ground and broke it.

The two double-edged swords crashed and produced a clattering sound.

Shàngbān lùshàng，wǒ gāngqiǎo pèngdào le tā。

开学一个月后，老师们就教学问题开了个碰头会。

A month after the semester began, the teachers held a brief meeting on teaching issues.
前此一个月，我曾在街上碰见过他。

别去黑市交易外汇，免得碰到切汇的人！

在这繁华的大都市，能碰上乡人真不容易。

Yīngér de xìnmén kě bùnéng luànpèng。
The parietal bone of a baby\'s skull cannot be touched.
幸巧碰到你，要不然我真不知道该怎么办。

Fortunately I met you, otherwise I wouldn\'t know what to do.
碰到你我就倒霉，你可真是我的冤孽。

Every time I run into you, I have bad luck. You are really my misfortune.

dig an elbow into someone\'s ribs
用胳膊肘碰碰某人胸口(暗示要他注意)
to try one\'s fortune in another city
在另一城市碰碰运气
My children had all the fun of the fair playing in the bumper cars.
我的几个孩子玩碰碰车，公平比赛，乐趣多多。
No one rides dodgem cars at the amusement park anymore because only one is still working.
游乐园里没人玩碰碰车了，因为只有一辆还没坏。
to try one\'s luck (at sth/at doing sth)
碰碰(某事/做某事的)运气
Her legs brushed up against mine.
Tā de tuǐ qīngqīng de pènglepèng wǒ de tuǐ。
她的腿轻轻地碰了碰我的腿。
Try your luck by all means, just don\'t say we didn\'t warn you.
Nǐ dāngrán kěyǐ qù pèngpèng yùnqì， búguò kě bié shuō wǒmen méi jǐnggào guò nǐ。
你当然可以去碰碰运气，不过可别说我们没警告过你。
You can also have a little gamble on the outcome of the games.
Nǐ kěyǐ zài zhège bǐsài de jiéguǒ shàng dǔ shàng yìbǎ pèngpèng yùnqì。
你可以在这个比赛的结果上赌上一把碰碰运气。
They then have a go in what is presumably a game of chance.
Ránhòu tāmen chángshì le yìbǎ，jīběnshàng zhǐshì qù pèngpèngyùnqì。
然后他们尝试了一把，基本上只是去碰碰运气。

英语的名词可以冠以一个叫做“冠词”的单音节词。
Yīngyǔ de míngcí kěyǐ guàn yǐ yígè jiàozuò“guàncí”de dānyīnjiēcí。
In English a noun may be preceded by a monosyllable called \'article\'.
There are three types of articles, namely the zero article, the indefinite article and the definite article.
冠词分为三种：零冠词，不定冠词和定冠词。
As I\'ve already told you, articles can be classified into definite articles and indefinite articles.
我早就讲过，冠词可以分为定冠词和不定冠词。
&quot;The&quot; is the definite article.
“the”是定冠词。
A and an are indefinite articles, any is an indefinite pronoun.
a和an是不定冠词，any是不定代词。
The test wasn\'t difficult at all, I had to choose the right article for each of the 30 sentences.
考试并不难，我得给三十个句子找出正确的冠词。

jīguānzi
cockscomb

鸡冠子
孔雀冠子

公鸡的鸡冠子颜色鲜红。

The helmet culminated in a crest.
Màozi dǐngshàng yǒu gè guàn。
帽子顶上有个冠。

考试并不难，我得给三十个句子找出正确的冠词。

The infection in your respiratory tract is caused by a coronary virus.
对冠状病毒基因进行排序

cockscomb
这里的棉花产量为全国之冠。

hébàn huāguān
gamopetalous corolla

líbàn huāguān
choripetalous corolla

他居然得了冠军，这是连他自己都梦想不到的事。
Tā jūrán dé le guànjūn，zhè shì lián tā zìjǐ dōu mèngxiǎngbú dào de shì。
His winning of the championship was something he\'d never dreamt of before.

bànshēn miǎnguān zhèngmiàn xiàngpiàn 
a half-length, bareheaded, full-faced photo

yīguān qíchǔ

yānhóng de jīguānhuā

línguān yùbì 
canopy closure
衣冠
yīguān
hat and clothes; dress
树冠
shùguān
crown (of a tree)
鸡冠
jīguān
cockscomb
在这场冠军赛中，我们学校的种子选手被对手逼和。
Zài zhèchǎng guānjūnsài zhōng，wǒmen xuéxiào de zhǒng zi xuǎnshǒu bèi duìshǒu bīhé。
In the championship, our school was forced to a tie.
优秀运动员的目标不仅是夺冠，而且还要创纪录。
Yōuxiù yùndòngyuán de mùbiāo bùjǐn shì duóguān，érqiě háiyào chuàng jìlù。
The goal of an excellent athlete is not only to win but also to break old records.
我国选手包揽了本届亚运会单人滑的冠亚军。
Wǒ guó xuǎnshǒu bāolǎn le běn jiè yàyùnhuì dānrénhuá de guān yàjūn。
Athletes from our country won the first and second place in Canadian single in the Asian Games.
这场比赛，当夜就评选出了冠亚军。
Zhèchǎng bǐsài，dāngyè jiù píngxuǎn chū le guān yàjūn。
The first and the second winners were elected on the night of the contest.
经过一场恶战，大赛的冠军产生了。
Jīngguò yìcháng èzhàn，dàsài de guànjūn chǎnshēng le。
After a fierce competition, it was decided who was the winner.
上次比赛失利后，他发愤图强，总算重新夺冠。
Shàngcì bǐsài shīlì hòu，tā fāfèntúqiáng，zǒngsuàn chóngxīn duóguàn。
After his last loss in a match, he determined to improve himself and regain the championship finally.
考古学家在这座古墓中发现了三顶凤冠。
Kǎogǔxuéjiā zài zhèzuò gǔmù zhōng fāxiàn le sān dǐng fèngguān。
The archeologists found three phoenix coronets in this ancient tomb.
这个冠军该着你拿。
Zhège guànjūn gāizháo nǐ ná。
You should be the champion.
冠盖是个古语，是官吏的意思。
Guāngài shì gè gǔyǔ，shì guānlì de yìsi。
Guangai is an old phrase meaning officials.
冠带褴褛不一定证明你是清廉的。
Guāndài lánlǚ bùyídìng zhèngmíng nǐ shì qīnglián de。
Shabby clothes don\'t necessarily prove that you are free from corruption.
冠带清廉是百姓之福。
Guāndài qīnglián shì bǎixìng zhī fú。
It is very lucky for the common people to have honest and upright government officials.
冠盖在一定程度上能体现这个官员的职位高低。
Guāngài zài yídìng chéngdù shàng néng tǐxiàn zhège guānyuán de zhíwèi gāodī。
The hats and canopies of an official can reflect his position, to some extent.
冠盖聚于朝堂等待君主上朝。
Guāngài jùyú cháotáng děngdài jūnzhǔ shàngcháo。
All the officials are gathering in the imperial court to wait for the emperor.
你的呼吸道感染是由冠状病毒引起的。
Nǐ de hūxīdào gǎnrǎn shì yóu guānzhuàng bìngdú yǐnqǐ de。
The infection in your respiratory tract is caused by a coronary virus.
这家企业取得了全国青年歌手大奖赛的冠名权。
Zhèjiā qǐyè qǔdé le quánguó qīngnián gēshǒu dàjiǎngsài de guànmíngquán。
This enterprise has obtain the naming right of the national youth singing competition.
现在的有些演员经常是冠以振兴传统艺术的名号来做一些有悖艺术道德的事情。
Xiànzài de yǒuxiē yǎnyuán jīngcháng shì guànyǐ zhènxīng chuántǒng yìshù de mínghào lái zuò yìxiē yǒubèi yìshù dàodé de shìqing。
Nowadays, some actors often do things against artistic morals in the name of promoting traditional arts.
他已经20岁了，已到及冠之年，是个大人了。
Tā yǐjing èrshísuì le，yǐdào jíguàn zhī nián，shì gè dàrén le。
He has reached 20 years old and is already an adult.
由于比赛中最后一局的失误，他与冠军失之交臂。
Yóuyú bǐsài zhōng zuìhòu yì jú de shīwù，tā yǔ guànjūn shīzhī jiāobì。
He would have been the champion if he hadn\'t lost the game in the last round.
据说这个金冠是乾隆帝戴过的。
Jùshuō zhège jīnguán shì Qiánlóngdì dàiguò de。
It is said that this gold crown belonged to Emperor Qianlong.
他们十分渴慕那些奥运冠军们。
Tāmen shífēn kěmù nàxiē àoyùn guànjūnmen。
They admire those Olympic title-holders very much.
刘翔是一百一十米跨栏的世界冠军！
Liú Xiáng shì yìbǎyīshímǐ kuàlán de shìjiè guànjūn！
Liu Xiang is the world champion in 110m hurdles.
在战前动员会上，教练激励队员要力搏争取夺冠。
Zài zhànqián dòngyuánhuì shàng，jiàoliàn jīlì duìyuán yào lìbó zhēngqǔ duóguàn。
At the mobilizing meeting before the competition, the coach encouraged the team members to strive for the championship.
这次获得的三连冠是我们全体队员不懈努力的结果。
Zhècì huòdé de sānliánguàn shì wǒmen quántǐ duìyuán búxiè nǔlì de jiéguǒ。
The third consecutive championship obtained this time is the result of persistent efforts by all our team members.
比赛中，这个名不见经传新手爆出了冷门，获得了冠军。
Bǐsài zhōng，zhège míngbújiànjīngzhuàn xīnshǒu bàochū le lěngmén，huòdé le guànjūn。
In the contest, this barely known new hand came to as the sleeper, and won the championship.
这次世界男篮锦标赛的冠军是美国队。
Zhècì shìjiè nánlán jǐnbiāosài de guànjūn shì Měiguóduì。
the team from America won the World Men\'s Basketball Championships.
比赛中国家女篮发挥正常，顺利夺冠。
Bǐsài zhōng guójiā nǚlán fāhuī zhèngcháng，shùnlì duóguàn。
The women\'s basketball team played as normal and won the championship.
这个小姑娘是上届奥运会的平衡木冠军。
Zhège xiǎogūniang shì shàngjiè àoyùnhuì de pínghéngmù guànjūn。
The girl was the champion on the balance beam in the previous Olympic games.
那个王冠上嵌镶着贵重的宝石。
Nàge wángguān shàng qiànxiāng zhe guìzhòng de bǎoshí。
A precious diamond is mounted in that crown.
她以一套漂亮流畅的球操获得了艺术体操大赛的冠军。
Tā yǐ yítào piàoliàng liúchàng de qiúcāo huòdé le yìshù tǐcāo dàsài de guànjūn。
She won the championship of the artistic gymnastics competition with her fluent ball gymnastics.
获得冠军的运动员，举着国旗绕场一周。
Huòdé guànjūn de yùndòngyuán，jǔ zhe guóqí ràochǎng yì zhōu。
The champions will go around the track with their national flags in their hands.
他已经夺得过三次赛船大会的冠军了。
Tā yǐjing duódéguo sān cì sàichuán dàhuì de guànjūn le。
He has already been the champion of the boat race three times.
我们学校在今年的区运动会上首夺综合分数冠军。
Wǒmen xuéxiào zài jīnnián dìqū yùndònghuì shàng shǒuduó zōnghé fēnshù guànjūn。
For the first time, our school got the highest total mark in the district\'s sports meeting this year.
他获得了这届奥运会的挺举冠军。
Tā huòdé le zhè jiè àoyùnhuì de tǐngjǔ guànjūn。
He is the champion in this year\'s Olympics clean and jerk.
经过多年努力，小张终于撷取了大奖赛的桂冠。
Jīngguò duōnián nǔlì，Xiǎo Zhāng zhōng yú xiéqǔ le dàjiǎngsài de guìguàn。
After many years\' efforts, Xiao Zhang finally won the first prize in the game.
他的成绩雄踞积分榜第一名，冠军非他莫属。
Tā de chéngjì xióngjù jīfēnbǎng dìyī míng，guànjūn fēi tā mòshǔ。
His marks top the tally. He must be the champion.
他衣冠楚楚的，其实是个伪君子。
Tā yīguān chǔchǔ de，qíshí shì gè wěijūnzǐ。
He is dressed like a gentleman but he is a hypocrite.
你这个衣冠禽兽就知道欺负女人。
Nǐ zhège yíguàn qínshòu jiù zhīdào qīfu nǚrén。
You are a beast in human attire, you always bully women.
他死后没有找到尸体，只能做了一个衣冠冢。
Tā sǐhòu méiyǒu zhǎodào shītǐ，zhǐnéng zuò le yígè yīguānzhǒng。
They haven\'t found his body, so they just make a cenotaph for him.
她这次能获得大奖赛冠军真是出人意表。
Tā zhècì néng huòdé dàjiǎngsài guànjūn zhēnshì chūrén yìbiǎo。
She was the champion in the competition, it was really quite a surprise.
小明获得冠军，在父老乡亲面前真给他父母长脸。
Xiǎo Míng huòdé guànjūn，zài fùlǎo xiāngqīn miànqián zhēn gěi tā fùmǔ zhǎngliǎn。
Xiaoming has won the championship,  earning great a honor for his parents in front of all the villagers.
她家里有很多样式各异的珠冠。
Tā jiā lǐ yǒu hěnduō yàngshì gè yì de zhūguàn。
There are various kinds of crowns decorated with pearls at her house.
他俩并列冠军。
Tāliǎ bìnglièguànjūn。
They are joint champions.
蝉联奥运会冠军
chánlián àoyùnhuìguànjūn
be the reigning Olympic champion
鸡冠
jīguān
crown
花冠
huāguān
garland
奥运冠军为国增光。
Àoyùnguànjūn wèiguózēngguāng。
Olympic champions bring glory to their country.
桂冠诗人
guìguānshīrén
Poet Laureate
获得冠军
huòdé guànjūn
win the championship
他夸口说自己能得冠军。
Tā kuākǒu shuō zìjǐ néng dé guànjūn.
He boasted that he would become a champion.
力争冠军
lìzhēng guànjūn
fight for the championship
运动会上得了冠军，他高兴得眉飞色舞。
Yùndònghuì shàng déle guànjūn，tā gāoxìng de méifēisèwǔ.
His whole face lit up when he became champion at the athletics meeting.
拿不到冠军也无所谓，不要勉为其难。
Nábúdào guànjūn yě wúsuǒwèi，búyào miǎnwéiqínán.
It doesn\'t matter if you don\'t win first prize – don\'t be attempting the impossible.
全国游泳冠军
Quánguó yóuyǒng guànjūn
national swimming champion
这个球队锐不可当，一举拿下冠军。
Zhège qiúduì ruìbùkědāng，yìjǔ náxià guànjūn。
This team is unstoppable – they won the championship with one bash at it.
上届奥运会冠军意外失手，卫冕失败。
Shàngjiè àoyùnhuì guànjūn yìwài shīshǒu，wèimiǎn shībài。
The previous Olympic champion let the contest slip through his fingers and lost the title.
他夺冠的可能性微乎其微。
Tā duóguàn de kěnéngxìng wēihūqíwēi。
There is very little possibility of his becoming the champion.
他们夺冠的实力无可置疑。
Tāmen duóguàn de shílì wúkězhìyí。
Their ability to win the championship was beyond doubt.
有一次，他得了冠军。
Yǒu yícì，tā déle guànjūn。
He won a prize once.
他不是我们经理，我看你是张冠李戴了。
Tā búshì wǒmen jīnglǐ，wǒ kàn nǐ shì zhāngguānlǐdài le。
He\'s not our manager – you\'re confusing him with someone else.
我们为你获得冠军感到自豪。
Wǒmen wèi nǐ huòdé guànjūn gǎndàozìháo。
We are very proud that you won the championship.

There are three types of articles, namely the zero article, the indefinite article and the definite article.
冠词分为三种：零冠词，不定冠词和定冠词。
As I\'ve already told you, articles can be classified into definite articles and indefinite articles.
我早就讲过，冠词可以分为定冠词和不定冠词。
He won the crown in Paris last month when he beat the Italian champion.
Tā shàng gè yuè zài bālí yíngdéle guìguān，dāngshí tā dǎbàile Yìdàlì guànjūn。
他上个月在巴黎赢得了桂冠，当时他打败了意大利冠军。
to back into a championship
由于对手差错而得冠军
a cardinal\'s cap
(天主教)红衣主教的法冠
&quot;The&quot; is the definite article.
“the”是定冠词。
the head of the class
全班之冠
the neck of tooth
牙齿的齿根与齿冠间部分
a crown studded with jewels
饰满宝石的王冠
to wear the heavyweight crown
戴着沉甸甸的王冠
A and an are indefinite articles, any is an indefinite pronoun.
a和an是不定冠词，any是不定代词。
The test wasn\'t difficult at all, I had to choose the right article for each of the 30 sentences.
考试并不难，我得给三十个句子找出正确的冠词。
Finally we have a winner and she answers to the name of…Karen Walker!
冠军终于诞生了，她的名字就是……卡伦·沃克！
Ann was beside herself with joy when she found out she had won the first prize.
安知道自己获得冠军后欣喜若狂。
She is the hot favorite to win the competition.
她是本场比赛最有希望夺冠的热门选手。
The team members are very happy, they won the championship.
这个队赢得了冠军，使得队员们兴奋异常。
I never saw him dress out of place.
我从未看过到他衣冠不整。
A rooster\'s comb is shiny red.
公鸡的鸡冠子颜色鲜红。
Only one break left to see who will be the world champion.
再一个破发，谁将夺冠就会见分晓了。
Only once in the previous 11 seasons had the Cup holders fallen at the first hurdle.
在过去11季的比赛中，卫冕冠军只在第一个跨栏处摔倒了一次。
He was a 3-time national country dance champion.
他曾3次获得国家级土风舞比赛冠军。
The team was ready for a drive toward the champion.
这个队准备好了为赢得冠军而努力奋斗。
to have a coronary
患冠心病
I\'d like to fight him for the title.
我想与他进行拳击赛争夺冠军头衔。
David is in front in the jockeys\' title race.
大卫在马术冠军赛中居领先位置。
The tree tops are level with the roof.
树冠与屋顶一样高。
His transfer to Manchester United almost guarantees them the championship.
Tā de zhuǎnhuì shǐ mànlián duóguàn shínájiǔwěn。
他的转会使曼联夺冠十拿九稳。
An imperial crown is one of the attributes of a king.
皇冠是国王的标志之一。
John has contested this title with Sam for five years.
约翰已经和萨姆争这个冠军已经五年了。
Ruby is a good singer and she once won the singing contest in her university.
鲁比歌唱得很好，她还得过一次大学的歌唱比赛冠军。
I think one year hence the public will have forgotten Edison Chen\'s scandal.
我认为一年后，公众会忘记陈冠希的丑闻。
Agassi won numerous titles in his tennis career.
阿加西在其网球职业生涯中赢得了无数个冠军。
The winning horse in this race was retained at a high price.
这次比赛中的冠军马以高价被买走了。
Simon rowed a boat race and got first place.
西蒙参加了划船比赛并赢得了冠军。
Ivan\'s great sales technique won him salesman of the month.
伊万出色的销售技能使他成为了当月销售冠军。
The team we will compete with is the champion of last season.
我们的对手是上个赛季的冠军。
His dream is to compete for an Olympic medal.
他的梦想是赢得奥运会冠军。
What his teacher said confirmed his confidence to win the champion.
老师说的一番话坚定了他夺取冠军的信心。
After he TKOed Thomas Damgaard, most people said that he could become a champion.
在他击倒托马斯.达姆加阿德后，多数人说他能成为冠军。
As the winner, John will serve a yearlong term as the official mascot of both the Relays and Drake University.
作为冠军得主，约翰将成为德雷克大学和该校今年的田径运动会的官方吉祥物。
I have been called a lot worse names than that.
Wǒ bèi guànyǐ xǔduō bǐ nà hái zāogāo de míngzi。
我被冠以许多比那还糟糕的名字。
There are some awfully decent people scattered about in the office.
Bàngōngshì lǐ zǒng yǒu yìxiē yīguānqínshòu。
办公室里总有一些衣冠禽兽。
Such a play on emotions could of course be depicted in different ways.
Zhèyàng wánnòng gǎnqíng dāngrán huì bèi guànyǐ duōzhǒng shuōfǎ le。

女孩们不久以后就可以凭着电子魔术的帮助，像触动开关发出咔嗒一声那样简单，随意变换自己的指甲颜色。

Lǚfèi píngpiào bàoxiāo。 
Travelling expenses can be reimbursed on handing in the tickets.

Hǎiguān píng yuán rùjìng shēnbàodān cháyàn fàngxíng。

píng dān fùkuǎn

Kōngkǒuwúpíng，lì zì wéi zhèng。

Kǒushuōwúpíng，lì cǐ wéi jù。

píngjī

We can solve the problem no matter how complicated it is.

习惯作法
xíguàn zuòfǎ 
a habitual practice
我习惯用笔形输入法来编辑手机短信。
Wǒ xíguàn yòng bǐxíng shūrùfǎ lái biānjí shǒujī duǎnxìn.
I am used to typing text messages in Chinese via the forms of strokes, and their combination.
人人要养成遵守法度的习惯，处处严格要求自己。
Rénrén yào yǎngchéng zūnshǒu fǎdù de xíguàn，chùchù yángé yàoqiú zìjǐ。
Everybody should conform to norms and be strict with themselves.
他打乒乓球时习惯用横拍的握法。
Tā dǎ pīngpāngqiú shí xíguàn yòng héngpāi de wòfǎ。
He is used to grasping the paddle horizontally while playing Ping-Pong.
Any derogation of the common law is to be strictly construed.

对习惯法的任何删减必须经过严格的解释。
You\'ll get used to the idea.
Nǐ huì xíguàn zhè zhǒng xiǎngfǎ de。
你会习惯这种想法的。
to become used to certain ways
习惯于某些方法

风俗习惯
fēngsú xíguàn
customs and habits
睡懒觉的坏习惯我已经改掉了。
Shuì lǎnjiào de huàixíguàn wǒ yǐjing gǎidiào le。
I\'ve given up the bad habit of getting up late.
他不习惯戴帽子，一年四季总光着头。
Tā bùxíguàn dài màozi，yìniánsìjì zǒngguāng zhe tóu。
He is not used to wearing a hat and goes bareheaded all year round.
坏习惯
huài xíɡuàn
bad habit
老习惯
lǎoxíɡuàn
an old habit
良好的习惯
liánghǎo de xíguàn 
good habits
去掉盲目性，养成分析的习惯。
Qùdiào mángmùxìng，yǎngchéngfēnxī de xíguàn。
Stop acting blindly and cultivate the habit of analysis.

cóngxiǎo péiyǎnghǎo xíguàn

Zhèyàngcháoshī de tiānqì wǒ shízai bùxíguàn。

别养成抽烟的习惯。
Bié yǎngchéng chōuyān de xíguàn。
Don\'t get into the habit of smoking.
坏习惯一旦养成，需要很长的时间才能根除。
Huài xíguàn yídàn yǎngchéng，xūyào hěn cháng de shíjiān cái nénggēnchú。
A bad habit once contracted takes a very long time to uproot (or root up).
养成良好的习惯
yǎngchéngliánghǎo de xíguàn
cultivate good habits
习惯作法
xíguàn zuòfǎ 
a habitual practice
他有个坏习惯，就是当众扣鼻牛儿。
Tā yǒu gè huàixíguàn，jiùshì dāngzhòng kòu bíniúr。

I always suspect that I have somnambulism.
她习惯于把每天的收入和支出都记录在明细账上。
Tā xíguànyú bǎ měitiān de shōurù hé zhīchū dōu jìlù zài míngxìzhàng shàng。
She is used to recording everyday receipts, and expenditures on in a minute account book.
我很熟稔他的习惯，所以我会照顾好他的。
Wǒ hěnshúrěn tā de xíguàn，suǒyǐ wǒ huì zhàogù hǎo tā de。
I know his habits well, so I\'ll take good care of him.
他有说梦话的习惯，同宿舍的哥们儿们都知道。
Tā yǒu shuō mènghuà de xíguàn，tóng sùshè de gēmenrmen dōu zhīdào。
He often speaks in his dreams, all his dorm-mates know.
生长于朔方，她不习惯南方的生活。
Shēngzhǎng yú shuòfāng，tā bùxíguàn nánfāng de shēnghuó。
Born in the north, she couldn\'t get used to life in the south.
古代的女子手中总是拿着丝帕，在当时是一种习惯。
Gǔdài de nǚzǐ shǒu zhōng zǒngshì ná zhe sīpà，zài dāngshí shì yìzhǒng xíguàn。
It was a custom for ancient girls to hold a silk handkerchief in their hand.
他开会时有随记的好习惯。
Tā kāihuì shí yǒu suíjì de hǎo xíguàn。
He has the good habit of taking notes in meetings.
他总是习惯于按照主观判断来给别人贴标签。
Tā zǒngshì xíguàn yú ànzhào zhǔguān pànduàn lái gěi biérén tiē biāoqiān。
He always labels others according to his own subjective judgment.
睡前温书已成为他多年来的一个习惯。
Shuìqián wēnshū yǐ chéngwéi tā duōniánlái de yígè xíguàn。
He usually takes a long time to revise his lessons before he goes to sleep.
小张有每天晚上坐在屋角温习功课的习惯。
Xiǎo Zhāng yǒu měitiān wǎnshàng zuòzài wūjiǎo wēnxí gōngkè de xíguàn。
Xiao Zhang always revises his lessons at the corner of the house every evening.
由于习惯势力的影响，改革困难重重。
Yóuyú xíguàn shìlì de yǐngxiǎng，gǎigé kùnnan chóngchóng。
The reform is faced with a lot of difficulties due to traditional influence.
每次碰到危险，他都会习惯性地发抖。
Měi cì pèngdào wēixiǎn，tā dōuhuì xíguànxìng de fādǒu。
It is his habit to shiver whenever he is in danger.
我们要从小养成睡前洗漱的好习惯。
Wǒmen yào cóng xiǎo yǎngchéng shuì qián xǐshù de hǎo xíguàn。
We must form the good habit of washing our face, and brushing our teeth before going to bed.
局长刚下任的时候对一切都非常不习惯。
Júcháng gāng xiàrèn de shíhou duì yíqiè dōu fēicháng bùxíguàn。
The director general was not accustomed to everything when he first left his post.
乡人们至今保留着日出而作、日落而息的习惯。
Xiāngrénmen zhìjīn bǎoliú zhe rìchū érzuò、rìluò érxī de xíguàn。
The village people still live a traditional life, going out to work at sunrise and going back home at sunset.
中国人习惯于把蛇称作“小龙”。
Zhōngguórén xíguàn yú bǎ shé chēng zuò xiǎolóng。
Chinese people usually call snakes &quot;small dragons&quot;.
人们习惯把农历十月称为小阳春。
Rénmén xíguàn bǎ nónglì shíyuè chēngwéi xiǎoyángchūn。
People usually call the lunar month of October &quot;the little spring&quot;.
她刚做了新妇，还有点不习惯。
Tā gāng zuò le xīnfù，hái yǒu diǎn bùxíguàn。
She is newly wed and is not used to it yet.
现在没人絮语，反而有点不习惯了。
Xiànzài méi rén xùyǔ，fǎnér yǒudiǎn bùxíguàn le。
I find myself unaccustomed to the present situation where no one prattles on besides me.
好习惯的养成很重要 。
Hǎo xíguàn de yǎngchéng hěn zhòngyào。
It\'s important to develop good habits.
养成教育很重要 ，要注意培养孩子的良好习惯。
Yǎngchéng jiàoyù hěn zhòngyào，yào zhùyì péiyǎng háizi de liánghǎo xíguàn。
Nurturing education is important, we should pay attention to cultivating children\'s good habits.
从小他就有把重要的事都记在月份牌儿上的习惯。
Cóng xiǎo tā jiù yǒu bǎ zhòngyào de shì dōu jìzài yuèfèn páir shàng de xíguàn。
Since young, he has had a habit of writing important things on a calendar.
他习惯用中楷写字。
Tā xíguàn yòng zhōng kǎi xiězì。
He is used to writing in middle-sized script.
少数民族的人们习惯于住在竹楼上。
Shǎoshù mínzú de rénmen xíguànyú zhùzài zhúlóu shàng。
People of some minority nationalities are used to living in bamboo houses.
从一个人的坐姿能看出他平时的习惯。
Cóng yígèrén de zuòzī néng kànchū tā píngshí de xíguàn。
From their sitting postures, you can know people’s habits.
良好的饮食习惯可以预防动脉硬化。
Liánghǎo de yǐnshí xíguàn kěyǐ yùfáng dòngmài yìnghuà。
Good eating habits prevent one from getting arteriosclerosis.
那些习惯于在水银灯下摆造型、做秀的明星们，其实也都有平凡的一面。
Nàxiē xíguànyú zài shuǐyíndēng xià bǎizàoxíng、zuòxiù de míngxīngmen，qíshí yě dōu yǒu píngfán de yímiàn。
Those stars who are used to posing under mercury lamps also have an ordinary side of their lives.
藏族人民有喝酥油茶的习惯，据说有助消化。
Zàngzú rénmín yǒu hē sūyóuchá de xíguàn，jùshuō yǒuzhù xiāohuà。
People of the Zang nationality have the habit of drinking buttered tea, which is said to help digestion.
让我们比较一下两个民族的风俗习惯。
Ràng wǒmen bǐjiàoyíxià liǎnggè mínzúde fēngsúxíguàn。
Let us compare for a moment the customs of the two peoples.
屏弃坏习惯
bǐngqì huàixíguàn
get rid of bad habits
她站着的时候习惯叉腰。
Tā zhànzhede shíhou xíguàn chāyāo。
When she was standing she liked to put her hands on her hips.
他习惯端着碗喝汤。
Tā xíguàn duānzhewǎn hētāng。
When he eats soup, he holds his bowl in both hands.
坏习惯
huài xíguàn
bad habit
譬如饮食习惯，南北各不相同。
Pìrú yǐnshíxíguàn，nánběi gèbùxiāngtóng.
Taking eating habits as an example, there are big differences between the north and the south.
他染上了抽烟喝酒的习惯。
Tā rǎnshàngle chōuyānhējiǔ de xíguàn.
He\'s acquired the habit of smoking and drinking.
他仍然保持着老习惯。
Tā réngrán bǎochízhe lǎo xíguàn.
He still sticks to his old habits.
看书前我习惯先看书目。
Kànshū qián wǒ xíguàn xiān kàn shūmù。
Before reading a book, I normally look at the bibliography.
她睡觉时习惯侧卧。
Tā shuìjiào shí xíguàn cèwò。
She tends to lie on her side when she sleeps.
我习惯早起。
Wǒ xíguàn zǎo qǐ。
I\'m used to getting up early.
他养成了早睡早起的习惯。
Tā yǎngchéngle zǎoshuìzǎoqǐ de xíguàn。
He had formed the habit of going to bed early and getting up early.
得把他这个坏习惯别过来。

He was wont to rise early.

accustomed to obeying orders
习惯于服从命令

这是他(她等)的特点和习惯，他(她等)一向就是这个样子

“Catch cold”(伤风，感冒)是习惯用语。

墨西哥一些当地的风俗习惯仍盛行不衰。

没有吸烟习惯的人可以为自己节省一大笔钱。

中国人不习惯用刀叉，更喜欢用筷子。

她习惯用轻柔的声音讲话。

你习惯煮糙米还是白米？

你咬手指甲的习惯真让我受不了。

她习惯了不为自己辩解。

这是他的习惯，每次刷牙都刷27下。

她有睡前读书的习惯。

New research from Boston University finds that 86 percent of adults carry a store loyalty card and use it, even though cards give stores the right to track consumer purchases.
波士顿大学的最新研究显示，虽然使用会员卡会让商家能追踪到消费者的购物习惯，但还是有高达86%的成年人持有并使用某家商店的会员卡。

医生建议改变我的营养习惯。
I\'ve noticed she has developed some very strange habits.
我发现她染上了一些很奇怪的习惯。

The old lady was accustomed to keeping early hours.

吸烟者习惯于在某些场合点燃烟：和朋友在一起时，饭后，或感到压力太大时。
Smokers always try to make a case for smoking eventhough it is a bad habit.

尽管吸烟是个坏习惯，吸烟者却总试图为吸烟找种种辩解。
He has made a habit of breaking promises.
Tā bù shǒu chéngnuò dōu chéngle xíguàn le。
他不守承诺都成了习惯了。
Don\'t make a habit of it，please.
Qǐng bié yǎngchéng zhè zhǒng xíguàn。
请别养成这种习惯。
He was accustomed to his peers murmuring against his ideas.
Tā xíguàn yú tā de tóngliáo mányuàn tā de yìjiàn le。
他习惯于他的同僚埋怨他的意见了。
I am quite particular about my eating habits.
Wǒ duì yǐnshí xíguàn tèbié yǒu jiǎngjiū。
我对饮食习惯特别有讲究。
We\'re picking up new habits all the time.
Wǒmen búduàn yǎngchéng xīn de xíguàn。
我们不断养成新的习惯。
He had picked up the habit of addressing everyone by their Christian name.
Tā yǎngchéngle xíguàn，zǒng yòng jiāomíng chēnghu biérén。
他养成了习惯，总用教名称呼别人。
The band is accustomed to playing requests for the audience.
Zhège yuèduì xíguàn yú yǎnzòu guānzhòng diǎnbō de jiémù。
这个乐队习惯于演奏观众点播的节目。
Our family has been putting food by for generations.
Jīxù liángshi shì wǒmen jiā jǐ dài yǐlái de xíguàn。
积蓄粮食是我们家几代以来的习惯。
It may even result in a permanent change in habits.
Nà shènzhì kěnéng dǎozhì xíguàn de yǒngjiǔxìng gǎibiàn。
那甚至可能导致习惯的永久性改变。
This will safeguard against students acquiring bad habits.
Zhèyàng nénggòu bìmiǎn xuéshengmen yǎngchéng bùliáng de xíguàn。
这样能够避免学生们养成不良的习惯。
We became accustomed to seeing gaps appearing in the housing.
Wǒmen kāishǐ xíguànyú kànjiàn fángzi chūxiàn lièkǒu。
我们开始习惯于看见房子出现裂口。
Your baby will gradually settle into a routine feeding.
Nǐ de bǎobao huì zhúbù de xíguàn rìcháng yǐnshí。
你的宝宝会逐步地习惯日常饮食。
We had got used to such surprises being sprung on us.
Wǒmen yǐ xíguàn bèi tūrán gàozhī zhèxiē jīngxǐ。
我们已习惯被突然告知这些惊喜。
By now, we had gotten used to such surprises being sprung on us.
Jiézhì mùqián，wǒmen yǐ xíguànyú yǒu rén gàosu wǒmen zhèyàng de jīngxǐ。
截至目前，我们已习惯于有人告诉我们这样的惊喜。
If I don\'t break in my shoes, it won\'t be comfortable.
Rúguǒ wǒ bú qù xíguàn wǒ de xié，tā huì hěn bù shūfu。
如果我不去习惯我的鞋，它会很不舒服。
Electricians get accustomed to occasional shocks.
Diànqì jìshī yǐjīng xíguànle bùshí shòudào diànjī。
电气技师已经习惯了不时受到电击。
The horse was not accustomed to a bit.
Nà pǐ mǎ hái bù xíguàn dài mǎjiáozi。
那匹马还不习惯戴马嚼子。
It is not the local practice to wear shorts to dinner.
Chuān duǎnkù jiùcān bìngfēi dāngdì xíguàn。
穿短裤就餐并非当地习惯。
It was their habit to dine at 7 every evening.
Tāmen xíguàn měiwǎn qīdiǎn zhōng chī wǎnfàn。
他们习惯每晚七点钟吃晚饭。
I\'ve grown accustomed to her face.
Wǒ yǐjīng xíguànle tā de liǎnsè。
我已经习惯了她的脸色。
She had a habit twirling the ends of her hair.
Tā yǒu juǎnqū fàshāo de xíguàn。
她有卷曲发梢的习惯。
Let\'s reinforce good behavior.
Ràng wǒmen gǒnggù hǎoxíguàn。
让我们巩固好习惯。
It was his rule to take a walk before breakfast.
Zǎocān qián sànbù shì tā de xíguàn。
早餐前散步是他的习惯。
Long use had hardened him to it.
Chángjiǔ de xíguàn yǐ ràng tā nénggòu jiānqiáng miànduì。
长久的习惯已让他能够坚强面对。
&quot;I don\'t believe in these customs,&quot; he said sneeringly.
“Wǒ bìng bù xiāngxìn zhèxiē fēngsú xíguàn，”tā qīngmiè de shuō。
“我并不相信这些风俗习惯，”他轻蔑地说。
He had never grown accustomed to the monotony of his work.
Tā cóng wèi xíguàn tā yìchéngbúbiàn de gōngzuò。
他从未习惯他一成不变的工作。
He had a habit of using nouns verbally.
Tā yǒu bǎ míngcí yòngzuò dòngcí de xíguàn。
他有把名词用作动词的习惯。
All people should practice toleration and live together in peace.
Suǒyǒurén dōu yīngdāng xíguànyú róngrěn hé hépíngxiāngchǔ。
所有人都应当习惯于容忍和和平相处。
His new office lacked the spaciousness that he had become accustomed to.
Tā de xīn bàngōngshì méiyǒu tā yǐjīng xíguàn de nàyàng kuānchǎng。
他的新办公室没有他已经习惯的那样宽敞。
It was common practice to lead off the young ones, and teach them bad habits.
Chángjiàn de zuòfǎ shì，wùdǎo hé xiàng niánqīngrén chuánshòu huàixíguàn。
常见的做法是，误导和向年轻人传授坏习惯。
He was famous for the regularity of his habits.
Tā yǐ bǎochízhe shífēn yǒu guīlǜ de xíguàn ér wénmíng。
他以保持着十分有规律的习惯而闻名。
They were used to a climatically different environment.
Tāmen xíguànle bùtóng de qìhòu huánjìng。
他们习惯了不同的气候环境。
Martinis are an acquired taste.

He works in an unsystematic manner.
Tā xíguàn wú xìtǒng de gōngzuò。
他习惯无系统地工作。
The habit of meditation is the basis for all real knowledge.
Chénsī de xíguàn shì huòdé zhēnzhī de jīchǔ。
沉思的习惯是获得真知的基础。
You\'ll get used to the idea.
Nǐ huì xíguàn zhè zhǒng xiǎngfǎ de。
你会习惯这种想法的。
I rarely premeditate, which is a mistake.
Wǒ hěn shǎo yùxiān jìhuà，zhè búshì hǎoxíguàn。
我很少预先计划，这不是好习惯。
I am used to hitchhiking.
Wǒ yǐjīng xíguàn dābiànchē le。
我已经习惯搭便车了。
Any derogation of the common law is to be strictly construed.
Duì xíguànfǎ de rènhé shānjiǎn bìxū jīngguò yángé de jiěshì。
对习惯法的任何删减必须经过严格的解释。
He routinely parked in a no-parking zone.
Tā xíguànxìng de bǎ chē tíng zài le fēi tíngchēqū。
他习惯性地把车停在了非停车区。
He habitually keeps his office door closed.
Tā xíguànxìng de bǎ tā de bàngōngshìmén guānshàng。
他习惯性地把他的办公室门关上。

使习惯定型

你看得惯他这样发脾气吗？
Nǐ kàn de guàn tā zhèyàngfā píqi ma?

这种浪费现象我们看不惯。

她经常无缘无故诟詈养子，邻居们都看不惯了。
Tā jīngcháng wúyuán wúgù gòulì yǎngzǐ，línjūmen dōu kànbùguàn le。

好习惯的养成很重要 。

It\'s important to develop good habits.
坏习惯一旦养成，需要很长的时间才能根除。
Huài xíguàn yídàn yǎngchéng，xūyào hěn cháng de shíjiān cái nénggēnchú。
A bad habit once contracted takes a very long time to uproot (or root up).
从小培养好习惯
cóngxiǎo péiyǎnghǎo xíguàn
develop good habits from childhood days
阅读后反思，是一种亟待培养的阅读习惯。
Yuèdú hòu fǎnsī，shì yìzhǒng jídài péiyǎng de yuèdú xíguàn。
It is an urgently needed reading habit to think over an article after reading it.

yǎngchéngliánghǎo de xíguàn

养成教育很重要 ，要注意培养孩子的良好习惯。
Yǎngchéng jiàoyù hěn zhòngyào，yào zhùyì péiyǎng háizi de liánghǎo xíguàn。
Nurturing education is important, we should pay attention to cultivating children\'s good habits.
人人要养成遵守法度的习惯，处处严格要求自己。

Everybody should conform to norms and be strict with themselves.
她经常无缘无故诟詈养子，邻居们都看不惯了。
Tā jīngcháng wúyuán wúgù gòulì yǎngzǐ，línjūmen dōu kànbùguàn le。
She constantly abused her adopted son for no reason. Even the neighbors couldn\'t stand it.
我们要从小养成睡前洗漱的好习惯。
Wǒmen yào cóng xiǎo yǎngchéng shuì qián xǐshù de hǎo xíguàn。
We must form the good habit of washing our face, and brushing our teeth before going to bed.
他养成了早睡早起的习惯。
Tā yǎngchéngle zǎoshuìzǎoqǐ de xíguàn。
He had formed the habit of going to bed early and getting up early.
小孩子要从小养成使用礼貌用语的习惯。

to slip into a habit/routine
逐渐养成习惯/规律
He had picked up the habit of addressing everyone by their Christian name.

他养成了习惯，总用教名称呼别人。
to learn humility

Don\'t make a habit of it，please.

She eventually became quite well educated，without forming any bad habits.

to get out of/into the habit of doing sth
改掉/养成做某事的习惯
He\'s just got into a bad habit.
Tā gānggāng yǎngchéngle yígè huài xíguàn。
他刚刚养成了一个坏习惯。
Unless you were very dim,you quickly learned to be early and clean.

除非你迟钝之极，否则很快就该养成早起和讲卫生的习惯。
Nutritionally, her new diet is suicide.
Cóng yíngyǎng shàng láishuō，tā xīn de yǐnshíxíguàn jiǎnzhí jiùshì zìshā。
从营养上来说，她新的饮食习惯简直就是自杀。

他养成了独自长途徒步走的习惯。
惯性矩
ɡuànxìnɡjǔ
moment of inertia
他说每句话之前都习惯性地先“啊”一声，这都成他的发语词了。
Tā shuō měi jù huà zhīqián dōu xíguànxìng de xiān“ā”yì shēng，zhè dōu　chéng tā de fāyǔcí le。
He habitually says the function word &quot;ah&quot; whenever he is about to speak.
每次碰到危险，他都会习惯性地发抖。
Měi cì pèngdào wēixiǎn，tā dōuhuì xíguànxìng de fādǒu。
It is his habit to shiver whenever he is in danger.
他总是不修边幅，随性惯了。
Tā zǒngshì bùxiū biānfú，suíxìng guàn le。
He never pays any attention to his appearance, and is used to the carelessness in that respect.
去掉盲目性，养成分析的习惯。
Qùdiào mángmùxìng，yǎngchéngfēnxī de xíguàn。
Stop acting blindly and cultivate the habit of analysis.
我真看不惯他这种唾面自干的懦弱性格。
Wǒ zhēn kànbúguàn tā zhèzhǒng tuòmiàn zìgān de nuòruò xìnggé。
I hate to see his weak personality that makes him simply turn the other cheek.
惯用语用好了能够增强文章的可读性。
Guànyòngyǔ yònghǎo le nénggòu zēngqiáng wénzhāng de kědúxìng。
Appropriate use of habitual sayings can increase an article\'s readability.
惯性。
她习惯性地眨了眨眼睛。
习惯性动作
a heavy/moderate/habitual drinker
过度/适度/习惯性饮酒者
We are in general creatures of habit.
Zǒng de láishuō，wǒmen dōushì xíguànxìng de shēngwù。
总的来说，我们都是习惯性的生物。
He routinely parked in a no-parking zone.
Tā xíguànxìng de bǎ chē tíng zài le fēi tíngchēqū。
他习惯性地把车停在了非停车区。
He habitually keeps his office door closed.
Tā xíguànxìng de bǎ tā de bàngōngshìmén guānshàng。
他习惯性地把他的办公室门关上。
Yet caution cannot be inertia.
rán\'ér，jǐnshèn bùnéng chéngwéi guànxìng。
然而，谨慎不能成为惯性。
This study demonstrates that females do differentiate between males on their shopping habits.

研究表明女性的购物习惯与男性是有差异的。
It may even result in a permanent change in habits.
Nà shènzhì kěnéng dǎozhì xíguàn de yǒngjiǔxìng gǎibiàn。
那甚至可能导致习惯的永久性改变。
In the past they used to use a more lively ball.
Guòqù tāmen xíguàn yòng gèng yǒu tánxìng de qiú。
过去他们习惯用更有弹性的球。

It was a very common practice in those days.
Zài nàgè shíhòu，zhè shì yì zhǒng guànlì。

The Emperor had many precedents to follow from earlier times.

The groom proceeded to draw aside the veil of the bride.
Xīnláng àn guànlì xiānkāi le xīnniáng de miànshā。

惯例是留短发。

惯常的做法
guàncháng de zuòfǎ 
the usual practice; the usual way of doing sth.
虚假招聘惯常的伎俩是先收费后培训，最后毫无音讯。
Xūjiǎ zhāopìn guàncháng de jìliǎng shì xiān shōufèi hòu péixùn，zuìhòu háowú yīnxùn。
A common trick of fake employment is to charge first, offer training and then disappear completely.

After dinner, we usually take a walk to the park.

Guànpá jīngcháng zài rén duō de dìfāng xiàshǒu。

局长刚下任的时候对一切都非常不习惯。

The director general was not accustomed to everything when he first left his post.

那孩子惯得一点人样都没有。

That child is terribly spoiled.
我使不惯刀叉。
Wǒ shǐ bú guàn dāo chā。
I\'m not used to using a knife and fork.

I just can\'t get used to this damp weather.
别养成抽烟的习惯。
Bié yǎngchéng chōuyān de xíguàn。
Don\'t get into the habit of smoking.
这样惯孩子不是心疼他。
Zhèyàngguàn háizi búshì xīnténgtā。
Pampering a child like this is not loving him.
坏习惯一旦养成，需要很长的时间才能根除。
Huài xíguàn yídàn yǎngchéng，xūyào hěn cháng de shíjiān cái nénggēnchú。
A bad habit once contracted takes a very long time to uproot (or root up).
养成良好的习惯
yǎngchéngliánghǎo de xíguàn
cultivate good habits
欧美人用不惯筷子。
Ōuměirén yòngbu guàn kuài zi。
Westerners are not used to eating with chopsticks.
惯于侦看神色的警察
guànyú zhēnkàn shénsè de jǐngchá 
policeman on the watch for suspicious signs
习惯作法
xíguàn zuòfǎ 
a habitual practice
惯常的做法
guàncháng de zuòfǎ 
the usual practice; the usual way of doing sth.
她对爱子有些娇惯。
Tā duì àizǐ yǒuxiē jiāoguàn。
She loves her son so much that she almost spoils him.
爱孩子可以，但千万不能把孩子娇惯成八旗子弟啊。
Ài háizi kěyǐ，dàn qiānwàn bùnéng bǎ háizi jiāoguàn chéng bāqízǐdì a。
There is nothing wrong in loving your children, but don\'t spoil them with a little emperor\'s manner of living.
他有个坏习惯，就是当众扣鼻牛儿。
Tā yǒu gè huàixíguàn，jiùshì dāngzhòng kòu bíniúr。
He has a bad habit, picking his nose in public places.
我习惯用笔形输入法来编辑手机短信。
Wǒ xíguàn yòng bǐxíng shūrùfǎ lái biānjí shǒujī duǎnxìn.
I am used to typing text messages in Chinese via the forms of strokes, and their combination.
他总是不修边幅，随性惯了。
Tā zǒngshì bùxiū biānfú，suíxìng guàn le。
He never pays any attention to his appearance, and is used to the carelessness in that respect.
东方人在吃西餐的时候往往用不惯餐刀。
Dōngfāngrén zài chī xīcān de shíhou wǎngwǎng yòngbúguàn cāndāo。
People from the east are not used to knives and forks when having a western-style meal.
不规律的饮食习惯，经常诱发肠胃病。
Bùguīlǜ de yǐnshí xíguàn，jīngcháng yòufā chángwèibìng。
Irregular eating habits often lead to bowel disorders.
他习惯于每天早起看晨报。
Tā xíguàn yú měitiān zǎoqǐ kàn chénbào。
He is in the habit of getting up early every day, and reading the morning newspaper.
中国人习惯把媒人称之为红娘。
Zhōngguórén xíguàn bǎ méirén chēng zhī wéi hóngniáng。
The Chinese used to call matchmakers &quot;Hong Niang&quot;.
宠惯孩子并不利于他们的成长。
Chǒngguàn háizi bìng búlìyú tāmen de chéngzhǎng。
You shouldn\'t dote on children, for it isn\'t good for their growth.
住惯了大杂院的老人都爱串门子。
Zhùguàn le dàzáyuàn de lǎorén dōu ài chuànménzi。
Old people who used to live in compounds occupied by many households love to drop in on others.
这种纯品咖啡，一般人是喝不惯的。
Zhèzhǒng chúnpǐn kāfēi，yìbān rén shì hē bú guàn de。
This is pure coffee, generally people can\'t get used to it.
他已经习惯了这种粗朴的生活。
Tā yǐjing xíguàn le zhèzhǒng cūpǔ de shēnghuó。
He is used to this kind of simple and plain life.
我向你介绍一下德昂族的风俗习惯吧。
Wǒ xiàng nǐ jièshào yíxià déángzú de fēngsú xíguàn ba。
Let me introduce you to some customs of the De\'ang ethnic minority.
我爷爷习惯了在垫板上写字。
Wǒ yéye xíguàn le zài diànbǎn shàng xiězì。
My grandfather is accustomed to writing on an under board.
她已经习惯了独居生活。
Tā yǐjing xíguàn le dújū shēnghuó。
She is used to a single life.
经常用耳勺子掏耳朵，不是好习惯。
Jīngcháng yòng ěrsháozi tāo ěrduo，bú shì hǎo xíguàn。
It is a bad habit to pick one\'s ears with an earpick.
小强被娇惯坏了，稍有不如意就会发泼。
Xiǎo Qiáng bèi jiāoguàn huài le，shāo yǒu bùrúyì jiùhuì fāpō。
Xiao Qiang was spoilt to such an extent that he made a scene whenever he felt unhappy.
他说每句话之前都习惯性地先“啊”一声，这都成他的发语词了。
Tā shuō měi jù huà zhīqián dōu xíguànxìng de xiān“ā”yì shēng，zhè dōu　chéng tā de fāyǔcí le。
He habitually says the function word &quot;ah&quot; whenever he is about to speak.
人人要养成遵守法度的习惯，处处严格要求自己。
Rénrén yào yǎngchéng zūnshǒu fǎdù de xíguàn，chùchù yángé yàoqiú zìjǐ。
Everybody should conform to norms and be strict with themselves.
别把乱说气话当成习惯，因为语言的锋刃一样可以伤人。
Bié bǎ luànshuō qìhuà dàngchéng xíguàn，yīnwèi yǔyán de fēngrèn yíyàng kěyǐ shāngrén。
Do not make irresponsible remarks, as language is a blade that can hurt people.
这名罪大恶极的惯犯将在这间隔离室被执行死刑。
Zhè míng zuìdàèjí de guànfàn jiāng zài zhè jiān gélíshì bèi zhíxíng sǐxíng。
This hardened criminal of the worst kind is to be executed in this isolated room.
他惯于对对手漫骂攻讦。
Tā guànyú duì duìshǒu mànmà gōngjié.
He often wildly abuses his opponents and exposes their past misdeeds.
她经常无缘无故诟詈养子，邻居们都看不惯了。
Tā jīngcháng wúyuán wúgù gòulì yǎngzǐ，línjūmen dōu kànbùguàn le。
She constantly abused her adopted son for no reason. Even the neighbors couldn\'t stand it.
虚假招聘惯常的伎俩是先收费后培训，最后毫无音讯。
Xūjiǎ zhāopìn guàncháng de jìliǎng shì xiān shōufèi hòu péixùn，zuìhòu háowú yīnxùn。
A common trick of fake employment is to charge first, offer training and then disappear completely.
吃完晚饭，我们惯常去公园散步。
Chīwán wǎnfàn，wǒmen guàncháng qù gōngyuán sànbù。
After dinner, we usually take a walk to the park.
他是个惯盗，已经入狱好几次了。
Tā shì gè guàndào，yǐjing rùyù hǎo jǐ cì le。
He is an incorrigible thief and has been to the jail many times.
他的惯伎，我们早就知道了。
Tā de guànjì，wǒmen zǎo jiù zhīdào le。
We have known this old trick of his for a long time.
惯扒经常在人多的地方下手。
Guànpá jīngcháng zài rén duō de dìfāng xiàshǒu。
Hardened thieves usually steal in places that are crowded with people.
对于惯窃，我们要加大惩罚力度。
Duìyú guànqiè，wǒmen yào jiādà chéngfá lìdù。
We should increase our punishment level for those hardened thieves.
惯用语用好了能够增强文章的可读性。
Guànyòngyǔ yònghǎo le nénggòu zēngqiáng wénzhāng de kědúxìng。
Appropriate use of habitual sayings can increase an article\'s readability.
他惯于在这样的时候做逃兵。
Tā guànyú zài zhèyàng de shíhou zuò táobīng。
He is used to being a deserting soldier under this kind of situation.
这名惯贼多次被捕入狱。
Zhè míng guànzéi duō cì bèibǔ rùyù。
This hardened thief has been in jail many times.
不能对孩子一味惯纵，管教要适当严厉些。
Bùnéng duì háizi yíwèi guànzòng，guǎnjiào yào shìdàng yánlì xiē。
We shouldn\'t spoil the child all the time. Parents should be moderately strict with their children.
过惯了穷日子，突然有钱反而受不了了。
Guòguàn le qióng rìzi，tūrán yǒu qián fǎnér shòubuliǎo le。
Being accustomed to being poor, people can not easily adapt to a wealthy life in a short period of time.
他打乒乓球时习惯用横拍的握法。
Tā dǎ pīngpāngqiú shí xíguàn yòng héngpāi de wòfǎ。
He is used to grasping the paddle horizontally while playing Ping-Pong.
深夜出门，他习惯带上硬物，以求护身。
Shēnyè chūmén，tā xíguàn dàishàng yìngwù，yǐqiú hùshēn。
When he goes out late at night, he is used to carrying hard metal products to protect himself.
花糕的味道，不是所有人都能吃得惯的。
Huāgāo de wèidào，búshì suǒyǒurén dōu néng chīdéguàn de。
The taste of Huagao (a kind of cake) doesn\'t agree with all people.
他是一名回教徒，在生活习惯上和我们不太一样。
Tā shì yìmíng huíjiàotú，zài shēnghuó xíguàn shàng hé wǒmen bú tài yíyàng。
He believe\'s in Islam, so he has different living habits than the rest of us.
也许他的活法我们看不惯，但是他活的很自在。
Yěxǔ tā de huófǎ wǒmen kànbúguàn，dànshì tā huó de hěnzìzài。
Maybe we do not appreciate their living style, but they are enjoying their lives.
阅读后反思，是一种亟待培养的阅读习惯。
Yuèdú hòu fǎnsī，shì yìzhǒng jídài péiyǎng de yuèdú xíguàn。
It is an urgently needed reading habit to think over an article after reading it.
我已经习惯每天去跳集体舞，既简单又轻松。
Wǒ yǐjing xíguàn měitiān qù tiào jítǐwǔ，jì jiǎndān yòu qīngsōng。
I am used to doing group dancing every day, which is simple and relaxing.
奢侈浪费的不良现象真是让人看不惯。
Shēchǐ làngfèi de bùliáng xiàn xiàng zhēnshì ràng rén kànbúguàn。
Nobody can stand the bad phenomenon of luxury and waste.
老领导刚退休，很不习惯这种靠边儿站的生活。
Lǎolǐngdǎo gāng tuìxiū，hěnbùxíguàn zhèzhǒng kàobiānr zhàn de shēnghuó。
The old leader has just retired, he can\'t get used to a powerless life.
她从小节省惯了，买东西的时候有点抠搜！
Tā cóng xiǎo jiéshěng guàn le，mǎidōngxi de shíhou yǒu diǎn kōusōu！
She has been provident since she was young, so she is thrifty in shopping.
口外的人有自己的生活习惯！
Kǒuwài de rén yǒu zìjǐ de shēnghuó xíguàn！
People north of Zhangjiakou have their own habits and customs.
小孩子要从小养成使用礼貌用语的习惯。
Xiǎoháizi yào cóng xiǎo yǎngchéng shǐyòng lǐmào yòngyǔ de xíguàn。
Children should nurture the habit of using courteous formulae since their youth.
我夏天有睡凉枕的习惯。
Wǒ xiàtiān yǒu shuì liángzhěn de xíguàn。
I have the habit of sleeping on a cooling pillow in summer.
我习惯把新衣服上的领条摘下来再穿。
Wǒ xíguàn bǎ xīn yīfu shàng de lǐngtiáo zhāixiàlái zài chuān。
When putting on a new coat, I’m used to plucking off the collar strip first.
晚饭后，我习惯和爸爸妈妈去遛弯儿。
Wǎnfàn hòu，wǒ xíguàn hé bàba māma qù liùwānr。
I am used to taking a walk with my parents after supper.
自从失明以后，他已经慢慢习惯于借助盲杖行走了。
Zìcóng shīmíng yǐhòu，tā yǐjing mànmàn xíguànyú jièzhù mángzhàng xíngzǒu le。
Since losing his eyesight, he has gradually gotten used to walking with a cane.
他习惯于每天夜里提着煤气灯，巡视大院。
Tā xíguànyú měitiān yèlǐ tí zhe méiqìdēng，xúnshì dàyuàn。
He is used to carrying gas lamps and patrolling the yard every night.
我一直怀疑自己有梦游的习惯。
Wǒ yìzhí huáiyí zìjǐ yǒu mèngyóu de xíguàn。
I always suspect that I have somnambulism.
她习惯于把每天的收入和支出都记录在明细账上。
Tā xíguànyú bǎ měitiān de shōurù hé zhīchū dōu jìlù zài míngxìzhàng shàng。
She is used to recording everyday receipts, and expenditures on in a minute account book.
他过惯了穷奢极侈的生活。
Tā guòguàn le qióngshē jíchǐ de shēnghuó。
He is used to living in extreme luxury.
我很熟稔他的习惯，所以我会照顾好他的。
Wǒ hěnshúrěn tā de xíguàn，suǒyǐ wǒ huì zhàogù hǎo tā de。
I know his habits well, so I\'ll take good care of him.
他有说梦话的习惯，同宿舍的哥们儿们都知道。
Tā yǒu shuō mènghuà de xíguàn，tóng sùshè de gēmenrmen dōu zhīdào。
He often speaks in his dreams, all his dorm-mates know.
生长于朔方，她不习惯南方的生活。
Shēngzhǎng yú shuòfāng，tā bùxíguàn nánfāng de shēnghuó。
Born in the north, she couldn\'t get used to life in the south.
古代的女子手中总是拿着丝帕，在当时是一种习惯。
Gǔdài de nǚzǐ shǒu zhōng zǒngshì ná zhe sīpà，zài dāngshí shì yìzhǒng xíguàn。
It was a custom for ancient girls to hold a silk handkerchief in their hand.
他开会时有随记的好习惯。
Tā kāihuì shí yǒu suíjì de hǎo xíguàn。
He has the good habit of taking notes in meetings.
他总是习惯于按照主观判断来给别人贴标签。
Tā zǒngshì xíguàn yú ànzhào zhǔguān pànduàn lái gěi biérén tiē biāoqiān。
He always labels others according to his own subjective judgment.
我真看不惯他这种唾面自干的懦弱性格。
Wǒ zhēn kànbúguàn tā zhèzhǒng tuòmiàn zìgān de nuòruò xìnggé。
I hate to see his weak personality that makes him simply turn the other cheek.
睡前温书已成为他多年来的一个习惯。
Shuìqián wēnshū yǐ chéngwéi tā duōniánlái de yígè xíguàn。
He usually takes a long time to revise his lessons before he goes to sleep.
小张有每天晚上坐在屋角温习功课的习惯。
Xiǎo Zhāng yǒu měitiān wǎnshàng zuòzài wūjiǎo wēnxí gōngkè de xíguàn。
Xiao Zhang always revises his lessons at the corner of the house every evening.
由于习惯势力的影响，改革困难重重。
Yóuyú xíguàn shìlì de yǐngxiǎng，gǎigé kùnnan chóngchóng。
The reform is faced with a lot of difficulties due to traditional influence.
每次碰到危险，他都会习惯性地发抖。
Měi cì pèngdào wēixiǎn，tā dōuhuì xíguànxìng de fādǒu。
It is his habit to shiver whenever he is in danger.
我们要从小养成睡前洗漱的好习惯。
Wǒmen yào cóng xiǎo yǎngchéng shuì qián xǐshù de hǎo xíguàn。
We must form the good habit of washing our face, and brushing our teeth before going to bed.
局长刚下任的时候对一切都非常不习惯。
Júcháng gāng xiàrèn de shíhou duì yíqiè dōu fēicháng bùxíguàn。
The director general was not accustomed to everything when he first left his post.
乡人们至今保留着日出而作、日落而息的习惯。
Xiāngrénmen zhìjīn bǎoliú zhe rìchū érzuò、rìluò érxī de xíguàn。
The village people still live a traditional life, going out to work at sunrise and going back home at sunset.
中国人习惯于把蛇称作“小龙”。
Zhōngguórén xíguàn yú bǎ shé chēng zuò xiǎolóng。
Chinese people usually call snakes &quot;small dragons&quot;.
人们习惯把农历十月称为小阳春。
Rénmén xíguàn bǎ nónglì shíyuè chēngwéi xiǎoyángchūn。
People usually call the lunar month of October &quot;the little spring&quot;.
她刚做了新妇，还有点不习惯。
Tā gāng zuò le xīnfù，hái yǒu diǎn bùxíguàn。
She is newly wed and is not used to it yet.
现在没人絮语，反而有点不习惯了。
Xiànzài méi rén xùyǔ，fǎnér yǒudiǎn bùxíguàn le。
I find myself unaccustomed to the present situation where no one prattles on besides me.
好习惯的养成很重要 。
Hǎo xíguàn de yǎngchéng hěn zhòngyào。
It\'s important to develop good habits.
养成教育很重要 ，要注意培养孩子的良好习惯。
Yǎngchéng jiàoyù hěn zhòngyào，yào zhùyì péiyǎng háizi de liánghǎo xíguàn。
Nurturing education is important, we should pay attention to cultivating children\'s good habits.
从小他就有把重要的事都记在月份牌儿上的习惯。
Cóng xiǎo tā jiù yǒu bǎ zhòngyào de shì dōu jìzài yuèfèn páir shàng de xíguàn。
Since young, he has had a habit of writing important things on a calendar.
他习惯用中楷写字。
Tā xíguàn yòng zhōng kǎi xiězì。
He is used to writing in middle-sized script.
少数民族的人们习惯于住在竹楼上。
Shǎoshù mínzú de rénmen xíguànyú zhùzài zhúlóu shàng。
People of some minority nationalities are used to living in bamboo houses.
从一个人的坐姿能看出他平时的习惯。
Cóng yígèrén de zuòzī néng kànchū tā píngshí de xíguàn。
From their sitting postures, you can know people’s habits.
良好的饮食习惯可以预防动脉硬化。
Liánghǎo de yǐnshí xíguàn kěyǐ yùfáng dòngmài yìnghuà。
Good eating habits prevent one from getting arteriosclerosis.
“按国际惯例办事”现已成为人们的一项共识。
“Àn guójìguànlì bànshì”xiàn yǐ chéngwéi rénmen de yíxiàng gòngshí。
&quot;Following the international practice&quot; has become a general consensus.
那些习惯于在水银灯下摆造型、做秀的明星们，其实也都有平凡的一面。
Nàxiē xíguànyú zài shuǐyíndēng xià bǎizàoxíng、zuòxiù de míngxīngmen，qíshí yě dōu yǒu píngfán de yímiàn。
Those stars who are used to posing under mercury lamps also have an ordinary side of their lives.
藏族人民有喝酥油茶的习惯，据说有助消化。
Zàngzú rénmín yǒu hē sūyóuchá de xíguàn，jùshuō yǒuzhù xiāohuà。
People of the Zang nationality have the habit of drinking buttered tea, which is said to help digestion.
让我们比较一下两个民族的风俗习惯。
Ràng wǒmen bǐjiàoyíxià liǎnggè mínzúde fēngsúxíguàn。
Let us compare for a moment the customs of the two peoples.
屏弃坏习惯
bǐngqì huàixíguàn
get rid of bad habits
她站着的时候习惯叉腰。
Tā zhànzhede shíhou xíguàn chāyāo。
When she was standing she liked to put her hands on her hips.
他习惯端着碗喝汤。
Tā xíguàn duānzhewǎn hētāng。
When he eats soup, he holds his bowl in both hands.
我吃西餐已经惯了。
Wǒ chīxīcān yǐjīng guànle。
I\'m already used to Western food.
他惯用这种方法。
Tā guànyòng zhèzhǒng fāngfǎ。
He often uses this sort of method.
坏习惯
huài xíguàn
bad habit
逃票是他惯用的伎俩。
Táopiào shì tā guànyòng de jìliǎng.
Not buying tickets is his favourite trick.
譬如饮食习惯，南北各不相同。
Pìrú yǐnshíxíguàn，nánběi gèbùxiāngtóng.
Taking eating habits as an example, there are big differences between the north and the south.
他染上了抽烟喝酒的习惯。
Tā rǎnshàngle chōuyānhējiǔ de xíguàn.
He\'s acquired the habit of smoking and drinking.
他仍然保持着老习惯。
Tā réngrán bǎochízhe lǎo xíguàn.
He still sticks to his old habits.
看书前我习惯先看书目。

Wǒ duì yǐnshí xíguàn tèbié yǒu jiǎngjiū。
我对饮食习惯特别有讲究。
We\'re picking up new habits all the time.
Wǒmen búduàn yǎngchéng xīn de xíguàn。
我们不断养成新的习惯。
He had picked up the habit of addressing everyone by their Christian name.
Tā yǎngchéngle xíguàn，zǒng yòng jiāomíng chēnghu biérén。
他养成了习惯，总用教名称呼别人。
The band is accustomed to playing requests for the audience.
Zhège yuèduì xíguàn yú yǎnzòu guānzhòng diǎnbō de jiémù。
这个乐队习惯于演奏观众点播的节目。
Repeat offenders should be punished with severe sentences.
Guànfàn yīnggāi cóngyán pànchǔ。
惯犯应该从严判处。
Our family has been putting food by for generations.
Jīxù liángshi shì wǒmen jiā jǐ dài yǐlái de xíguàn。
积蓄粮食是我们家几代以来的习惯。
It may even result in a permanent change in habits.
Nà shènzhì kěnéng dǎozhì xíguàn de yǒngjiǔxìng gǎibiàn。
那甚至可能导致习惯的永久性改变。
This will safeguard against students acquiring bad habits.
Zhèyàng nénggòu bìmiǎn xuéshengmen yǎngchéng bùliáng de xíguàn。
这样能够避免学生们养成不良的习惯。
We became accustomed to seeing gaps appearing in the housing.
Wǒmen kāishǐ xíguànyú kànjiàn fángzi chūxiàn lièkǒu。
我们开始习惯于看见房子出现裂口。
Your baby will gradually settle into a routine feeding.
Nǐ de bǎobao huì zhúbù de xíguàn rìcháng yǐnshí。
你的宝宝会逐步地习惯日常饮食。
We had got used to such surprises being sprung on us.
Wǒmen yǐ xíguàn bèi tūrán gàozhī zhèxiē jīngxǐ。
我们已习惯被突然告知这些惊喜。
It is inherent in modern management practice that staff should work to defined standards.
Zhè shì xiàndài guǎnlǐ guànlì de gùyǒu zuòfǎ，yuángōng yīng gēnjù jièdìng biāozhǔn xíngshì。
这是现代管理惯例的固有做法，员工应根据界定标准行事。
By now, we had gotten used to such surprises being sprung on us.
Jiézhì mùqián，wǒmen yǐ xíguànyú yǒu rén gàosu wǒmen zhèyàng de jīngxǐ。
截至目前，我们已习惯于有人告诉我们这样的惊喜。
If I don\'t break in my shoes, it won\'t be comfortable.

如果我不去习惯我的鞋，它会很不舒服。
Electricians get accustomed to occasional shocks.
Diànqì jìshī yǐjīng xíguànle bùshí shòudào diànjī。
电气技师已经习惯了不时受到电击。
The horse was not accustomed to a bit.
Nà pǐ mǎ hái bù xíguàn dài mǎjiáozi。
那匹马还不习惯戴马嚼子。
Short haircuts were the regulation.
Guànlì shì liú duǎnfà。
惯例是留短发。

穿短裤就餐并非当地习惯。
Violence is the rule not the exception.
Bàolì shì guànlì érfēi lìwài。
暴力是惯例而非例外。
It was their habit to dine at 7 every evening.
Tāmen xíguàn měiwǎn qīdiǎn zhōng chī wǎnfàn。
他们习惯每晚七点钟吃晚饭。
I\'ve grown accustomed to her face.
Wǒ yǐjīng xíguànle tā de liǎnsè。
我已经习惯了她的脸色。
She had a habit twirling the ends of her hair.
Tā yǒu juǎnqū fàshāo de xíguàn。

Let\'s reinforce good behavior.

Long use had hardened him to it.

长久的习惯已让他能够坚强面对。

&quot;I don\'t believe in these customs,&quot; he said sneeringly.

He had never grown accustomed to the monotony of his work.
Tā cóng wèi xíguàn tā yìchéngbúbiàn de gōngzuò。
他从未习惯他一成不变的工作。
He had a habit of using nouns verbally.
Tā yǒu bǎ míngcí yòngzuò dòngcí de xíguàn。
他有把名词用作动词的习惯。
All people should practice toleration and live together in peace.

His new office lacked the spaciousness that he had become accustomed to.
Tā de xīn bàngōngshì méiyǒu tā yǐjīng xíguàn de nàyàng kuānchǎng。

I don\'t feel entirely settled here.
Wǒ gǎnjué zìjǐ hái méiyǒu zài zhèli dàiguàn。
我感觉自己还没有在这里待惯。
He expressed himself idiomatically.
Tā shǐyòng guànyòngyǔ lái biǎodá zìjǐ de gǎnqíng。
他使用惯用语来表达自己的感情。

Tāmen xíguànle bùtóng de qìhòu huánjìng。

他变得爱发脾气，对什么都看不惯。
Nutritionally, her new diet is suicide.

Indulgent parents risk spoiling their children.

rán\'ér，jǐnshèn bùnéng chéngwéi guànxìng。
然而，谨慎不能成为惯性。

我把晚餐搞砸了，所以我们最后只能去外面吃。

这家餐馆的自助餐供应许多热带水果。

经过三个月的装修，这家餐厅重张开业。

这家餐厅的服务员见了顾客总是待理不理的。

离愁难消，她整日愁眉苦脸的。

The parting sadness vanishes slowly, and she is woebegone all day.
她长了一双柳叶弯眉，十分好看。
Tā zhǎng le yì shuāng liǔyè wānméi，shífēn hǎokàn。
Her long and slender eyebrows are very beautiful.
他一拳把我的眉弓打破了，鲜血直流。
Tā yì quán bǎ wǒ de méigōng dǎpò le，xiānxuè zhíliú。
He punched me and broke my superciliary ridge, drawing blood.
他的眉嵴向外突出，这是他脸上最大的特征。
Tā de méijí xiàng wài tūchū，zhèshì tā liǎnshàng zuìdàde tèzhēng。

坦白

dìshì píngtǎn
smooth terrain

píngtǎn
(of land, etc.) level; even; smooth

按照口头传统，七七节是摩西律法在西奈山诞生的日子.
According to oral tradition, Feast of Weeks was the time of giving the Torah or The Law of Moses at Mount Sinai.
按照口头传统，七七节是摩西律法在西奈山诞生的日子.
Moses is a servant of the Lord and he obeyed the command of God.
摩西是主的仆人，他遵循上帝的命令。
According to oral tradition, Feast of Weeks was the time of giving the Torah or The Law of Moses at Mount Sinai.
按照口头传统，七七节是摩西律法在西奈山诞生的日子.
Moses is lying to you，don\'t listen to him.
Móxī zài piàn nǐ ne，búyào tīng tā de。
摩西在骗你呢，不要听他的。
Moses parted the red sea.
Móxī fēnkāile Hónghǎi。
摩西分开了红海。
Primitive art such as that by grandma moses is often colorful and striking.
Yuánshǐ yìshù——lìrú Móxī chuàngzào de yuánshǐ yìshù，chángcháng fēicháng yǒuqù hé yǐnrén-zhùmù。
原始艺术——例如摩西创造的原始艺术，常常非常有趣和引人注目。
市政府明令禁止摩托车在市区上路，彻底推行摩托车禁行令。
Shìzhèngfǔ mínglìng jìnzhǐ mótuōchē zài shìqū shànglù，chèdǐ tuīxíng mótuōchē jìnxínglìng。
The city government states clearly that motorcars are not allowed to drive in the city proper. It carries out the driving ban thoroughly.
她摩托车都会骑，自行车更不在话下了。
Tā mótuōchē dōuhuì qí，zìxíngchē gèngbúzàihuàxià le。
She can ride a motorcycle, to say nothing of a bicycle.
这摩托车你骑得怎么样？
Zhè mótuōchē nǐ qí de zěnmeyàng?
How do you get on with the motorcycle?
这种摩托车在农村可香了。
Zhèzhǒng mótuōchē zài nóngcūn kě xiāng le。
This type of motorcycle is most popular in the countryside.
前面有摩托车挡道，他只好绕开。
Qiánmiàn yǒu mótuōchē dǎngdào，tā zhǐhǎo ràokāi。
A motorcycle is in the way, so he has to make a detour.
现在带挎斗的摩托车已经不常见了！
Xiànzài dài kuàdǒu de mótuōchē yǐjing bùchángjiàn le！
Motorcycles with sidecars are rare now.
为了保证安全，驾驶摩托车一定要带帽盔。
Wèile bǎozhèng ānquán，jiàshǐ mótuōchē yídìng yào dài màokuī。
To ensure safety, motorbike riders must wear helmets.
他很喜欢骑着摩托车兜风。
Tā hěnxǐhuan qí zhe mótuōchē dōufēng。
He is fond of taking the air on a motorcycle.
他的摩托车不打火。
Tāde mótuōchē bùdǎhuǒ。
His motorbike wouldn\'t start.
一辆摩托车嗖的一声从他身边驶过。
Yíliàng mótuōchē sōu de yìshēng cóng tā shēnbiān shǐguò。
A motorbike whizzed past him.
骑着摩托车四处兜风
摩托车开路。
给邮递员配发摩托车。
轻便摩托车。
骑摩托车要戴头盔。
在列车呼啸而至的一刹那，他终于将摩托车拖出了轨道。
He caught the motorcycles in the full glare of his headlights, braked and slipped purposefully out of the car.
Cóng chēqiándēng lǐ kàndào mótuōchēduì hòu，tā shāzhù chē，wèile táoshēng ér lìjí cóng chē lǐ liūle chūlái。
从车前灯里看到摩托车队后，他刹住车，为了逃生而立即从车里溜了出来。
a motor bicycle
摩托车；机器脚踏车
He can easily afford a new motor bike on his salary, he works as a dentist.
他的工资完全负担得起一辆新摩托车，他是牙医。
It\'s really dangerous motoring around at night.
夜间开着摩托车出行真的很危险。
He inched his motorcycle towards the street corner.
他把摩托车一点儿一点儿移到了街角。
I bet with your machine you can speed a lot!
我敢说有了摩托车你会更快的！
I\'m taking the motorbike in to have it serviced tomorrow.
我把摩托车推进来，以便明天修理。
Have you seen the new type of motorcycle that is everywhere.
你见过现在流行的新款摩托车吗？
I have two cars and one motorcycle.
我有两辆汽车和一辆摩托车。
Somebody told me that Peter is a really good mountain biker.
有人告诉我，彼特是个很棒的山地摩托车车手。
He was supposed to captain the football team until his leg was broken in a motorcycle accident.
在摩托车事故中摔断腿之前，他被认为是这支球队的领军人物。
He flashed by on his new motorcycle.
他骑着新摩托车飞驰而过。
The invention of the motor car revolutionized the world.
摩托车的发明改变了世界。
motorcycle helmet
摩托车头盔

Nowadays, more and more people are driving motor bikes.
Xiànzài，yuèláiyuè duō de rén qí mótuōchē。
现在，越来越多的人骑摩托车。
The motorbike suddenly curved to the right.
Zhè liàng mótuōchē tūrán yòuzhuǎnwān。
这辆摩托车突然右转弯。
The motorbike cut to the right at the crossing.
Mótuōchē zài shízì lùkǒu tūrán yòuzhuǎn。
摩托车在十字路口突然右转。
We motor cycled around the island from beach to beach.
Wǒmen ràozhe zhè zuò dǎo qízhe mótuōchē cóng yí gè hǎitān dào lìng yī gè hǎitān。
我们绕着这座岛骑着摩托车从一个海滩到另一个海滩。
A student showed up carrying a motorcycle helmet and wearing a tough expression.
Yí gè dàizhe mótuōchē tóukuī，biǎoqíng jiānyì de xuésheng chūxiàn le。
一个戴着摩托车头盔，表情坚毅的学生出现了。
He covered the motorbike in a large waterproof.
Tā yòng yí kuài dà de fángshuǐ bù zhēzhù mótuōchē。
他用一块大的防水布遮住摩托车。
The motorcycle has an extreme rake to the front wheel.
Mótuōchē de qiánlún yǒu gè zuìdà de qīngjiǎo。
摩托车的前轮有个最大的倾角。
They blamed his death on a faulty motorcycle engine.
Tāmen bǎ tā de sǐyīn tuīdào chū máobìng de mótuōchē fādòngjī shàng。
他们把他的死因推到出毛病的摩托车发动机上。
She fastened on his body as the motorcycle roared away.
Mótuōchē hūxiàozhe yì líkāi，tā jiù tiēzài le tā shēnshàng。
摩托车呼啸着一离开，她就贴在了他身上。
Jon was introduced to motorcycling by his father.
Fùqīn shǐ Qiáoēn liǎojiěle mótuōchē yùndòng。
父亲使乔恩了解了摩托车运动。
This motorcycle is ticketed for use on a farm.
Zhè liàng mótuōchē bèi zhǐdìng zài nóngchǎng shǐyòng。
这辆摩托车被指定在农场使用。
The motorcycle smashed into the guard rail.
Mótuōchē měng de zhuàngzài fánghùlán shàng。
摩托车猛地撞在防护栏上。
She loves to ride her new motorcycle through town.
Tā xǐhuan qí tā de xīn mótuōchē chuānchéng\'érguò。
她喜欢骑她的新摩托车穿城而过。
Mother crashed the motorbike into the lamppost.
Māma qízhe mótuōchē zhuàngshàngle lùdēng zhùzi。
妈妈骑着摩托车撞上了路灯柱子。
The motorbike veered to the right.
Zhè liàng mótuōchē xiàng yòu zhuǎnwān le。
这辆摩托车向右转弯了。
Motorcycling is a dangerous sport.
Qí mótuōchē shì yí xiàng wēixiǎn de yùndòng。
骑摩托车是一项危险的运动。

驾着摩托艇在海上乘风破浪的感觉，让他觉得很刺激。
Jià zhe mótuōtǐng zài hǎi shàng chéngfēng pòlàng de gǎnjué，ràng tā juédé hěncìjī。
He finds it exciting to ride a motorboat through the sea waves.
他的摩托车不打火。

音乐会上聚集了两百多个摩托党成员，真够吓人的。
Mojo is a famous biker bar.
Mojo是个著名的摩托党酒吧。
Last night, outside the bar, there was a biker gang waiting to jump someone.
昨晚在酒吧外，有一个摩托党帮派埋伏在那儿准备袭击一个人。
Somebody told me that Peter is a really good mountain biker.
有人告诉我，彼特是个很棒的山地摩托车车手。

The motor coughed at the start, but worked perfectly in the end.
摩托启动时发出了咳嗽般的噗噗声，但是后来就运转良好了。
He flashed by on his new motorcycle.
他骑着新摩托车飞驰而过。

摩天大楼
mótiān dàlóu
skyscraper
城市发展真快，才几年呀，就到处都是摩天大楼了！
Chéngshì fāzhǎn zhēnkuài，cái jǐnián ya，jiù dàochù dōushì mótiān dàlóu le！
How rapidly the city developed! In only several years skyscrapers are everywhere.
这幢摩天大楼有50层。
Zhèzhuàng mótiāndàlóu yǒu wǔshícéng。
This skyscraper is 50 floors high.
摩天大楼。
最抢眼的是那座摩天大楼。
The skyscraper rears high over the neighboring buildings.
这座摩天大楼高耸于附近的建筑之中。
The tall skyscraper is dominating over the city.
Mótiāndàlóu fǔshìzhe zhěngzuò chéngshì。
摩天大楼俯视着整座城市。
My child is attracted to tall skyscrapers.
Wǒ de háizi bèi mótiān gāolóu mízhù le。
我的孩子被摩天高楼迷住了。
For a moment she wished she were on the top floor of a very, very high skyscraper.
Shàshíjiān，tā xīwàng tā zài yídòng hěn gāo hěn gāo de mótiāndàlóu de zuì gāocéng。
霎时间，她希望她在一栋很高，很高的摩天大楼的最高层。
The skyscraper dwarfed all of the surrounding buildings.
Zhè zuò mótiāndàlóu shǐ zhōuwéi de jiànzhùwù xiāngxíngjiànchù。
这座摩天大楼使周围的建筑物相形见绌。
Their offices are in a modern skyscraper.
Tāmen de bàngōngshì zài xiàndàihuà de mótiāndàlóu zhōng。
他们的办公室在现代化的摩天大楼中。
Elderly residents could remember the construction of the first skyscraper.
Lǎonián jūmín hái jìdé dì-yī zuò mótiān dàlóu de xiūjiàn。
老年居民还记得第一座摩天大楼的修建。
This skyscraper is the solid materialization of his efforts.
Zhè zuò mótiāndàlóu shì tā de nǔlì de xiànshí tǐxiàn。
这座摩天大楼是他的努力的现实体现。

摩天岭
mótiānlǐng
a mountain ridge towering into the sky; a towering mountain ridge; a cloud-capped mountain
摩天大楼
mótiān dàlóu
skyscraper

This skyscraper is 50 floors high.

mótiāndàshà
skyscraper

lùtú yáoyuǎn 
a long way to go; far away

遥远的将来
yáoyuǎn de jiānglái
the distant (or remote) future
这个传说可以追溯到遥远的过去。

xiāngjù yáoyuǎn
far apart from each other
遥远的将来
yáoyuǎn de jiānglái

The weather forecast shows a cold front across the area.
天气预报显示一股冷锋正在穿越这片地区。
斗争锋芒直指官场腐败。
Dòuzhēngfēngmáng zhízhǐ guānchǎngfǔbài。
The focus of attack is official corruption.
斗争的锋芒
dòuzhēng de fēngmáng
the spearhead of struggle
进行针锋相对的斗争
jìnxíngzhēnfēngxiāngduì de dòuzhēng
wage a tit-for-tat (or blow-for-blow) struggle against
斗争的锋芒指向贪污腐化
进行针锋相对的斗争
jìnxíngzhēnfēngxiāngduì de dòuzhēng
wage a tit-for-tat (or blow-for-blow) struggle against
针锋相对
别把乱说气话当成习惯，因为语言的锋刃一样可以伤人。
Bié bǎ luànshuō qìhuà dàngchéng xíguàn，yīnwèi yǔyán de fēngrèn yíyàng kěyǐ shāngrén。
Do not make irresponsible remarks, as language is a blade that can hurt people.
他言语不多，但却字字句句显出他的机锋。
Tā yányǔ bùduō，dàn què zìzìjùjù xiǎnchū tā de jīfēng。
He doesn\'t speak a lot, but every word shows his wisdom.
语多机锋
他于1993年光荣地加入了少年先锋队。
Tā yú 1993 nián guāngróng de jiārùle shàonián xiānfēngduì。
He became a member of the Young Pioneers in 1993.
先锋队已经出发了，大部队随后也将出发。
Xiānfēngduì yǐjīng chūfāle，dàbùduì suíhòu yě jiāng chūfā。
The avant-couriers have already started, and the majority will follow soon.
少先队员说道：“我们要向雷锋叔叔学习。”
Shàoxiānduìyuán shuōdào:“wǒmen yào xiàng Léi Fēng shūshu xuéxí。”
&quot;We must learn from Uncle Lei Feng,&quot; said the Young Pioneer.

vanguard; van

the brave spirits who pioneered
开拓的勇士们；开路先锋
部队前锋已到达目的地。
Bùduì qiánfēng yǐ dàodá mùdìdì。
The vanguard units have reached the destination.
冷空气的前锋已进入我省。
Lěngkōngqì de qiánfēngyǐ jìnrù wǒ shěng。
The cold front has reached this province.
前锋队员12号带球冲破了包围圈。
Qiánfēng duìyuán shí\'èr hào dàiqiú chōngpò le bāowéiquān。
The forward No.12 broke through the encircling ring with the ball.
老前锋受伤了，教练只能让替补球员取而代之。
Lǎo qiánfēng shòushāngle，jiàoliàn zhǐnéng ràng tìbǔ qiúyuán qǔ\'érdàizhī.
The original forward was injured – the coach had to replace him with a substitute player.
在改革中，他们冲锋在前。
Zài gǎigé zhōng，tāmen chōngfēngzài qián。
They are in the vanguard of the movement for reform.
每次冲锋的时候他都挺身冲在最前面。
Měi cì chōngfēng de shíhou tā dōu tǐngshēn chōngzài zuì qiánmiàn。
In every charge, he is at the front.
前锋
他在国家足球队司职前锋。
我军前锋已突破敌人防线。
我队前锋在球场上十分活跃。
Striker Marcus Smith\'s miss cost them the match.
前锋马库斯·史密斯的失误使他们输掉了这场比赛。
Steven was drafted as a forward for the Chicago Bulls when he was 18.
史蒂文十八岁的时候被选为芝加哥公牛队的前锋。
A basketball team consists of two guards, two forwards and one center.
Yì  zhī lánqiúduì bāokuòle liǎngmíng hòuwèi，liǎng míng qiánfēng hé yì míng zhōngfēng。
一支篮球队包括了两名后卫，两名前锋和一名中锋。
He\'s expected to play up front.
Tā yùjì huì tī qiánfēng。
他预计会踢前锋。
He called a penalty on them when the lineman took a cheap shot at the quarterback.
Dāng nà wèi qiánfēng duìyuán gěi nà gè sìfēnwèishǒu shīyǐ xiǎodòngzuò shí tā gěi tāmen jiàole fá。
当那位前锋队员给那个四分卫手施以小动作时他给他们叫了罚。
He was in the forefront.
Tā shì qiánfēng。
他是前锋。
雷锋式的人物
léifēngshì de rénwù
people of the Lei Feng type
少先队员说道：“我们要向雷锋叔叔学习。”

&quot;We must learn from Uncle Lei Feng,&quot; said the Young Pioneer.
雷锋日记摘抄
Léi Fēnɡ Rìjì zhāichāo
pages (or excerpts) from Lei Feng\'s diary
雷锋精神垂世远久，值得我们学习。
Léifēng jīngshén chuíshì yuǎnjiǔ，zhídé wǒmen xuéxí。
The Leifeng Spirit will be handed down forever and we should all learn from it.
他坚持去敬老院照顾那些无儿无女的老人，大家都说他是活雷锋。
Tā jiānchí qù jìnglǎoyuàn zhàogù nàxiē wúér wúnǚ de lǎorén，dàjiā dōu shuō tā shì huóléifēng。
He perseveres in taking care of elderly people without any children. We all regard him as a living Lei Feng.
神话传说中的雷锋塔其实就坐落在西子湖畔。
shénhuàchuánshuō zhōng de léifēngtǎ qíshí jiù zuòluò zài xīzǐ húpàn。
The Leifeng Tower in the legend is actually located by the side of the West Lake in Hangzhou.
雷锋助人为乐的懿德影响了一代又一代人。
Léifēng zhùrén wéilè de yìdé yǐngxiǎng le yídài yòu yídài rén。
Lei Feng\'s admirable virtue of taking delight in helping people has influenced people from generation to generation.
雷锋助人为乐的精神将永存我们心中！
Léifēng zhùrén wéilè de jīngshén jiāng yǒngcún wǒmen xīn zhōng ！
Leifeng\'s spirit of taking pleasure in helping others will stay in our minds forever!
雷锋嫉恶如仇，他决不会容许这样的事情发生的。
Léi Fēng jí\'èrúchóu，tā jué búhuì róngxǔ zhèyàng de shìqing fāshēng de。
虽然雷锋不在了，可他助人为乐的精神却万古长青！
Suīrán Léi Fēng búzài le，kě tā zhùrénwéilè de jīngshén què wàngǔchángqīng！
Lei Feng is no longer alive, but his spirit will remain fresh forever!
雷锋班。
用雷锋精神教育下一代。

请您将此信收转雷锋班。
雷锋精神光耀神州

我们大学的校队在上一场与对手的交锋中遭遇惨败。

三个星期里，我们一直没有和敌人交锋。
We will battle against the top ranked team.
Wǒmen jiāng hé páimíng dì-yī de duìwu jiāofēng。
我们将和排名第一的队伍交锋。
在民主革命运动中，他是急先锋。
他看准部下的特长，及锋而试，让部下最大限度地发挥自己的能力。
Tā kànzhǔn bùxià de tècháng，jífēng ér shì，ràng bùxià zuì dà xiàndù de fāhuī zìjǐ de nénglì。
He observed his followers\' advantages and granted them appropriate opportunities to give good play to their abilities.

话锋

锋利的钢刀
fēnglì de gāngdāo
a sharp knife
锋利泼辣的笔调
fēnglì pōlà de bǐdiào 
a sharp and pungent style
这刀是好锋口，锋利无比。
Zhè dāo shì hǎo fēngkǒu，fēnglì wúbǐ。
This knife is very sharp.
这把钢刀的刀刃真锋利！
Zhèbǎ gāngdāo de dāorèn zhēn fēnglì！
What a sharp steel knife!
锋利的言辞
fēnglìde yáncí
cutting remarks
它的牙锋利无比。
Tā de yá fēnglì wúbǐ。
Its teeth are razor sharp.
笔锋犀利
bǐfēng xīlì 
write in an incisive style; wield a pointed pen
棋锋犀利
qí fēnɡ xīlì
be a brilliant chess player
谈锋犀利
tánfēnɡ xīlì 
be incisive in conversation
词锋犀利是他文章的最大特点。
Cífēng xīlì shì tā wénzhāng de zuì dà tèdiǎn。
A sharp vigor of style is the major feature of his articles.
这把剑的剑锋很利，真是削铁如泥。
Zhèbǎ jiàn de jiànfēng hěnlì，zhēnshì xiāotiě rú ní。
The sword has sharp blades, and is able to cut anything.
锐利的笔锋
ruìlì de bǐfēng
a sharp pen; a vigorous style
那些追名逐利的人，正是他这次批判的锋芒所向。
Nàxiē zhuīmíng zhúlì de rén，zhèngshì tā zhècì pīpàn de fēngmáng suǒ xiàng。
He is attacking those who strive for vanity and fame.
锋利。

词锋犀利。

a keen knife

unbated lance
锋利的长矛
The blade of the knife is sharp enough to cut through steel.
这把刀的刀片锋利得足以切断钢铁。
We should find something sharp and stick it into it.
我们应该找些锋利的东西插进去。
Be careful Linda, this knife\'s very sharp.
琳达，当心，刀子很锋利。
My finger was torn by the sharp knife.
我的手指被锋利的刀划伤了。

Yòng fēnglì de xiǎodāo jiù néng qīngsōng de guā qù duōyú de zhānjiāo。
用锋利的小刀就能轻松地刮去多余的粘胶。
Tungsten Carbide jaws also benefit from being very sharp without becoming too brittle.
Tànhuà wū è hái déyìyú qí fēnglì，tóngshí yòu búhuì róngyì duànliè。
碳化钨颚还得益于其锋利，同时又不会容易断裂。
If the blade is sharp enough it will cut cleanly.
Rúguǒ dāofēng zúgòu fēnglì，tā jiāng qiē de hěn gāncuì。
如果刀锋足够锋利，它将切得很干脆。
No sharp edges anywhere on the tip so it will not scratch up your screen.
Dǐngduān rènhé yí chù dōu méiyǒu fēnglì de jiān，suǒyǐ tā búhuì guāhuài nǐ de píngmù de。
顶端任何一处都没有锋利的尖，所以它不会刮坏你的屏幕的。
Excess glue can be easily trimmed away by using a sharp knife.
Yòng yì bǎ fēnglì de xiǎodāo jiù kěyǐ qīngsōng qùchú guòliàng de jiāo。
用一把锋利的小刀就可以轻松去除过量的胶。
The cannibal\'s teeth were filed to sharp points.
Shírénzhě de yá bèi móchéng fēnglì de jiānxíng。
食人者的牙被磨成锋利的尖形。
This knife cuts well.
Zhè bǎ dāo hěn fēnglì。
这把刀很锋利。
A sharpened knife cuts more cleanly.
Fēnglì de dāozi nénggòu gèng lìsuo de qiēgē。
锋利的刀子能够更利索地切割。
For five years, he played left wing for Liverpool.
五年来，他一直都是利物浦队的左边锋。
锋利的钢刀
fēnglì de gāngdāo
a sharp knife
这把钢刀真是锋快，用它切肉一点都不费力。
Zhèbǎ gāngdāo zhēnshì fēngkuài，yòng tā qiēròu yìdiǎn dōu bú fèilì。

这把钢刀的刀刃真锋利！

be a brilliant chess player

The outside-left sent the ball into the net with a fast shot just before the whistle blew for full time.

He is a famous Wing for a Spanish football team.
他的这篇文章分析辨难，却又不露锋芒。
Tā de zhèpiān wénzhāng fēnxī biànnán，què yòu búlòu fēngmáng。

这一笔要用藏锋。

他做事情一向藏锋敛锐。
Tā zuòshìqing yí xiàng cángfēng liǎnruì。
He is always very humble.
海里的潮锋迅速向岸边靠近，他快速地跑开了。
Hǎilǐ de cháofēng xùnsù xiàng ànbiān kàojìn，tā kuàisù de pǎokāi le。
When high tide came in, he ran away quickly.
