Cífēng xīlì shì tā wénzhāng de zuì dà tèdiǎn。
A sharp vigor of style is the major feature of his articles.
他词锋一转，我根本反应不过来该说什么。
Tā cífēng yìzhuǎn，wǒ gēnběn fǎnyìng bú guòlái gāi shuō shénme。
After he changed the topic, I really didn\'t know what to say.
不要害怕失败，鼓起精神，准备再试锋镝。
Búyào hàipà shībài，gǔqǐ jīngshén，zhǔnbèi zàishì fēngdī。
Never lose heart, put yourself together and try again!
这把钢刀真是锋快，用它切肉一点都不费力。
Zhèbǎ gāngdāo zhēnshì fēngkuài，yòng tā qiēròu yìdiǎn dōu bú fèilì。
This steel knife is so sharp that you can cut meat with it effortlessly.
那些追名逐利的人，正是他这次批判的锋芒所向。
Nàxiē zhuīmíng zhúlì de rén，zhèngshì tā zhècì pīpàn de fēngmáng suǒ xiàng。
He is attacking those who strive for vanity and fame.
他年轻气盛，年长一些的朋友都劝他不要锋铓太露。
Tā niánqīng qìshèng，niánzhǎng yìxiē de péngyou dōu quàn tā búyào fēngmáng tài lòu。
He is too young, and his older friends advise him not to show off his talents.
别把乱说气话当成习惯，因为语言的锋刃一样可以伤人。
Bié bǎ luànshuō qìhuà dàngchéng xíguàn，yīnwèi yǔyán de fēngrèn yíyàng kěyǐ shāngrén。
Do not make irresponsible remarks, as language is a blade that can hurt people.
这把钢刀的刀刃真锋利！
Zhèbǎ gāngdāo de dāorèn zhēn fēnglì！
What a sharp steel knife!
他坚持去敬老院照顾那些无儿无女的老人，大家都说他是活雷锋。
Tā jiānchí qù jìnglǎoyuàn zhàogù nàxiē wúér wúnǚ de lǎorén，dàjiā dōu shuō tā shì huóléifēng。
He perseveres in taking care of elderly people without any children. We all regard him as a living Lei Feng.
他的冲锋枪吐出一条火蛇为队伍开辟了道路。
Tā de chōngfèngqiāng tǔchū yìtiáo huǒshé wèi duìwu kāipì le dàolù。
Bursts of fire from his sub-machine-gun opened up a path for the army.
我军先锋击溃了敌军的一次次进攻。
Wǒ jūn xiānfēng jīkuì le díjūn de yícìcì jìngōng。
Our pioneers crushed the enemy\'s attacks time and again.
他言语不多，但却字字句句显出他的机锋。
Tā yányǔ bùduō，dàn què zìzìjùjù xiǎnchū tā de jīfēng。
He doesn\'t speak a lot, but every word shows his wisdom.
他看准部下的特长，及锋而试，让部下最大限度地发挥自己的能力。
Tā kànzhǔn bùxià de tècháng，jífēng ér shì，ràng bùxià zuì dà xiàndù de fāhuī zìjǐ de nénglì。
He observed his followers\' advantages and granted them appropriate opportunities to give good play to their abilities.
这把剑的剑锋很利，真是削铁如泥。
Zhèbǎ jiàn de jiànfēng hěnlì，zhēnshì xiāotiě rú ní。
The sword has sharp blades, and is able to cut anything.
我一定冒死完成这次冲锋任务。
Wǒ yídìng màosǐ wánchéng zhècì chōngfēng rènwù。
I will risk my life to finish this charge.
他很想长大以后当个披甲冲锋的军人。
Tā hěnxiǎng zhǎngdà yǐhòu dāng gè pījiǎ chōngfēng de jūnrén。
He wants awfully to be a soldier who puts on a suit of armor and charges at the enemy when he grows up.
他的文章峭直，很有锋芒。
Tā de wénzhāng qiàozhí，hěnyǒu fēngmáng。
His articles are upright and stern, full of ability.
冲锋号响起时，战士们都舍生忘死地冲向敌阵。
Chōngfēnghào xiǎngqǐ shí，zhànshìmen dōu shěshēngwàngsǐ de chōngxiàng dízhèn。
When the charge rang out, the soldiers dashed towards the enemy lines without hesitating.
司号员的冲锋号一吹响，我们的战士像洪水一般冲向了敌人的阵营。
Sīhàoyuán de chōngfēnghào yì chuīxiǎng，wǒmen de zhànshì xiàng hóngshuǐ yìbān chōng xiàng le dírén de zhènyíng。
The moment the bugler sounded the charge, our soldiers rushed towards the enemy\'s positions like a flood.
每次冲锋的时候他都挺身冲在最前面。
Měi cì chōngfēng de shíhou tā dōu tǐngshēn chōngzài zuì qiánmiàn。
In every charge, he is at the front.
神话传说中的雷锋塔其实就坐落在西子湖畔。
shénhuàchuánshuō zhōng de léifēngtǎ qíshí jiù zuòluò zài xīzǐ húpàn。
The Leifeng Tower in the legend is actually located by the side of the West Lake in Hangzhou.
每当冲锋陷阵时，我们的战士都十分勇敢。
Měidāng chōngfèng xiànzhèn shí，wǒmen de zhànshì dōu shífēn yǒnggǎn。
Our soldiers are very brave in fighting battles.
雷锋助人为乐的懿德影响了一代又一代人。
Léifēng zhùrén wéilè de yìdé yǐngxiǎng le yídài yòu yídài rén。
Lei Feng\'s admirable virtue of taking delight in helping people has influenced people from generation to generation.
雷锋助人为乐的精神将永存我们心中！
Léifēng zhùrén wéilè de jīngshén jiāng yǒngcún wǒmen xīn zhōng ！
Leifeng\'s spirit of taking pleasure in helping others will stay in our minds forever!
连长在冲锋枪的掩护下冲到了敌人的碉堡下面。
Liánzhǎng zài chōngfēngqiāng de yǎnhù xià chōngdào le dírén de diāobǎo xiàmiàn。
Under submachine gun cover, the company commander rushed forward to the foot of the enemy\'s blockhouse.
雷锋嫉恶如仇，他决不会容许这样的事情发生的。
Léi Fēng jí\'èrúchóu，tā jué búhuì róngxǔ zhèyàng de shìqing fāshēng de。
他于1993年光荣地加入了少年先锋队。
Tā yú 1993 nián guāngróng de jiārùle shàonián xiānfēngduì。
He became a member of the Young Pioneers in 1993.
虽然雷锋不在了，可他助人为乐的精神却万古长青！
Suīrán Léi Fēng búzài le，kě tā zhùrénwéilè de jīngshén què wàngǔchángqīng！
Lei Feng is no longer alive, but his spirit will remain fresh forever!
先锋队已经出发了，大部队随后也将出发。
Xiānfēngduì yǐjīng chūfāle，dàbùduì suíhòu yě jiāng chūfā。
The avant-couriers have already started, and the majority will follow soon.

冒着枪林弹雨冲锋陷阵
mào zhe qiānglíndànyǔ chōngfēngxiànzhèn
charge under a hail of bullets; charge under heavy fire
Automatics are illegal to own in almost every country.
Chíyǒu chōngfēngqiāng jīhū zài suǒyǒu de guójiā dōushì wéifǎ de。
持有冲锋枪几乎在所有的国家都是违法的。
His body was riddled with bullets from the Skorpion.
Tā de shēnshàng bùmǎnle xiēshì chōngfēngqiāng zǐdàn chuān de kǒng。
他的身上布满了蝎式冲锋枪子弹穿的孔。
连长在冲锋枪的掩护下冲到了敌人的碉堡下面。
Liánzhǎng zài chōngfēngqiāng de yǎnhù xià chōngdào le dírén de diāobǎo xiàmiàn。
Under submachine gun cover, the company commander rushed forward to the foot of the enemy\'s blockhouse.
每次冲锋的时候他都挺身冲在最前面。
Měi cì chōngfēng de shíhou tā dōu tǐngshēn chōngzài zuì qiánmiàn。
In every charge, he is at the front.
冲锋号响起时，战士们都舍生忘死地冲向敌阵。
Chōngfēnghào xiǎngqǐ shí，zhànshìmen dōu shěshēngwàngsǐ de chōngxiàng dízhèn。
When the charge rang out, the soldiers dashed towards the enemy lines without hesitating.
司号员的冲锋号一吹响，我们的战士像洪水一般冲向了敌人的阵营。
Sīhàoyuán de chōngfēnghào yì chuīxiǎng，wǒmen de zhànshì xiàng hóngshuǐ yìbān chōng xiàng le dírén de zhènyíng。
The moment the bugler sounded the charge, our soldiers rushed towards the enemy\'s positions like a flood.
打退敌人的冲锋
dǎtuì dírén de chōngfēng
beat back the enemy assault
在改革中，他们冲锋在前。
Zài gǎigé zhōng，tāmen chōngfēngzài qián。
They are in the vanguard of the movement for reform.
冒着枪林弹雨冲锋陷阵
mào zhe qiānglíndànyǔ chōngfēngxiànzhèn
charge under a hail of bullets; charge under heavy fire
他的冲锋枪吐出一条火蛇为队伍开辟了道路。
Tā de chōngfèngqiāng tǔchū yìtiáo huǒshé wèi duìwu kāipì le dàolù。
Bursts of fire from his sub-machine-gun opened up a path for the army.
我一定冒死完成这次冲锋任务。
Wǒ yídìng màosǐ wánchéng zhècì chōngfēng rènwù。
I will risk my life to finish this charge.
他很想长大以后当个披甲冲锋的军人。
Tā hěnxiǎng zhǎngdà yǐhòu dāng gè pījiǎ chōngfēng de jūnrén。
He wants awfully to be a soldier who puts on a suit of armor and charges at the enemy when he grows up.
每当冲锋陷阵时，我们的战士都十分勇敢。
Měidāng chōngfèng xiànzhèn shí，wǒmen de zhànshì dōu shífēn yǒnggǎn。
Our soldiers are very brave in fighting battles.

Qiánfēng duìyuán shí\'èr hào dàiqiú chōngpò le bāowéiquān。

我们的队伍朝着山上冲锋。
The battle began with a cavalry charge.
Zhàndòu shì cóng qíbīng chōngfēng kāishǐ de。
战斗是从骑兵冲锋开始的。
左边锋疾射入网，恰在此时鸣笛终场。
Zuǒbiānfēngjí shè rùwǎng，qià zài cǐ shí míngdí zhōng chǎng。
The outside-left sent the ball into the net with a fast shot just before the whistle blew for full time.
他是西班牙足球队有名的边锋。
Tā shì Xībānyá zúqiúduì yǒu míng de biānfēng。
He is a famous Wing for a Spanish football team.
边锋开出的一记角球给了队友非常好的机会。
biān fēng kāi chū de yī jì jiǎo qiú gěi le duì yǒu fēi cháng hǎo de jī huì。
The winger sent a corner kick and gave a good opportunity to his teammates.
海里的潮锋迅速向岸边靠近，他快速地跑开了。
Hǎilǐ de cháofēng xùnsù xiàng ànbiān kàojìn，tā kuàisù de pǎokāi le。
When high tide came in, he ran away quickly.
For five years, he played left wing for Liverpool.
五年来，他一直都是利物浦队的左边锋。
My coach put me on the end position.

我的教练把我安排在边锋的位置上。
I played on the end during my years in college.
Dàxué qījiān，wǒ tī biānfēng。
大学期间，我踢边锋。
He plays right wing for the Canadian national team.
Tā shì Jiānádà guójiāduì de yòubiānfēng。
他是加拿大国家队的右边锋。
The tight end made a great reception on the 20 yard line.

那个近边锋在20码线处非常出色地接住了球。
The right tackle is a straight a student.
Yòu nèi biānfēng háishì gè xuésheng。
右内边锋还是个学生。

锐利的笔锋
ruìlì de bǐfēng
a sharp pen; a vigorous style
这一笔要用藏锋。

Inside the pagoda in the backyard of the temple, there lay the remains of the dignitary.
这位僧人旨在传布佛教。

僧人们在默诵佛号。

她独自一人像苦行僧一样住在一间小房子里。

shōuzhī xiāngdǐ

dàdǐ xiāngtóng

pínɡxiǎn dǐkànɡ
make use of a strategic vantage point to fight back
死力抵抗
sǐlì dǐkàng
resist with might and main; fight tooth and nail
各人的体质不同，对疾病的抵抗力也不同。
Gè rén de tǐzhì bùtóng，duì jíbìng de dǐkànglì yě bùtóng。
People\'s constitutions differ; so does their resistance to disease.
消极抵抗(防御)
xiāojí dǐkànɡ(fánɡyù)
passive resistance (defence)
新陈代谢是宇宙间普遍的永远不可抵抗的规律。
Xīnchéndàixiè shì yǔzhòu jiān pǔbiàn de yǒngyuǎn bùkě dǐkàng de guīlǜ。
The supersession of the old by the new is a general, eternal and inviolable law of the universe.
增加抵抗力
zēnɡjiā dǐkànɡlì
build up one\'s resistance to disease
经常锻炼身体，能够提高人体的抵抗力。
Jīngcháng duànliàn shēntǐ，nénggòu tígāo réntǐ de dǐkànglì。
Regular physical exercises can strengthen one\'s resistance against illness.
他没有抵抗住糖衣炮弹的袭击，被犯罪分子拉下了水。
Tā méiyǒu dǐkàng zhù tángyī pàodàn de xíjī，bèi fànzuìfènzǐ lāxià le shuǐ。
He failed to resist the sugarcoated bullet, and was dragged into crime by hardcore criminals.
皇帝亲自统带军队抵抗外敌。
Huángdì qīnzì tǒngdài jūnduì dǐkàng wàidí。
The emperor himself led his army to defend against the offensive from outside.
侵略者遭到了各地团练的顽强抵抗。
Qīnlüèzhě zāodào le gè dì tuánliàn de wánqiáng dǐkàng。
Invaders encountered dogged defense by local armies organized by landlords all over the country.
如果侵略者再犯，我们会誓死抵抗！
Rúguǒ qīnlüèzhě zàifàn，wǒmen huì shìsǐ dǐkàng！
If the invaders dare to come once again, we swear to fight against them until the last minute.
我们应该坚持锻炼以增强对疾病的抵抗力。
Wǒmen yīnggāi jiānchíduànliàn yǐ zēngqiáng duì jíbìngde dǐkànglì。
We should take exercise to build up resistance to disease.

增强抵抗力。
to lower one\'s resistance
削弱抵抗力
to offer resistance
抵抗
token resistance
象征性的抵抗

敌人有可能发起进攻，因此我们需要做好抵抗准备。

他负责拖延和抵抗敌人的进攻。
I\'d suggest you button up for the freezing weather outside.
我建议你扣紧衣服，抵抗外面寒冷的天气。

离弃了家人后，他前往中亚并加入了抵抗组织。
a defence against sth
对某物的抵抗力
passive resistance

to put up resistance/a fight

纳粹军队在苏联遭到了顽强的抵抗。

这种药物增强了他对疾病的抵抗力。

她抵抗不住诱惑，吃光了整盒冰淇淋。

安抵拉萨
āndǐ Lāsà（Lhasa）
arrive in Lhasa safely (or safe and sound)
百般抵赖
bǎibān dǐlài 
try by every means to deny
收支相抵，净存两千元。
Shōuzhī xiāngdǐ，jìng cún liǎngqiān yuán。
The accounts show a surplus of 2,000 yuan.
大抵相同
dàdǐ xiāngtóng 
basically the same; more or less alike
大凡坚持锻炼的，身体抵抗力都比较强。
Dàfán jiānchí duànliàn de，shēntǐ dǐkànglì dōu bǐjiào qiáng。
Generally those who exercise regularly have high resistance to disease.
用手抵着下巴颏儿
yòng shǒu dǐ zhe xiàbākēr 
prop one\'s chin in one\'s hands
用东西把门抵住，别让风刮开。
Yòng dōngxi bǎ mén dǐzhù，bié ràng fēng guākāi。
Prop something against the door so that it won\'t blow open.
抵住来自外面的压力
dǐzhù láizì wàimiàn de yālì 
withstand the pressure from outside
用房屋做抵
yòng fángwū zuò dǐ 
mortgage a house
以定金抵作价款
yǐ dìngjīn dǐzuò jiàkuǎn 
balance the deposit against the price
干活他一个能抵我们两个。
Gànhuó tā yí ge néng dǐ wǒmen liǎng gè。
He can do the work of two of us
日内抵京
rìnèi dǐ jīng 
will arrive in Beijing in a day or two
用货物抵偿欠款
yòng huòwù dǐcháng qiànkuǎn 
give merchandise in payment for a debt
抵偿损失
dǐcháng sǔnshī 
compensate for (or make good) a loss

yǔ fǎlǜ xiāng dǐchù 
contravene (or go against) the law
抵触情绪
dǐchù qíngxù 
resentment; resistance

dǐdǎng fēnghán 
keep out the wind and the cold

dǐdǎng hóngshuǐ

dǐdǎng tūrán xíjī

fènqǐ dǐkàng

增强对疾病的抵抗力
zēngqiáng duì jíbìng de dǐkànglì

不容抵赖
bùróng dǐlài 
brook no denial
事实是抵赖不了的。
Shìshí shì dǐlài bùliǎo de。
Denying the facts is futile. or Facts cannot be denied.

dǐxiāo yǐngxiǎng 
offset an influence
抵消药物的作用
dǐxiāo yàowù de zuòyòng 
counteract the effect of a medicine

yǐ mǒuwù zuò dǐyā 
raise a mortgage on sth.; leave sth. as a pledge

dǐyù qīnlüè

抵御自然灾害
dǐyù zìrán zāihài

jiànlì fángfēnglíndài dǐyù fēngshā de qīnxí 
build a shelter belt against sandstorms
抵制会议
dǐzhì huìyì 
boycott a meeting

Jīngcháng xǐ lěngshuǐzǎo kěyǐ dǐyù fēnghán。
Taking cold baths regularly can heighten one\'s resistance to colds.

Shōuzhī liǎnɡdǐ。 
Income and expenditure balance each other. or The account balances out.
凭险抵抗
pínɡxiǎn dǐkànɡ
make use of a strategic vantage point to fight back
证据确凿，不容抵赖。
Zhèngjù quèzáo，bùróngdǐlài。
The evidence is conclusive and brooks no denial.
收支相抵，略有剩余。
Shōuzhī xiāng dǐ，lüè yǒu shèngyú。
The reckoning up of revenue and expenditure shows a small surplus.
收支相抵
shōuzhī xiāngdǐ
break even
死力抵抗
sǐlì dǐkàng
resist with might and main; fight tooth and nail
损益相抵。
Sǔnyì xiāng dǐ。
The gains offset the losses.
各人的体质不同，对疾病的抵抗力也不同。
Gè rén de tǐzhì bùtóng，duì jíbìng de dǐkànglì yě bùtóng。

dǐyù wàiwǔ

xiāojí dǐkànɡ(fánɡyù)

dǐmìng
pay with one\'s life (for a murder, etc.); a life for a life

你们俩还抵不上他一个人干得多呢。
Nǐmen liǎ hái dǐbúshàng tā yígèrén gàn de duō ne。
He has done more than both of you have done together.
这幅画的价钱抵得上那辆汽车。
Zhèfúhuà de jiàqián dǐdéshàng nà liàng qìchē。
The price of this painting is almost the same as that of the car.
他为了抵还贷款，只能把房子卖掉了。

In order to pay back the loan, he had no choice but to sell the house.

These goods are not enough to offset the whole loan.

Tā bǎ qìchē mài le，dǐjiǎo le quánbùdàikuǎn。
He sold his car and paid off all the loan.
抵近那座高山，可以发现有一座寺庙。

on-the-job training
孩子们在父母和老师的培育下健康成长。
Háizimen zài fùmǔ hé lǎoshī de péiyù xià jiànkāng chéngzhǎng。
Nurtured and educated by their parents and teachers, the children are growing up healthy and strong.
关于安培表的用法，我请教了电工师傅，可还是不懂。
Guānyú ānpéibiǎo de yòngfǎ，wǒ qǐngjiào le diàngōng shīfu，kě háishi bùdǒng。
I have consulted with the electrician about using an ampere meter, but I still don\'t get it.
他业绩这么好，也不枉你对他的培养。
Tā yèjì zhème hǎo，yě bùwǎng nǐ duì tā de péiyǎng。
His outstanding performance makes him worthy of your cultivation.
我们不能只关心孩子智力因素的训练，而忽略了非智力因素的培养。
Wǒmen bùnéng zhǐ guānxīn háizi zhìlì yīnsù de xùnliàn，ér hūlüè le fēizhìlì yīnsù de péiyǎng。
We should concern ourselves with the intellectual factors as well as the non-intellectual ones of our children.
培养高层劳动者是大学教育的目标。
Péiyǎng gāocéng láodòngzhě shì dàxué jiàoyù de mùbiāo。
The goal of college education is to develop high level workers.
西藏公学为培养少数民族的人才做了巨大贡献。
Xīzàng gōngxué wèi péiyǎng shǎoshù mínzú de réncái zuò le jùdà gòngxiàn。
The public school in Tibet has made a great contribution to the education of minority groups.
虚假招聘惯常的伎俩是先收费后培训，最后毫无音讯。
Xūjiǎ zhāopìn guàncháng de jìliǎng shì xiān shōufèi hòu péixùn，zuìhòu háowú yīnxùn。
A common trick of fake employment is to charge first, offer training and then disappear completely.
微生物课上，我们试着培养黑霉。
Wēishēngwù kè shàng，wǒmen shì zhe péiyǎng hēiméi。
We try to incubate black mould in biology class.
阅读后反思，是一种亟待培养的阅读习惯。
Yuèdú hòu fǎnsī，shì yìzhǒng jídài péiyǎng de yuèdú xíguàn。
It is an urgently needed reading habit to think over an article after reading it.
这些蒸米、麴、水、酵母等原料是用来培养酒母的。
Zhèxiē zhēngmǐ、qū、shuǐ、jiàomǔ děng yuánliào shì yònglái péiyǎng jiǔmǔ de。
This steamed rice, yeast, water, etc, is used to develop distiller\'s yeast.
新的一期培训班，将于下个学期开班。
Xīn de yì qī péixùnbān，jiāngyú xià gè xuéqī kāibān。
A new training course will begin next semester.
上个月的那次科贸博览会上，成交了许多科学栽培技术项目。
Shàng gè yuè de nà cì kēmào bólǎnhuì shàng，chéngjiāo le xǔduō kēxué zāipéi jìshù xiàng mù。
In the scientific trade expo last month, many deals on scientific training items were closed.
立字为证并不代表我不相信你，我们只是在培养自我保护的意识。
Lìzì wéizhèng bìng bú dàibiǎo wǒ bùxiāngxìn nǐ，wǒmen zhǐshì zài péiyǎng zìwǒ bǎohù de yìshí。
To make a written warrant doesn\'t mean I don\'t believe you. We are just fostering our sense of self-protection.
每年我院都要对领导班子进行培训。
Měinián wǒ yuàn dōuyào duì lǐngdǎo bānzi jìnxíng péixùn。
The leadership groups are trained in our college every year.
我要参加明天的培训班，学习新路规。
Wǒ yào cānjiā míngtiān de péixùnbān，xuéxí xīn lùguī。
I’ll attend the training class tomorrow to learn new railway rules and regulations.
这些试验菌种在培养基里生长得十分迅速。

These experimental bacteria grow fast in culture medium.

An experiment of growing plants in artificial soil is being conducted in the laboratory.
这次集体活动的主要目的是培养学生们的国家荣誉感。
Zhècì jítǐ huódòng de zhǔyào mùdì shì péiyǎng xuéshengmen de guójiā róngyùgǎn。
The main purpose of this collective activity is to instill a sense of national honor in the students.
种植韭黄必须采用软化栽培技术。
Zhòngzhí jiǔhuáng bìxū cǎiyòng ruǎnhuà zāipéi jìshù。
To plant leeks, the softening planting skill must be adopted.
你要培养自己坚强的意志，不要成为弱者。
Nǐ yào péiyǎng zìjǐ jiānqiáng de yìzhì，bú yào chéngwéi ruòzhě。
You should cultivate yourself to be strong-minded. Don\'t become a weak person.
种树的时候，一定要先把树苗竖直了再培土。
Zhòngshù de shíhou，yídìng yào xiān bǎ shùmiáo shùzhí le zài péitǔ。
While planting trees, we must first make sure that the sapling is upright, and then add earth.

Wǒmen yào búduàn de péiyǎng zìjǐ de sībiàn nénglì、duànliàn sībiànxìng sīwéi。
We should keep on developing our ability to think logically and exercise speculative thinking.
我思前想后还是决定参加这个培训。
Wǒ sīqián xiǎnghòu háishì juédìng cānjiā zhège péixùn。
After much consideration, I decided to attend this training.

A voltammeter is consisted of a voltmeter and an ammeter.
伏安计是由伏特表和安培表组成的。
A voltammeter is a device for measuring voltage or amperage.
伏安计是用于测量电压和安培数的仪器。

a 13 amp plug

shuìhòu huándài
after-tax payment of loans
税后利润
shuìhòu lìrùn
after-tax profit
实现对纳税人税前、税中和税后的全方位服务。
before/after tax
税前/后
How much does your wife take home after taxes and other deductions?
Kòuchú shuìkuǎn hé qítā kòujiǎn xiàngmù hòu，nǐ lǎopo néng nádào duōshǎo qián？
扣除税款和其他扣减项目后，你老婆能拿到多少钱？
Homes in our town are reappraised every five years and taxes are increased accordingly.
Zài wǒmen de chéngshì，měi wǔnián duì jiātíng chóngxīn pínggū yí cì cáichǎn，ránhòu yǐcǐ wéi biāozhǔn jìnxíng zhēngshuì。
在我们的城市，每五年对家庭重新评估一次财产，然后以此为标准进行征税。
After training they became productive taxpaying citizens.
Jīngguò péixùn zhīhòu tāmen dōu biànchéngle duō chǎn de nàshuì gōngmín。
经过培训之后他们都变成了多产的纳税公民。
The tax collector assessed 3 million dollars as the legacy tax.
税收官征收了三百万的遗产税。
The tax collector assesses the tax amount by the assets of the company.
税收官根据这家公司的资产拟定了税收金额。
revenue agent
税务局官员
身为税务人员，有义务向纳税人介绍有关税收的知识。
Shēn wéi shuìwù rényuán，yǒu yìwù xiàng nàshuìrén jièshào yǒuguān shuìshōu de zhīshi。
As taxation officials, you have the responsibility to introduce to tax-payers knowledge of tax collection.
这种东西关税很重。
Zhèzhǒng dōngxi guānshuì hěnzhòng。
The duty on this sort of goods is awfully high.
不同国家实行保护关税的目的不同。
Bùtóng guójiā shíxíng bǎohù guānshuì de mùdì bùtóng。
Different countries adopt protective tariffs for different purposes.
关税壁垒的减少使中国商品的竞争力大增。
Guānshuì bìlěi de jiǎnshǎo shǐ Zhōngguó shāngpǐn de jìngzhēnglì dàzēng。
The reduction in tariff barriers has greatly increased the competitiveness of Chinese merchandise.

huòmiǎn guānshuì
be exempt from import duty

táobìguānshuì

关税
关税
经济全球化，关税壁垒减少。
a protective tariff
(对进口物资征收的)保护(性)关税
The government increased the tariff on imported vehicles to protect its own vehicle industry.
政府提高了进口车辆的关税，来保护本国汽车制造业。
Vietnam tried to protect the steel industry by raising the steel import tariff.
越南试图通过提高钢铁进口关税来保护钢铁业。
According to the clause, we should have tariff preferrence.
根据这项条款，我们应该享有关税优惠待遇。
The government will place tariffs on all imports.
Zhèngfǔ jiāng duì suǒyǒu jìnkǒu chǎnpǐn zhēngshōu guānshuì。
政府将对所有进口产品征收关税。
All imported goods will be taxed.
Suǒyǒu jìnkǒushāngpǐn jūn xū jiǎonà guānshuì。
所有进口商品均须缴纳关税。
The car market was strong enough to absorb extra duties.
Jiàochē shìchǎng fēicháng jiāntǐng，zúyǐ chéngshòu éwài guānshuì。
轿车市场非常坚挺，足以承受额外关税。
You will have to pay customs on the value being declared.
Nǐ jiāng bìxū wèi shēnbào de jiàzhí zhīfù guānshuì。
你将必须为申报的价值支付关税。
Tariffs in the past have been among the lowest in the country.
Yǐqián de jìnchūkǒu guānshuì shì zhège guójiā de zuìdī shuǐpíng de shuì le。
以前的进出口关税是这个国家的最低水平的税了。
I have never paid import duties on these overseas postal purchases.
Wǒ cónglái méiyǒu wèi zhèxiē hǎiwài yóudì cǎigòu zhīfù guò jìnkǒu guānshuì。
我从来没有为这些海外邮递采购支付过进口关税。
Thirty percent of all tariff peaks protect the food industry.
Suǒyǒu guānshuì gāofēng de bǎifēnzhī sānshí yòngyú bǎohù shípǐn gōngyè。
所有关税高峰的30%用于保护食品工业。
In the past, the UK consistently voted against such duties.
Guòqù，Yīngguó yíguàn tóupiào fǎnduì zhèxiē guānshuì。
过去，英国一贯投票反对这些关税。
Canadian tariffs enabled united states lumber companies to raise prices at home.
Jiānádà guānshuì shǐ Měiguó mùcái gōngsī nénggòu tígāo zài běnguó de jiàgé。
加拿大关税使美国木材公司能够提高在本国的价格。
They claim such tariffs are in effect protectionist measures.
tāmen shēngchēng，cǐlèi guānshuì qíshí jiùshì bǎohùzhǔyì cuòshī。
他们声称，此类关税其实就是保护主义措施。
The bonded warehouse is filled with many kinds of licensed goods.
这个海关保税仓库里塞满了各种保税货物。
I didn\'t want to be taxed so I didn\'t declare anything at customs.
Wǒ bùxiǎng jiǎoshuì，suǒyǐ tōngguān shí wǒ búhuì shēnbào rènhé huòwù。
我不想缴税，所以通关时我不会申报任何货物。
这个企业每年不等税务部门上门收税就自己主动去缴纳，是个纳税模范企业。
Zhège qǐyè měinián bùděng shuìwù bùmén shàngmén shōushuì jiù zìjǐ zhǔdòng qù jiǎonà，shì gè nàshuì mófàn qǐyè。
Every year, this enterprise hands in its tax before the tax authorities go to collect it, it is a model tax-payer.
身为税务人员，有义务向纳税人介绍有关税收的知识。
Shēn wéi shuìwù rényuán，yǒu yìwù xiàng nàshuìrén jièshào yǒuguān shuìshōu de zhīshi。
As taxation officials, you have the responsibility to introduce to tax-payers knowledge of tax collection.
他逃税漏税的事早就被人告发了。
Tā táoshuì lòushuì de shì zǎo jiù bèi rén gàofā le。
He has already been reported concerning his tax-evasion.
税务局鼓励群众举报漏税单位。
Shuìwùjú gǔlì qúnzhòng jǔbào lòushuìdānwèi。
The tax bureau encourages people to report any unit that evades taxation.
企业所得税占国家所有税收的很大一部分。
Qǐyè suǒdéshuì zhàn guójiā suǒyǒu shuìshōu de hěndà yíbù fēn。
Enterprise income tax constitutes the greater part of revenue.
税票是证明纳税的有力凭证。
Shuìpiào shì zhèngmíng nàshuì de yǒulì píngzhèng。
The tax bill is an effective proof of your having paid the tax.
这个税卡已经检查出十几个逃税的企业了。
Zhège shuìkǎ yǐjing jiǎnchá chū shí jǐgè táoshuì de qǐyè le。
This tax post has found a dozen enterprises that evaded taxes.
过去，农业税是我国的主体税。
Guòqù，nóngyèshuì shì wǒguó de zhǔtǐshuì。
In the past, agricultural taxes were the main tax revenue in our country.
地方税和国家税的征收比例不同。
Dìfāngshuì hé guójiāshuì de zhēngshōu bǐlì bùtóng。
There are different tax rates for local and national taxes.

Wǒ guó nóngyè de bǐlì shuìzhì yǒulìyú nóngmín de ānjūlèyè。
The proportional taxation system in our country greatly benefits the people.
层层加码的税收使这里的商户不堪重负。
Céngcéng jiāmǎ de shuìshōu shǐ zhèlǐ de shānghù bùkān zhòngfù。
The incremental taxes are unbearable to the merchants here.
众臣僚坚决反对再次增加百姓的赋税。
Zhòngchénliáo jiānjué fǎnduì zàicì zēngjiā bǎixìng de fùshuì。
All court officials firmly opposed an additional increase in taxes.
上级部门通知，如有重征棉纱税捐的情况发生，应当立即退回。
Shàngjí bùmén tōngzhī，rú yǒu chóngzhēng miánshā shuìjuān de qíngkuàng fāshēng，yīngdāng lìjí tuìhuí。
The higher authority was notified that if dual tax was levied on cotton yarn, it should immediately be repealed.
这家企业是本市的创税大户。
Zhèjiā qǐyè shì běn shì de chuàngshuì dàhù。
This company is a major taxpayer in this city.
这部分税款应该被抵免。
Zhèbùfen shuìkuǎn yīnggāi bèi dǐmiǎn。
This part of the foreign enterprise\'s tax should be offset by the amount it has paid to the foreign country it is based in.
衙役们来到各家按人数收取丁税。
Yáyìmen láidào gè jiā àn rénshù shōuqǔ dīngshuì。
The Yamen runners came to each house to ask for poll tax according to the number of people there.
国家税的上缴方式多种多样。
Guójiāshuì de shàngjiǎo fāngshì duōzhǒng duōyàng。
There are various ways to pay state tax.
国家为扶持企业发展，减征了很多税收。
Guójiā wèi fúchí qǐyè fāzhǎn，jiǎnzhēng le hěnduō shuìshōu。
In order to encourage the growth of enterprises, the government has cut many taxes.
年终奖的奖金税的交纳金额不应超过奖金总额的百分之十。
Nián zhōng jiǎng de jiǎngjīnshuì de jiāonà jīné bùyīng chāoguò jiǎngjīn zǒngé de bǎifēn zhī shí。
The tax on year-end bonuses should be no more than 10% of the total bonus.
这家小店的老板，每次都按时主动缴税。
Zhèjiā xiǎodiàn de lǎobǎn，měi cì dōu ànshí zhǔdòng jiǎoshuì。
The owner of the small shop always pays taxes punctually on his own initiative.
清政府黑暗软弱，再加上税赋沉重，曾经逼得各地农民不断地抗粮起义。
Qīngzhèngfǔ hēi\'àn ruǎnruò，zài jiāshàng shuìfù chénzhòng，céngjīng bīdé gè dì nóngmín búduàn de kàngliáng qǐyì。
The government of the Qing Dynasty was corrupt and weak and also had heavy levies. Farmers from all over China rose up in revolt and resisted the grain levy one after another.
她的个人所得税已经从工资中扣缴过了。
Tā de gèrén suǒdéshuì yǐjing cóng gōngzī zhōng kòujiǎo guò le。
Her individual income tax has been withheld from her paycheque.
政府规定残疾人自主创业，可以宽免税务。
Zhèngfǔ guīdìng cánjírén zìzhǔ chuàngyè，kěyǐ kuānmiǎn shuìwù。
The government stipulates that the disabled can be exempted from taxation in independent, pioneering work.
现在有一种观点强调用累进税来调节贫富差距。
Xiànzài yǒu yìzhǒng guāndiǎn qiángdiào yòng lěijìnshuì lái tiáojié pínfù chāijù。
Now there is one opinion which seeks to adjust the gap between the rich and poor through progressive taxation.
现在取得银行存款收入，要交纳一定比例的利息所得税。
Xiànzài qǔdé yínháng cúnkuǎn shōurù，yào jiāonà yídìng bǐlì de lìxī suǒdéshuì。
Now to obtain income from bank deposits, we must pay a certain proportional interest income tax.
这个月他收入不错，仅个人所得税就纳缴了2000元。
Zhège yuè tā shōurù búcuò，jǐn gèrén suǒdéshuì jiù nàjiǎo le liǎngqiānyuán。
He earned a lot this month. He paid 2000 yuan in personal income tax.
自从国家取消了农业税，农民就可以不纳粮了，负担减轻了许多！
Zìcóng guójiā qǔxiāo le nóngyèshuì，nóngmín jiù kěyǐ bú nàliáng le，fùdān jiǎnqīng le xǔduō！
Since the abolishment of agricultural duty, farmers no longer need to pay for money and rice, and their burden has reduced a lot.
今年起我们减免了多项农牧业税，农民都拍手称赞。
Jīnnián qǐ wǒmen jiǎnmiǎn le duō xiàng nóng mùyèshuì，nóngmín dōu pāishǒu chēngzàn。
From this year on, we have reduced several agricultural and livestock breeding taxes, so the peasants clap and cheer.
国家取消了农业税，农民们无不欢欣鼓舞。
Guójiā qǔxiāo le nóngyèshuì，nóngmínmen wúbùhuānxīn gǔwǔ。
The government has cancelled agricultural taxes, all the farmers are jubilant.
消费税起征于去年的8月份。
Xiāofèishuì qǐzhēng yú qùnián de bāyuèfèn。
Excise started being levied last August.
税务局将从2006年的一月开始实施月工资1600的起征点。
Shuìwùjú jiāngcóng èrlínglíngliù nián de yīyuè kāishǐ shíshī yuè gōngzī yìqiānliù de qǐzhēngdiǎn。
The tax bureau will change the starting point to 1,600 yuan per month from January,2006.
没有契税证的房屋是不能进行二手房交易的。
Méiyǒu qìshuìzhèng de fángwū shì bùnéng jìnxíng èrshǒufáng jiāoyì de。
Houses without a contract tax certificate cannot be exchanged in the second-hand house market.
这种按人头征收的人头税，使得老百姓苦不堪言。
Zhèzhǒng àn réntóu zhēngshōu de réntóushuì，shǐdé lǎobǎixìng kǔbùkānyán。
The poll tax, a tax of the same amount from each person, made the masses suffer untold misery and hardship.
政府创造了宽松的投资环境，甚而还可减免税收。
Zhèngfǔ chuàngzào le kuānsōng de tóuzī huánjìng，shènér hái kě jiǎnmiǎn shuìshōu。
The government has created a favorable environment for investment, and has even agreed to reduce or exempt tax.
这起税案的涉案金额高达3千万。
Zhè qǐ shuìàn de shèàn jīné gāodá sānqiānwàn。
The money involved in this tax fraud is as much as 30 million yuan.
请您把税单保存好，以备调查。
Qǐng nín bǎ shuìdān bǎocún hǎo，yǐbèi diàochá。
Please preserve your tax bill for future checking.
税费改革是今年的政府工作报告中明确提到的工作重点之一。
Shuìfèi gǎigé shì jīnnián de zhèngfǔ gōngzuò bàogào zhōng míngquè tídào de gōngzuò zhòngdiǎn zhīyī。
Reform of taxes and administrative charges is one of the focuses of our work in this year\'s government report.
军阀混战时期，军阀们所收的捐税大多是通过搜刮民财得到的。
Jūnfá hùnzhàn shíqī，jūnfámen suǒ shōu de juānshuì dàduō shì tōngguò sōuguā míncái dédào de。
During the time when warlords were fighting against each other, they collected taxes by exploiting the masses.
我们公司的税利比去年增长了5%。
Wǒmen gōngsī de shuìlì bǐ qùnián zēngzhǎng le bǎifēnzhīwǔ。
The tax and interest of our company have grown by 5% over that of last year.
对于这种伪造票据逃漏税款的行为，我们要予以有力地打击。
Duìyú zhèzhǒng wěizào piàojù táolòu shuìkuǎn de xíngwéi，wǒmen yào yǔyǐ yǒulì de dǎjī。
We must fight against tax evasion relentlessly.
村民们都按时缴纳土地税。
Cūnmínmen dōu ànshí jiǎonà tǔdìshuì。
The villagers all pay their land taxes on time.
税法修正案将被提交议会讨论。
Shuìfǎ xiūzhèngàn jiāng bèi tíjiāo yìhuì tǎolùn。
The amendment to the Tax Law will be put forward to Congress for discussion.
国家将对部分紧缺商品预征一定的税收。
Guójiā jiāng duì bùfen jǐnquē shāngpǐn yùzhēng yídìng de shuìshōu。
The state will levy certain taxes in advance on some commodities in short supply.
国家提倡按时缴纳中央税。
Guójiā tíchàng ànshí jiǎonà zhōng yāngshuì。
The State encourages paying the central tax on time.
不同国家实行保护关税的目的不同。
Bùtóng guójiā shíxíng bǎohù guānshuì de mùdì bùtóng。
Different countries adopt protective tariffs for different purposes.
国家要减免农民的农业附加税。
Guójiā yào jiǎnmiǎn nóngmín de nóngyè fùjiāshuì。
The government should reduce additional taxes on farmers.

关税

a protective tariff
(对进口物资征收的)保护(性)关税

政府提高了进口车辆的关税，来保护本国汽车制造业。
Vietnam tried to protect the steel industry by raising the steel import tariff.

根据这项条款，我们应该享有关税优惠待遇。

Tariffs in the past have been among the lowest in the country.

过去，英国一贯投票反对这些关税。
Canadian tariffs enabled united states lumber companies to raise prices at home.
Jiānádà guānshuì shǐ Měiguó mùcái gōngsī nénggòu tígāo zài běnguó de jiàgé。

She is thinking of piercing her ears, but the anticipated pain is making her hesitate.
奸臣当道犹如浮云蔽日。
Jiānchén dāngdào yóurú fúyún bìrì。
A treacherous court official that cheats a monarch is like a floating cloud obscuring the sun.
他们的关系犹如葛藤，暧昧不清。
Tāmen de guānxì yóurú gěténg，àimèi bùqīng。
Their relationship is somewhat ambiguous, it is convoluted like hemp vines.

他的这次经历犹如炼狱一般，饱受熬煎。

All the hustle and bustle in the world is as transient as fleeting clouds.

After many years, I still clearly remember his beautiful voice.

Shēngwàng shì yì zhǒng móhu de wángquán。
声望是一种模糊的王权。
He looked vaguely familiar.
Tā kànshàngqù mómóhūhū yǒu xiē rènshi。
他看上去模模糊糊有些认识。
面条煮得太面糊了。
Miàntiáo zhǔ de tài miànhu le。
The noodles are cooked almost to a pulp.
老年人爱吃烂糊面。
Lǎoniánrén ài chī lànhu miàn。
Old people like noodles cooked to a pulp.
这张照片的分辨率不太高，所以放大后画面显得有些模糊。
Zhèzhāng zhàopiàn de fēnbiànlǜ bú tài gāo，suǒyǐ fàngdà hòu huàmiàn xiǎnde yǒuxiē móhu。
Due to its low resolution, the picture doesn\'t look very clear when magnified.
玉米面粥熬得很黏糊
I accidentally mixed salt instead of sugar in the batter.
我误把盐当作糖，加在了奶油面糊里。
The consistency should be like thick pancake batter.
Niánchóudù yīnggāi xiàng báobǐng miànhù。
粘稠度应该像薄饼面糊。
The dumplings were chunky pieces of uncooked dough.
Zhèxiē jiǎozi shì yìxiē niánhuhu de shēng miàntuánkuài。
这些饺子是一些黏糊糊的生面团块。
Words swam across the page out of focus.
Yèmiàn shàng de wénzì móhubùqīng。
页面上的文字模糊不清。
The road ahead is foggy.
Qiánmiàn de lù fēicháng móhu。
前面的路非常模糊。
A complexion that had been pastelike was now chalky white.
Céngjīng xiàng jiànghú yíyàng de miànróng xiànzài xiàng báiè yíyàng bái。
曾经像浆糊一样的面容现在像白垩一样白。
我刚合上眼就迷迷糊糊地睡着了。
Wǒ gānghéshàngyǎn jiù mímihūhū de shuìzháo le。
I dozed off as soon as I closed my eyes.
酒喝多了，一直迷迷糊糊的。
He sighed, closed his eyes and drifted finally to sleep.
Tā tànle yì kǒu qì，bìshàng yǎnjing，zuìhòu mímíhūhú jìnrù mèngxiāng。
他叹了一口气，闭上眼睛，最后迷迷糊糊进入梦乡。
这么多花布我都看迷糊了。

从前那些历历在目的事实如今已化成了模糊的迷雾。

Tā ài biānzào huǎngyán hùnòng wǒ。

这些事揪扯在一起把我都弄糊涂了。

bǎ rén gěi nòngmíhu le

Tā bǎ shìqingnòng de yìtāhútú。

to get in a muddle

They lived form hand to mouth.

In France, mustard seeds are soaked and then grinded to a paste.
Zài Fǎguó，jiècàizǐ bèi jìntòu，ránhòu zài móchéng jiànghúzhuàng。
在法国，芥菜籽被浸透，然后再磨成浆糊状。
The sun sets and the harsh lines of sun and shadow dissolve into blurred shapes and muted colours.
Tàiyáng luòshānle，guāng hé yǐng de xiānmíng xiàntiáo zhújiàn huàchéng yìxiē móhu de túxíng hé róuhé de sècǎi。
太阳落山了,光和影的鲜明线条逐渐化成一些模糊的图形和柔和的色彩。
The old clear-cut certainties dissolved into an indeterminate haze.
Cóngqián nàxiē lìlìzàimù de shìshí rújīn yǐ huàchéng le móhu de míwù。
从前那些历历在目的事实如今已化成了模糊的迷雾。
Too much moisture can drain out the eyes.
Shīdù tàidà huì móhu yǎnjing。
湿度太大会模糊眼睛。
Nine tenths of the population in rural areas live from hand to mouth.
Nóngcūn dìqū bǎifēnzhī jiǔshí de rén jǐn gòu húkǒu。
农村地区90%的人仅够糊口。
Let the paste sit on the stain for an hour,then lightly scrub it off.
Ràng jiànghu zài wūjì shàng tíngliú yì  xiǎoshí，zhīhòu qīngqīngde xǐdiào。
让浆糊在污迹上停留一小时，之后轻轻地洗掉。
The registration is partly obscured; I can\'t make it out.
Zhège jìlù yǒu yíbùfēn móhu-bùqīng， wǒ wúfǎ biànrèn chūlái。
这个记录有一部分模糊不清，我无法辨认出来。
The polling had a complex and equivocal (or ambiguous) message for potential female candidates.
Gāi mínyìcèyàn duì qiánzài de nǚxìng hòuxuǎnrén chuándále yì zhǒng fùzá、móhu（huòzhě móléngliǎngkě）de xìnxī。
该民意测验对潜在的女性候选人传达了一种复杂、模糊（或者模棱两可）的信息。
Requests for character references are all too often answered evasively.
Duì pǐnxíng tuījiàn shū de yāoqiú shícháng huì dédào hánhúqící de huídá。
对品行推荐书的要求时常会得到含糊其辞的回答。
He would not answer so indefinite a proposal.
Tā búbì dáfù zhèyàng yí fèn hánhu de tíyì。
他不必答复这样一份含糊的提议。
His thinking was superficial and fuzzy.
Tā de sīxiǎng fūqiǎn ér yòu móhu-bùqīng。
他的思想肤浅而又模糊不清。
The wan sun cast faint shadows.
Àndàn de tàiyáng tóushè xià móhu de yǐngzi。
暗淡的太阳投射下模糊的影子。
Must you be so indefinite?
Nǐ bìxū zhèyàng móhu ma？
你必须这样模糊吗？
Frustrated by ambiguous instructions, the parents were unable to assemble the toy.
Fùmǔqīn lǐjiě bù liǎo hánhu bù qīng de cāozuò zhǐnán，yīncǐ yě méi néng bǎ zhège wánjù zǔzhuāng qǐlái。
父母亲理解不了含糊不清的操作指南，因此也没能把这个玩具组装起来。
The moon cast soft shadows.
Yuèliang tóuxià móhu de yǐngzi。
月亮投下模糊的影子。
Gropes among cloudy issues toward a feeble conclusion.
Zài móhubùqīng de wèntí zhōng tànsuǒzhe yì zhǒng miǎománg de jiélùn。
在模糊不清的问题中探索着一种渺茫的结论。
The stroke clouded memories of her youth.
Nà cì dǎjī móhu le tā de yòushí jìyì。
那次打击模糊了她的幼时记忆。
The haze blurs the hills.
Bówù móhu le shān yǐng。
薄雾模糊了山影。
The fog blurs my vision.
Wùsè móhu le wǒ de shìxiàn。
雾色模糊了我的视线。
In its mysterious past it encompasses all the dim origins of life.
Zài tā shénmì de guòqù，tā bāohánle shēngmìng de suǒyǒu móhu qǐyuán。
在它神秘的过去，它包含了生命的所有模糊起源。
Vague...forms of speech...have so long passed for mysteries of science.
Yǔyán de móhu biǎodá chángqīyǐlái bèi rènwéi shì kēxué zhī mí。
语言的模糊表达长期以来被认为是科学之谜。
He could barely exist on such a low wage.
Názhe zhèyàng wēibó de shōurù，tā zhǐnéng miǎnqiǎng húkǒu。
拿着这样微薄的收入，他只能勉强糊口。
These questions confuse even the experts.
Zhèxiē wèntí shènzhì bǎ zhuānjiā yě gǎo hútu le。
这些问题甚至把专家也搞糊涂了。
The road ahead is foggy.
Qiánmiàn de lù fēicháng móhu。
前面的路非常模糊。
After a few drinks he was beginning to speak thickly.
Jǐ bēi xiàlái，tā kāishǐ shuōhuà hánhubùqīng。
几杯下来，他开始说话含糊不清。
The conservative manifesto is a model of vagueness.
Bǎoshǒudǎng de shēngmíng shì hánhúqící de diǎnxíng。
保守党的声明是含糊其辞的典型。
He looked with clouded eyes and with an altered manner of breathing.
Tā yòng móhu de yǎnshén kànzhe，lián hūxī de fāngshì dōu gǎibiàn le。
他用模糊的眼神看着，连呼吸的方式都改变了。
His answers were brief，constrained and evasive.
Tā de huídá jiǎndān、jǐnshèn、hánhu。
他的回答简单、谨慎、含糊。
As a horror，apartheid...is absolutely unambiguous.
Zhǒngzúgélí shì yì zhǒng kǒngbù……Háobùhánhú。
种族隔离是一种恐怖……毫不含糊。
The explanation was concise，even elliptical to the verge of obscurity.
Zhè fèn jiěshì sānjiānqíkǒu，shènzhì shěnglüè dàole móhu de dìbù。
这份解释三缄其口，甚至省略到了模糊的地步。
This problem has me completely stuck.
Zhège wèntí ràng wǒ chèdǐ hútu le。
这个问题让我彻底糊涂了。
These terms were used with a vagueness that suggested little or no thought about what each might convey.
Zhèxiē cíyǔ zài shǐyòng shí dàiyǒu móhúxìng，hěnshǎo huòzhě gēnběn méiyǒu tǐxiànchū tāmen kěnéng chuándá de sīxiǎng。
这些词语在使用时带有模糊性，很少或者根本没有体现出它们可能传达的思想。
We perceived the change only dimly.
Wǒmen zhǐshì móhu de juéchádào zhè zhǒng biànhuà。
我们只是模糊地觉察到这种变化。
He confuses the reader with ill-defined terms and concepts.
Tā yīn yìxiē bù qīngchu de shùyǔ hé gàiniàn ér bǎ zhè míng dúzhě gǎo hútu le。
他因一些不清楚的术语和概念而把这名读者搞糊涂了。
A complexion that had been pastelike was now chalky white.
Céngjīng xiàng jiànghú yíyàng de miànróng xiànzài xiàng báiè yíyàng bái。
曾经像浆糊一样的面容现在像白垩一样白。
The scene had the swirling vagueness of a painting by Turner.
Bùjǐng yǒuzhe Tènà yóuhuà lìng rén xuànyūn de móhubùqīng。
布景有着特纳油画令人眩晕的模糊不清。
He explained it somewhat mistily.
Tā duì zhè jiàn shì de jiěshì yǒu xiē hánhu。
他对这件事的解释有些含糊。
The terms he used were imprecise and emotional.
Tā shǐyòng de shùyǔ shì móhu de hé qíngxùhuà de。
他使用的术语是模糊的和情绪化的。
This theory is rather shakily supported by some obscure data.
Zhè yī lǐlùn jǐn yóu yìxiē móhubùqīng de shùjù suǒ zhīchí，shì zhànbúzhùjiǎo de。
这一理论仅由一些模糊不清的数据所支持，是站不住脚的。
My finances were in a deplorable state.
Wǒ de cáizhèng qíngkuàng yìtāhútú
我的财政情况一塌糊涂
The photographs were grainy and indistinct.
Zhàopiàn chéng lìzhuàng，móhubùqīng。
照片呈粒状，模糊不清。
He studied auditory masking by pure tones.
Tā tōngguò chúnyīn lái yánjiū tīngjué móhu。
他通过纯音来研究听觉模糊。
Judging from the thickness of his speech he had been drinking heavily.
Cóng tā jiǎnghuà hánhu bù qīng，jiù néng zhīdào tā hē de bùshǎo。
从他讲话含糊不清，就能知道他喝的不少。
The dialogue is elliptic and full of dark hints.
Zhècì tánhuà hěn jiǎndān，chōngmǎnle móhu de ànshì。
这次谈话很简单，充满了模糊的暗示。
They lived form hand to mouth.
Tāmen de shēnghuó jǐn néng húkǒu。
他们的生活仅能糊口。
This question befuddled even the teacher.
Zhège wèntí shènzhì bǎ lǎoshī yě gǎo hútu le。
这个问题甚至把老师也搞糊涂了。
Constant stirring prevents it from burning on the bottom of the pan.
Bùtíng de fāndòng kě fángzhǐ tā yǔ jiānguō dǐbù xiāng jiēchù de bùfen bèi jiānhú。
不停地翻动可防止它与煎锅底部相接触的部分被煎糊。
Popularity is an equivocal crown.
Shēngwàng shì yì zhǒng móhu de wángquán。
声望是一种模糊的王权。
满手油泥，黑糊糊的
Mǎn shǒu yóuní，hēihūhū de。
hands dirty with grease
墙熏得黑糊糊的。
Qiángxūn dé hēihūhū de。
The wall was blackened by smoke.
屋子里黑糊糊的。
Wūzi lǐ hēihūhū de。
It\'s rather dark in the room.
远处是一片黑糊糊的树林。
Yuǎnchù shì yípiàn hēihūhū de shùlín。
A dark mass of trees loomed in the distance.
含糊其词的答复
hánhuqící de dáfù
an equivocally worded reply
He said a few kind but ambiguous words to me.
Tā hánhúqící de duì wǒ shuōle jǐjù hǎohuà。
他含糊其词地对我说了几句好话。
以毫不含糊的语言作出回答
Yǐ háobùhánhu de yǔyán zuòchū huídá。
answer in clear and unequivocal terms; answer in explicit language
他那手乒乓球可不含糊。
Tā nà shǒu pīngpāngqiú kě bùhánhu。
He is a very good table-tennis player.
他这活儿做得真不含糊。
Tā zhè huór zuò de zhēn bùhánhu。
He\'s really made a good job of it.
不含糊你们。
Bùhánhu nǐmen。
I am not afraid of you.
他办起事来丁是丁，卯是卯，从不含糊。
Tā bàn qǐ shì lái dīngshìdīng，mǎoshìmǎo，cóng bùhánhu。
He is very exacting in his work.
他的话很含糊，我不明白是什么意思。
Tā de huà hěn hánhu，wǒ bùmíngbai shì shénme yìsi。
He was rather vague. I don\'t know what he really meant.
这事一点儿也不能含糊。
Zhè shì yì diǎnr yě bùnéng hánhu。
We\'ll have to handle the matter with meticulous care.
含糊其词的答复
hánhuqící de dáfù
an equivocally worded reply
你不要含糊其辞，我要的是明确的答复。
Nǐ búyào hánhú qící，wǒ yào de shì míngquè de dáfù。
Don\'t be ambiguous, I need a explicit reply.
关键之处不可含糊。
Guānjiànzhīchù bùkě hánhú。
Make sure not to overlook the key points.
公私钱物他分得一清二楚，丝毫不含糊
到底是老行(ｈáｎɡ)家，活儿干得就是不含糊
这个同志真不含糊，任凭敌人拷打，没哼一声
别看他平时大大咧咧，做起工作来却一点也不含糊
措词含糊
话说得很含糊。
他做工作，从来没含糊过。
奉陪到底，决不含糊。
这后生干起活儿来可不含糊。
an obscure explanation
含糊不清的解释
vague in his answer
他的回答含糊
in no uncertain terms
毫不含糊地
Carl tried to fool us with his vague promise but we saw him through.
卡尔想用含糊的承诺糊弄我们，但我们看穿了他。
Gina\'s wording is vague so I don\'t know what she is trying to say.
吉娜说话很含糊，我不知道她想说什么。
Can you conceive his ambiguous words?
你明白他意思含糊的话了吗？
He said a few kind but ambiguous words to me.
Tā hánhúqící de duì wǒ shuōle jǐjù hǎohuà。
他含糊其词地对我说了几句好话。
She was slumped in the saddle and slurring her words.
Tā cóng mǎ\'ān shàng diàole xiàqù，zuǐ lǐ hánhu bù qīng de shuōzhe shénme。
她从马鞍上掉了下去，嘴里含糊不清地说着什么。
I hedged the question with a vague response.
Wǒ yòng hánhu de huídá huíbìle zhège wèntí。
我用含糊的回答回避了这个问题。
Their descriptions of human behavior become vague，dull，and unclear.
Tāmen duì rénlèi xíngwéi de miáoshù shì móhu de、hánhu de、bù qīngxī de。
他们对人类行为的描述是模糊的、含糊的、不清晰的。

自找麻烦
zìzhǎo máfan 
ask for trouble
you\'re asking for trouble!
你在自找麻烦！
Don\'t borrow trouble.
Búyào zìzhǎomáfán。
不要自找麻烦。
Most kids are good，they aren\'t looking for trouble.
Dàduōshù háizi dōu hěn guāi，tāmen bú huì zìzhǎomáfán。
大多数孩子都很乖，他们不会自找麻烦。
I couldn\'t play silly beggars and go chasing foolish dreams.
Wǒ bùnéng zìzhǎo máfán qù zhuīzhú yúchǔn de mèngxiǎng。
我不能自找麻烦去追逐愚蠢的梦想。
the frustrating tsuris he subjected himself to
tā gěi zìjǐ zhǎo de nà jiàn lìng rén jǔsàng de máfánshì
他给自己找的那件令人沮丧的麻烦事
自找麻烦
zìzhǎo máfan 
ask for trouble
对不起，给你们找麻烦了。

圆滑是在无过错前提下处理好麻烦人或者麻烦事的技巧。

在“与他结婚后，她的麻烦开始了”中，“marrying”是垂悬分词。

xīnxù fánluàn
emotionally upset; in an emotional turmoil

Saying &quot;I was not a little upset&quot; when you mean &quot;I was very upset&quot; is an example of litotes.
Dāng nǐ de yìsi shì“wǒ fēicháng xīnfányìluàn shí”shuō“wǒ búshì zhǐyǒu yìdiǎner xīnfán”jiùshì jiànjiē kěndìng de yígè lìzi。
当你的意思是“我非常心烦意乱时”说“我不是只有一点儿心烦”就是间接肯定的一个例子。

Tā mùbùzhuǎnjīng de níngshì ràng tā xīnfányìluàn。
他目不转睛的凝视让她心烦意乱。
遇到烦恼的事，开颜笑笑，烦恼总会过去的。
Yùdào fánnǎo de shì，kāiyán xiàoxiào，fánnǎo zǒng huì guòqù de。
Whenever coming across upset things, smile, because everything will pass in the end.
最近，太多奚幸的事让约翰烦不胜烦。
Zuìjìn，tài duō xīxìng de shì ràng Yuēhàn fánbú shèngfán。
John is very depressed, because he has had too many things to attend to recently.
老来麻烦您，真是不安。
Lǎo lái máfan nín，zhēn shì bù\'ān。
I\'m sorry to trouble you so often.
对不起，给你添麻烦了。
Duìbuqǐ，gěi nǐ tiān máfan le。
Sorry to have given you so much trouble.
孩子老哭，真烦人！
Háizi lǎo kū，zhēn fánrén！
How annoying it is to have a kid crying all the time!
你烦什么？
Nǐ fán shénme?
What are you getting so annoyed about?
这话我都听烦了。
Zhè huà wǒ dōu tīng fán le。
I\'m fed up with this kind of talk.
烦交某人
fán jiāo mǒu rén
please forward this to so-and-so
烦您给她捎个信儿。
Fán nín gěi tā shāo gè xìnr。
May I trouble you to pass on a message to her?
烦劳您带几本书给他。
Fánláo nín dài jǐ běn shū gěi tā。
Would you mind taking a few books to him?
雨下个不停，真叫人烦闷。
Yǔ xià gè bùtíng，zhēn jiào rén fánmèn。
When will the rain ever stop? How depressing!
你干吗这样烦闷？
Nǐ gànmá zhè yàng fánmèn?
Why are you so unhappy?
何必为这些小事烦恼？
Hébì wèi zhèxiē xiǎoshì fánnǎo?
Why should you fret over such trifles?
这些事就不用您烦神了。
Zhèxiē shì jiù búyòng nín fánshén le。
You needn\'t trouble yourself about these things.
烦琐的手续
fánsuǒ de shǒuxù
overelaborate procedure; tedious formalities
烦琐的考证
fánsuǒ de kǎozhèng
pedantic textual criticism; overelaborate research
这篇文章写得太烦琐。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng xiě de tài fánsuǒ。
This article is too long and wordy.
住在乡间，城里烦嚣的声音一点也听不到了。
Zhù zài xiāngjiān，chénglǐ fánxiāo de shēngyīn yìdiǎn yě tīng bu dào le。
As I live out of the city, I\'m not harrassed by the racket of urban life.
她从不把烦心的事对人讲。
Tā cóng bùbǎ fánxīn de shì duì rén jiǎng。
She never confides her troubles to anybody.
某些动物烦躁不安可能是地震临震前的预兆。
Mǒuxiē dòngwù fánzàobù\'ān kěnéng shì dìzhèn línzhèn qián de yùzhào。
Agitated activity by certain animals may be a sign of an impending earthquake.
废除烦琐的礼节
fèichú fánsuǒ de lǐjié
do away with tedious formalities
同学们都回家去了，剩下自己一个人不免感到孤独、烦闷。
Tóngxuémen dōu huíjiā qù le，shèngxià zìjǐ yígèrén bùmiǎn gǎn dào gūdú、fánmèn。
The other students have all gone home, leaving me here all alone, and I can\'t help feeling lonely and depressed.
这事给你添了不少麻烦，真过意不去。
Zhè shì gěi nǐ tiān le bùshǎo máfan，zhēn guòyìbùqù。
I\'m very sorry to have put you to so much trouble.
办个企业本来就不容易，加上这些没完没了的烦琐手续，工作就更加困难了。
Bàngè qǐyè běnlái jiù bùróngyì，jiāshàng zhèxiē méiwánméiliǎo de fánsuǒ shǒuxù，gōngzuò jiù gèngjiā kùnnan le。
It isn\'t easy to start a business in the first place, but with all this endless red tape, it is all the more difficult.
麻烦事一大堆，弄得他焦头烂额。
Máfanshì yí dà duī，nòng de tā jiāotóulàn\'é。
He was in a sorry plight, weighed down by numerous troublesome problems.
从世间烦恼中解脱出来
cóngshìjiān fánnǎo zhōng jiětuō chūlái
free oneself from worldly worries
这下可麻烦了，我把钥匙锁在屋里了。
Zhè xià kě máfan le，wǒ bǎ yàoshi suǒ zài wūlǐ le。
What a nuisance. I\'ve locked my key in the room.
自找麻烦
zìzhǎo máfan 
ask for trouble
对不起，太麻烦你了。
Duìbuqǐ，tài máfan nǐ le。
Sorry to have put you to so much trouble.
她这么没完没了地唠叨，真是烦死人了。
Tā zhème méiwánméiliǎo de láodao，zhēn shì fánsǐ rén le。
Her endless chattering is really driving me up the wall.
太麻烦你了。-哪儿的话。
Tài máfan nǐ le。—Nǎr de huà。
Sorry to have caused you so much trouble. —You shouldn\'t say that.
谁耐烦你的絮叨？
Shuí nàifán nǐ de xùdao?
Who can bear the endless chatter of yours?
伺候病人没有耐心烦可不行。
Cìhòu bìngrén méiyǒu nàixīn fán kě bùxíng。
It needs great patience to nurse the sick.
有麻烦我们帮助你，决不叫你做难人。
Yǒu máfan wǒmen bāngzhù nǐ，jué bú jiào nǐ zuò nánrén。
We\'ll stand by you in case of trouble, and will never leave you holding the bag.
这本书我看了多少遍都不觉得腻烦。
Zhèběnshū wǒ kàn le duōshǎo biàn dōu bùjué de nìfán。
I never get bored reading and rereading this book.
我最腻烦说大话的人。
Wǒ zuì nìfán shuō dàhuà de rén。
I can\'t stand people who brag.
怕麻烦，图清净
pà máfan，tú qīngjìng
fear trouble and seek peace and quiet
惹麻烦
rě máfan
ask for trouble; invite trouble
这事少不得还要麻烦您。
Zhè shì shǎobudé háiyào máfan nín。
We may have to trouble you again about this.
省掉不少麻烦
shěngdiào bùshǎo máfan
save a lot of trouble
省却不少麻烦
shěngquè bùshǎo máfan
save a lot of trouble
失之于烦琐
shī zhī yú fánsuǒ
have the defect of being too detailed
麻烦的是他生病来不了。
Máfan de shì tā shēngbìng lái bu liǎo。
The trouble is he\'s taken ill and can\'t come at all.
给你们添麻烦了。
Gěi nǐmen tiān máfan le。
Sorry to have troubled you.
无穷的烦恼和忧虑
wúqióng de fánnǎo hé yōulǜ 
endless troubles and worries
嫌麻烦
xián máfan
not want to take the trouble; think it troublesome
老人很难侍候，但她从没嫌过烦。
Lǎorén hěn nán shìhòu，dàn tā cóngméi xián guò fán。
The old man was very hard to please, but she never grew impatient waiting on him.
脸上显出不耐烦的神色
liǎn shàngxiǎnchū bu nàifán de shénsè
with impatience written on one\'s face
这事真叫人心烦。
Zhè shì zhēn jiào rén xīnfán。
This is really a bother. or This is really upsetting.
心烦意乱，不知所从。
Xīnfányìluàn, bùzhīsuǒcónɡ。
His mind was in such a turmoil that he did not know which way to turn.
心绪烦乱
xīnxù fánluàn
emotionally upset; in an emotional turmoil
他老是絮叨个没完，所以大家都烦他。
Tā lǎoshì xùdāo gè méi wán，suǒyǐ dàjiā dōu fán tā。
Everybody is fed up with his endless chatter.
这支小夜曲我听多少遍也不觉得厌烦。
Zhèzhī xiǎoyèqǔ wǒ tīng duōshǎobiàn yě bù juéde yànfán。
I never tire of listening to this serenade.
郁结在心头的烦闷
yùjié zài xīntóu de fánmèn 
worries pent up inside one
招惹麻烦
zhāorě máfan 
bring trouble
对不起，给你们找麻烦了。
Duìbuqǐ，gěi nǐmen zhǎo máfan le。
I\'m sorry to have caused you so much trouble.
他老支使人，我都烦了。
Tā lǎo zhīshǐ rén，wǒ dōu fán le。
I\'m tired of him ordering me about all the time.
要言不烦
yàoyánbùfán
terse; succinct; pithy
烦恼
fánnǎo
vexed; worried
医生说，思虑和烦劳过度会导致心血暗耗。
Yīshēng shuō，sīlǜ hé fánláo guòdù huì dǎozhì xīnxuè ànhào。
The doctor said anxiety, and stress may lead to compromised health.
章老师很有耐心，给学生讲解题目时总是不惮其烦。
Zhāng lǎoshī hěnyǒu nàixīn，gěi xuésheng jiǎngjiě tímù shí zǒngshì búdàn qífán。
Mr. Zhang is a very patient teacher, and takes great trouble to answer his student\'s questions.
希望你能尽快地从烦恼中超拔出来。
Xīwàng nǐ néng jìnkuài de cóng fánnǎo zhōng chāobá chūlái。
I hope that you can get rid of the trouble as soon as possible.
他老说车轱辘话，我都不耐烦了。
Tā lǎoshuō chēgūlù huà，wǒ dōu bú nàifán le。
He always speaks in a rambling, repetitious manner.  I am so weary of this.
为了这件烦心事，他夜不成寐。
Wèile zhèjiàn fánxīn shì，tā yè bùchéngmèi。
He was so worried about his dilemma, that he could hardly sleep last night.
她喜欢摆臭架子，招人烦。
Tā xǐhuan bǎi chòujiàzi，zhāo rén fán。
She likes to put on airs, which others find very annoying.
今晚我不能出乘了，麻烦你替我一次好吗？
Jīnwǎn wǒ bùnéng chūchéng le，máfan nǐ tì wǒ yícì hǎo ma？
I can\'t be on duty tonight, would you please take my place?
纯毛的衣服需要干洗，真麻烦。
Chúnmáo de yīfu xūyào gānxǐ，zhēn máfan。
Clothes made of pure wool must be dry cleaned, its so troublesome.
这孩子，总喜欢捣麻烦。
Zhè háizi，zǒng xǐhuan dǎomáfan。
This child always makes trouble.
遇到这么多烦心事，我能不发闷吗？
Yù dào zhèmeduō fánxīnshì，wǒ néng bùfāmèn ma?
How can I be happy when faced with so many troubles?
这些烦愁的事，怎么才能解决？
Zhèxiē fánchóu de shì，zěnme cáinéng jiějué?
How can we solve these tedious and complex problems.
所有的事情都毫无头绪，真让人烦乱。
Suǒyǒu de shìqing dōu háowú tóuxù，zhēn ràng rén fánluàn。
Everything is in a complete mess, which drives people crazy.
哪怕事情再烦难，你也别灰心啊！
Nǎpà shìqing zài fánnán，nǐ yě bié huīxīn a！
No matter how complex things are, don\'t lose heart!
我已经把东西准备好了，烦请您帮我带给他。
Wǒ yǐjing bǎ dōngxi zhǔnbèi hǎo le，fán qǐng nín bāng wǒ dài gěi tā。
I have prepared what is needed, please take it to him for me.
堵车是个特别烦人的事！
Dǔchē shì gè tèbié fánrén de shì！
Traffic jams are extremely annoying.
他对我们的举动颇多烦言。
Tā duì wǒmen de jǔdòng pōduō fányán。
He is full of complaints about our behavior.
事情终于解决了，她的心情不再烦忧。
Shìqíng zhōng yú jiějué le，tā de xīnqíng búzài fányōu。
She is no longer upset now the problem is finally resolved.
这些烦心事弄得我食不甘味。
Zhèxiē fánxīnshì nòng de wǒ shíbùgānwèi。
These problems take the pleasure out of eating.
他还在服后备役，所以给找工作带来了很多麻烦。
Tā hái zài fú hòubèiyì，suǒyǐ gěi zhǎo gōngzuò dàilái le hěnduō máfan。
He is still in preparation service ,which has brought a lot of trouble in job hunting.
机务工作烦琐，但小王仍认真仔细地对待。
Jīwù gōngzuò fánsuǒ，dàn Xiǎo Wáng réng rènzhēn zǐxì de duìdài。
Machine maintenance work is trivial and boring, but Xiao Wang still treats it seriously and carefully.
他一直想剪发出家，以了却尘世的烦恼。
Tā yìzhí xiǎng jiǎnfà chūjiā，yǐ liǎoquè chénshì de fánnǎo。
In order to free himself of secular worries he has been thinking of cutting his hair and become a monk.
她在跟老总说话时给人一种贱声贱气的感觉，让人厌烦。
Tā zài gēn lǎozǒng shuōhuà shí gěi rén yìzhǒng jiànshēng jiànqì de gǎnjué，ràng rén yànfán。
She talks with an inferior tone to the manager, which is really annoying to us.
这些烦心事儿令人焦愁。
Zhèxiē fánxīnshìr lìngrén jiāochóu。
These troubles are very worrying to me.
这些烦心事绞结得他坐卧不宁。
Zhèxiē fánxīnshì jiǎojié de tā zuòwòbùníng。
These troublesome things have made him restless.
他家的猫一到夜里就叫春，真烦人。
Tā jiā de māo yídào yèlǐ jiù jiàochūn，zhēn fánrén。
His cat calls out all night, which is rather disturbing.
菜园窖肥是一件很麻烦的事。
Càiyuán jiàoféi shì yíjiàn hěnmáfan de shì。
It is time-consuming to make water-logged compost in the vegetable garden.
他遇到了麻烦，只有我们才能帮他解愁。
Tā yùdào le máfan，zhǐyǒu wǒmen cáinéng bāng tā jiěchóu。
He is in trouble now, and only we can help him and cheer him up.
每当她烦恼郁闷时，我总是来开解安慰她。
Měi dāng tā fánnǎo yùmèn shí，wǒ zǒngshì lái kāijiě ānwèi tā。
Every time she was gloomy, I would comfort her and straighten her out.
好久没有看到他朗笑了，他一定有什么烦心的事。
Hǎo jiǔ méiyǒu kàndào tā lǎngxiào le，tā yídìng yǒu shénme fánxīn de shì。
I haven\'t seen his bright smile for a long time; he must be having trouble.
总是劳烦您帮我买东西，真是过意不去。
Zǒngshì láofán nín bāng wǒ mǎidōngxi，zhēnshì guòyì búqù。
I\'m always troubling you to buy things for me. Thank you very much.
我的这件事还得烦您多劳神！
Wǒ de zhèjiànshì hái děi fán nín duō láoshén！
Would you mind helping me with this matter?
老鸦从早上就在窗外哇哇的叫，真烦人。
Lǎoyā cóng zǎoshàng jiù zài chuāngwài wāwā de jiào，zhēn fánrén。
The crow has been crying outside of the window since morning. How annoying it is.
这项工程动用了龙门吊，可真是麻烦啊。
Zhè xiàng gōngchéng dòngyòng le lóngméndiào，kě zhēnshì máfan a。
It caused a lot of trouble that the project used a gantry crane.
十字路口又堵车了，很多人烦躁地鸣笛抗议。
Shízì lùkǒu yòu dǔchē le，hěnduōrén fánzào de míngdí kàngyì。
There is again a traffic jam at the crossroads. Many people hoot to protest restlessly.
城市里的摩的有时很烦人，影响交通秩序和行人安全。
Chéngshì lǐ de módí yǒushí hěn fánrén，yǐngxiǎng jiāotōng zhìxù hé xíngrén ānquán。
Motorcycles used to carry passengers in cities can be quite annoying, have bad impact on traffic, and the safety of pedestrians.
小狗不住地磨烦着要我带它出去散步，可我正忙着呢！
Xiǎogǒu búzhù de mòfán zhe yào wǒ dài tā chūqù sànbù，kě wǒ zhèng máng zhe ne！
The dog keeps pestering me to take him out for a walk. But I am busy now.
他开车的技术还不熟练，他后边的车都嫌他磨烦。
Tā kāichē de jìshù hái bùshúliàn，tā hòubiān de chē dōu xián tā mòfán。
He is not enough skilled in driving. Vehicles behind him all complain that he is delaying them.
受伤的小熊在木笼里既害怕又烦躁地来回转圈。
Shòushāng de xiǎoxióng zài mùlóng lǐ jì hàipà yòu fánzào de láihuí zhuànquān。
The hurt little bear turned fearfully, and fretfully in the wooden cage.
不知道是什么原因，那头牛很烦躁，总是在牛圈里来回转圈儿。
Bùzhīdào shì shénme yuányīn，nàtóuniú hěnfánzào，zǒngshì zài niújuàn lǐ láihuí zhuànquānr。
I don\'t know why the cow is fidgeted and circling in the cattle pen.
小刘，麻烦你跑腿儿帮我送个信吧？
Xiǎo Liú，máfan nǐ pǎotuǐr bāng wǒ sòng gè xìn ba？
Xiao Liu, would you go and convey the message for me?
她喜欢玩儿拼图游戏，每天都玩儿，也不腻烦。
Tā xǐhuan wánr pīntú yóuxì，měitiān dōu wánr，yě bú nìfán。
She likes to do jigsaw puzzles, and doesn’t feel bored even though she does it every day.
他的这篇报告里都是冗词赘句，听者越来越不耐烦。
Tā de zhèpiān bàogào lǐ dōushì rǒngcí zhuìjù，tīngzhě yuèláiyuè bú nàifán。
His report is full of redundant words and repetitive expressions, the audience are getting impatient.
烦请这位梢公带我渡过河去吧？
Fán qǐng zhèwèi shāogōng dài wǒ dùguo hé qù ba？
Excuse me, helmsman, would you please ferry me across this river?
麻烦您收转这封信给我的朋友，谢谢您了！
Máfan nín shōuzhuǎn zhèfēngxìn gěi wǒ de péngyou，xièxiè nín le！
Please take this letter and forward it to my friend. Thank you!
说笑话要分时间、分场合，否则就会招人烦了。
Shuō xiàohuà yào fēn shíjiān、fēn chǎnghé，fǒuzé jiùhuì zhāo rén fán le。
You need an appropriate time and occasion to tell a joke, or it\'ll annoy others.
这个小调皮鬼经常给家长惹麻烦。
Zhège xiǎo tiáopíguǐ jīngcháng gěi jiāzhǎng rě máfan。
The mischievous boy often cause trouble to his parents.
头家出牌太慢了，我有些不耐烦。
Tóujiā chūpái tài màn le，wǒ yǒuxiē bú nàifán。
The opponent on my left was too slow in discarding cards, so I got a little impatient.
卫生丸用完了，麻烦你再去买一点。
Wèishēngwán yòngwán le，máfan nǐ zài qù mǎi yìdiǎn。
We are running out of camphor balls, please go out to buy some.
实在不好意思，我今天又有事相烦。
Shízài bùhǎoyìsi，wǒ jīntiān yòu yǒushì xiāngfán。
I am so sorry to trouble you again today.
姑姑家的小小子真淘气，每天都惹一堆麻烦。
Gūgū jiā de xiǎoxiǎozi zhēn táoqì，měitiān dōu rě yì duī máfan。
My aunt\'s little boy is very naughty and gets himself in trouble every day.
我立即修函一封，麻烦您带给我弟弟。
Wǒ lìjí xiūhán yì fēng，máfan nín dàigěi wǒ dìdi。
I will compose a letter at once and need a favor from you to send it to my younger brother.
老太婆絮烦了半天也不嫌累。
Lǎotàipó xùfán le bàntiān yě bùxiánlèi。
The old woman has been talking for hours, doesn\'t she feel tired?
询查户口的人唠叨个没完，大家都烦了。
Xúnchá hùkǒu de rén láodao gè méiwán，dàjiā dōu fán le。
Everyone is tired of the person who checks registered permanent residence because he chatters all day long.
药剂师把药配错了，这下麻烦大了。
Yàojìshī bǎ yào pèicuò le，zhè xià máfan dà le。
The pharmacist made a mistake when he filled up the prescription, it will cause a lot of trouble.
装修就该一步到位，省得以后麻烦。
Zhuāngxiū jiù gāi yíbú dàowèi，shěngdé yǐhòu máfan。
The house should be renovated all at once to save troubles afterwards.
由于饮场时间太长，观众们等得有点不耐烦了。
Yóuyú yìnchǎng shíjiān tài cháng，guānzhòngmen děng de yǒudiǎn búnàifán le。
Having waited a long time for the actors\' drink break, the audience became a little impatient.
这一次，做事至当的他也遇到了意想不到的麻烦。
Zhè yícì，zuòshì zhìdāng de tā yě yùdào le yìxiǎng búdào de máfan。
This time, he who usually behaves appropriately came across unexpected troubles.
你怎么又在皱眉，有什么烦心事吗？

太多的装饰品让我感觉烦躁。

Too many decorations agitate me.
患了皮肤病是一件很烦人的事情。
Huàn le pífūbìng shì yíjiàn hěnfánrén de shìqing。
Skin diseases are annoying.
由于病人烦躁不安，医生为他打了一针镇静剂。
Yóuyú bìngrén fánzào bùān，yīshēng wèi tā dǎ le yì zhēn zhènjìngjì。
The patient is verry worried, so the doctor gives him a shot of tranquillizer.

Tact is the skill of handling a difficult person or situation without giving offence
Yuánhuá shì zài wú guòcuò qiántí xià chǔlǐ hǎo máfanrén huòzhě máfánshì de jìqiǎo。
圆滑是在无过错前提下处理好麻烦人或者麻烦事的技巧。
Saying &quot;I was not a little upset&quot; when you mean &quot;I was very upset&quot; is an example of litotes.
Dāng nǐ de yìsi shì“wǒ fēicháng xīnfányìluàn shí”shuō“wǒ búshì zhǐyǒu yìdiǎner xīnfán”jiùshì jiànjiē kěndìng de yígè lìzi。
当你的意思是“我非常心烦意乱时”说“我不是只有一点儿心烦”就是间接肯定的一个例子。
You can always leave if the show gets boring.
如果你对演出感到厌烦的话，你可以在任何时候离开。
an awful bore
非常惹人厌烦的人(或物)
to banish cares
消除烦恼
a bit bored
有点厌烦

在“与他结婚后，她的麻烦开始了”中，“marrying”是垂悬分词。

放弃原来计划
fàngqì yuánlái jìhuà
abandon the original plan
放弃表决权
fàngqì biǎojuéquán
abstain from voting
放弃原则
fàngqì yuánzé
forsake one\'s principles
废弃陈规旧习
fèiqì chénguī jiùxí
discard outdated regulations and customs
废弃多年的旧机器零件
fèiqì duōnián de jiùjīqì língjiàn
old machine parts discarded for years
弃权票不能和反对票划等号。
Qìquánpiào bùnéng hé fǎnduìpiào huà děnghào。
An abstention is not equivalent to a negative vote.
有一千多亩废弃地已还耕。
Yǒu yìqiān duō mǔ fèiqìdì yǐ huángēng。
More than 1 000 mu of abandoned land has been reclaimed.
敌军逃跑时沿途毁弃了许多武器。
Díjūn táopǎo shí yántú huǐqì le xǔduō wǔqì。
The fleeing enemy abandoned and destroyed many weapons along the road.
捐弃前嫌
juānqì qiánxián
bury old grudges
弄得不好，就会前功尽弃。
Nòng de bùhǎo，jiùhuì qiángōngjìnqì。
If we don\'t do a good job now, all the work we\'ve done will be wasted.
抛弃妻儿
pāoqì qī\'ér
abandon one\'s wife and kids
弃家避难，四处飘荡
Qìjiā bìnàn，sìchù piāodàng
flee from home and wander about seeking refuge
敌军弃城而逃。
Díjūn qìchénɡ ér táo。
The enemy abandoned the city and fled.
弃甲曳兵而走
qìjiǎyèbīnɡ ér zǒu
flee pell-mell
我们对待在工作中犯过错误的人采取规劝态度，使之翻然改进，弃旧图新。
Wǒmen duìdài zài gōngzuò zhōng fànguò cuòwù de rén cǎiqǔ guīquàn tàidu，shǐ zhī fānrán gǎijìn，qìjiùtúxīn。
Our attitude towards any person who has made mistakes in his work should be one of persuasion in order to help him change and start afresh.
八票赞成，三票反对，一票弃权
Bā piào zànchénɡ, sān piào fǎnduì, yí piào qìquán
8 votes for, 3 against, and 1 abstention
这所老房子早就弃置不用了。
Zhè suǒ lǎo fángzi zǎo jiù qìzhì búyòng le。
This old house was abandoned long ago.
成功的希望不大，还可能前功尽弃。
Chénggōng de xīwàng búdà，hái kěnéng qiángōngjìnqì。
There is small chance of success, and you risk all you have gained.
若蒙不弃，愿效犬马之劳。
Ruò méng bú qì，yuàn xiào quǎnmǎzhīláo。
Should I be fortunate enough not to be rejected, I would render such humble services as I could.
我们已经劝说过他，叫他放弃原来的计划。
Wǒmen yǐjing quànshuō guò tā，jiào tā fàngqì yuánlái de jìhuà。
We\'ve talked him out of his original plan.
舍弃亲生骨肉
shěqì qīnshēnggúròu
abandon one\'s own flesh and blood
他的所谓朋友都背弃了他。
Tā de suǒwèi péngyou dōu bèiqì le tā。
All his so-called friends deserted him.
逆历史潮流而动的人终将被人民所唾弃。
Nì lìshǐ cháoliú ér dòng de rén zhōng jiāngbèi rénmín suǒ tuòqì。
Those who go against the trend of history will be cast aside by the people.
不要嫌弃犯过错误的同志。
Búyào xiánqì fànguò cuòwù de tóngzhì。
Don\'t cold-shoulder comrades who have made mistakes.
她遭人遗弃，一时想不开就自杀了。
Tā zāo rén yíqì，yìshí xiǎngbu kāi jiù zìshā le。
She was deserted by her lover, and in despair she took her own life.
遗弃妻儿
yíqì qī\'ér 
forsake one\'s wife and children
敌军遗弃大批辎重。
Díjūn yíqì dàpī zīzhòng。
The enemy abandoned (or left behind) large quantities of supplies.
自暴自弃
zìbàozìqì
give oneself up as hopeless; have no urge to make progress; be resigned to one\'s backwardness
委弃
wěiqì
abandon; forsake; cast aside
厌弃
yànqì
detest and reject; detest; loathe
如今很多人弃诚信如同敝屣，这是非常可怕的。
Rújīn hěnduōrén qì chéngxìn rútóng bìxǐ，zhè shì fēicháng kěpà de。
It is dangerous that many people view integrity as having little more value than a worn out boot.
他抛弃妻子，真是一个陈世美。
Tā pāoqì qīzǐ，zhēnshì yígè Chén Shìměi。
He abondoned his wife and children, which really makes him a Chen Shimei.
我们应该抛弃舛误的观念。
Wǒmen yīnggāi pāoqì chuǎnwù de guānniàn。
We should discard erroneous concepts.
辛弃疾是我最喜欢的词人。
Xīn Qìjí shì wǒ zuì xǐhuan de círén。
Xinqiji is my favorite writer.
90年代初，弃官从商形成一股热潮。
90 niándài chū,qìguān cóngshāng xíngchéng yì gǔ rècháo.
In the early 90s, there was an increase of people resigning from office and entering into business.
即使等到地老天荒，他也决不放弃。
Jíshǐ děng dào dìlǎo tiānhuāng，tā yě juébú fàngqì。
He will never give up, even if wait for eternity.
这个地震棚废弃很久了。
Zhège dìzhènpéng fèiqì hěnjiǔ le。
This quakeproof shed has long been out of use.
这些工业废弃物对环境的危害很大，应当妥善处理。
Zhèxiē gōngyè fèiqìwù duì huánjìng de wēihài hěndà，yīngdāng tuǒshàn chǔlǐ。
We must deal with this industrial waste very carefully as it can cause great pollution to our environment.
把不能穿的旧衣服割弃了吧。
Bǎ bùnéng chuān de jiùyīfu gēqì le ba。
Throw away those worn clothes.
同宿舍的其他人都已放弃考研，就剩我一人孤军奋战。
Tóng sùshè de qítārén dōu yǐ fàngqì kǎoyán，jiù shèng wǒ yì rén gūjūn fènzhàn。
All the others in my dorm have given up on preparing for the postgraduate entrance exams, leaving me to fight the battle alone.
父母遗弃了她，是好心人把她养大的。
Fùmǔ yíqì le tā，shì hǎoxīnrén bǎ tā yǎngdà de。
Abandoned by her parents, she was brought up by a kind-hearted person.
他真是个狠心狼，抛妻弃子自己出走。
Tā zhēn shì gè hěnxīnláng，pāoqī qìzǐ zìjǐ chūzǒu。
He is so heartless that he left home, and deserted his wife and son.
他们结拜过后就彼此换贴，成了不离不弃的好兄弟。
Tāmen jiébài guòhòu jiù bǐcǐ huàntiē，chéng le bùlí búqì de hǎoxiōngdì。
After they swore to be brothers, they exchanged cards and became good brothers who would never betray one another.
原本肥沃的土地由于失去了肥力被人们荒弃了。
Yuánběn féiwò de tǔdì yóuyú shīqù le féilì bèi rénmen huāngqì le。
The former fertile land was deserted by people because of the loss of fertility.
几度提笔，又几度放弃，似有千言万语，又仿佛无话可说。
Jǐ dù tíbǐ，yòu jǐ dù fàngqì，sìyǒu qiānyán wànyǔ，yòu fǎngfú wúhuà kěshuō。
Picking up the pen and then giving up several times, I felt like I had a lot to say but was speechless at the same time.
我因为家累，被迫放弃出国机会。
Wǒ yīnwèi jiālèi，bèipò fàngqì chūguó jīhuì。
Encumbered with a family, I have to give up the opportunity of going abroad.
这两个生意上曾经的对手，如今捐弃前嫌坐在了一起。
Zhè liǎnggè shēngyì shàng céngjīng de duìshǒu，rújīn juānqì qiánxián zuòzài le yìqǐ。
These two used to be business opponents, but they have buried all their old grudges and are sitting together right now.
恋战的后果就是前功尽弃。
Liànzhàn de hòuguǒ jiùshì qiángōngjìnqì。
The result of being bellicose is that all your previous efforts become wasted.
如果现在不能坚持下去，你岂不是前功尽弃了？
Rúguǒ xiànzài bùnéng jiānchí xiàqù，nǐ qǐbúshì qiángōng-jìnqì le？
Don\'t you waste all your previous efforts if you don\'t stick to it?
他知道自己是个弃儿之后，十分伤心。
Tā zhīdào zìjǐ shì gè qìér zhīhòu，shífēn shāngxīn。
Realizing he was a deserted child, he was heartbroken.
面对机遇，我们应该学会弃取。
Miànduì jīyù，wǒmen yīnggāi xuéhuì qìqǔ。
When facing opportunities, we should learn which to take and which to let go.
他因家境贫穷而不得不弃学回家。
Tā yīn jiājìng pínqióng ér bùdébùqìxué huíjiā。
He cannot help dropping out of school, because his family is poor.
自从父母弃养，这个家就失去了长辈的疼爱。
Zìcóng fùmǔ qìyǎng，zhège jiā jiù shīqù le zhǎngbèi de téngài。
After the death of their parents, the family lost the deep love of the senior generation.
那把已经废弃的铜壶上长满了铜锈。
Nà bǎ yǐjing fèiqì de tónghú shàng zhǎngmǎn le tóngxiù。
Verdigris has spread all over that abandoned copper pot.
由于准备工作不充分，她婉劝哥哥放弃登山。
Yóuyú zhǔnbèi gōngzuò bùchōngfèn，tā wǎnquàn gēge fàngqì dēngshān。
She patiently persuaded her brother to give up mountaineering, because he didn\'t do enough preparation work.
无如身体不适，我只好放弃这次期盼已久的旅行。
Wúrú shēntǐ búshì，wǒ zhǐhǎo fàngqì zhècì qīpàn yǐjiǔ de lǚxíng。
Due to my poor health, I have to give up this long expected trip.
这是一间被废弃多年的破宅子，芜秽不堪。
Zhè shì yìjiān bèi fèiqì duōnián de pò zháizi，wúhuì bùkān。
This is a old deserted house is desolate, and overrun with weeds.
就这么放弃我真不心甘。
Jiù zhème fàngqì wǒ zhēn bùxīngān。
I am not willing to give up like this.
小张大学毕业后放弃高薪工作回家修地球。
Xiǎo Zhāng dàxué bìyè hòu fàngqì gāoxīn gōngzuò huíjiā xiūdìqiú。
Xiao Zhang gave up a well-paid job and went back home to till the earth after graduating from university.
我们选点了几个地区，最后还是放弃了。
Wǒmen xuǎndiǎn le jǐgè dìqū，zuìhòu háishi fàngqì le。
We had chosen several regions, but gave all of them up at last.
他厌恨那个抛弃他的女人。
Tā yànhèn nàge pāoqì tā de nǚrén。
He detests the woman who abandoned him.
你若是真做出抛妻弃子的事，那还不如猪狗呢！
Nǐ ruòshì zhēn zuòchū pāoqī qìzǐ de shì，nà hái bùrú zhūgǒu ne！
If you really do things like abandoning your wife and your son, you are no better than pigs and dogs.
由于法律的不健全，他追偿的事情不得不放弃。
Yóuyú fǎlǜ de bú jiànquán，tā zhuīcháng de shìqing bùdébùfàngqì。
As the law is incomplete, he has to give up pressing for payment.
她不幸患上子宫癌，不得不放弃做妈妈的想法。
Tā búxìng huànshàng zǐgōngái，bùdébùfàngqì zuò māma de xiǎngfǎ。
Unfortunately, she had uterus cancer and had to give up the idea of having children.
他在创业过程中受到过许多方面的阻梗，但他从没有放弃过。
Tā zài chuàngyè guòchéng zhōng shòudào guò xǔduō fāngmiàn de zǔgěng，dàn tā cóng méiyǒu fàngqì guò。
Though there were lots of obstructions from various aspects, he never gave up creating his own business.
他得了传染病，可同学们一点不嫌弃。
Tā dé le chuánrǎnbìng，kě tóngxuémen yìdiǎn bùxiánqì。
Though he had an infectious disease, his classmates didn\'t cold-shoulder him at all.
这个废弃建筑，明天就要进行定向爆破。
Zhège fèiqì jiànzhù，míngtiān jiùyào jìnxíng dìng xiàng bàopò。
The abandoned building will be demolished through directional blasting tomorrow.

bèiqì xìnyǎng
abandon one\'s beliefs

bèiqì shìyán

bǐngqì huàixíguàn
get rid of bad habits

Tā juéxīn fàngqì dǔbó。
He decided to give up gambling.
当他还在襁褓中就被父母遗弃了。
Dāng tā hái zài qiǎngbǎo zhōng jiù bèi fùmǔ yíqìle。
He was abandoned by his parents in infancy.
玛莉竟然放弃事业，甘当家庭妇女。

无论多困难，我都决不放弃努力。
Wúlùn duō kùnnán，wǒ dōu juébú fàngqì nǔlì.
No matter how difficult it is, I won\'t give up under any circumstances.
他背信弃义，我只好和他绝交。
Tā bèixìnqìyì，wǒ zhǐhǎo hé tā juéjiāo.

Yíqì yìwèi zhe méiyǒu rènhé zhēgài hé bǎohù de diūqì。

Nǐ bù néng xiàng pāoqì pò wánjù yíyàng pāoqì wǒ！

to abandon ship
弃船
to break with sb/sth
与某人绝交/放弃某事
to chicken out of (doing) sth
因胆怯而放弃(做)某事
We have renounced the use of force to settle our disputes.
我们摈弃使用武力解决我们的争端。
He grew out of his late night coffee habit.
他逐渐放弃了晚上喝咖啡的习惯。
to reject/dismiss sth out of hand
不假思索地拒绝/抛弃某事
She never completely gave up hope.
她从来没有完全放弃希望。
He left school with no qualifications.
他弃学了，没有拿到任何文凭。

我丈夫为了另一个女人抛弃了我。

一座废弃的工厂被改成了美术馆

当地媒体好像已经放弃了寻求真相。

不管何时何地，我不都会离弃你。

他抛弃了女朋友，真是不知羞耻。

我们放弃了这个计划，因为它完全不可行。

无论有多么艰难，我都不会抛弃你。

正规的行政系统被抛弃了。

这个词的此类用法已经废弃了。

这一设计没能提高效率，所以已经被放弃了。

Zhè běn shū yóu yòngguò de fèiqìwù zhìchéng。
这本书由用过的废弃物制成。
I\'ve succeeded and failed on numerous diets, so I may as well give up!

He was on the point of giving up.
Tā jíjiāng fàngqì。
他即将放弃。

Tā juédìng fàngqì。

You cannot reason someone out of a belief which they did not form logically.

你不能说服人们放弃他们的信仰，因为它的建立是没有逻辑的。

fàngqì yuánzé

无如身体不适，我只好放弃这次期盼已久的旅行。

to abandon all hope
放弃一切希望

乡间的房子必须放弃。
quit a job
放弃一项工作

to break with sb/sth
与某人绝交/放弃某事
to chicken out of (doing) sth
因胆怯而放弃(做)某事
He grew out of his late night coffee habit.
他逐渐放弃了晚上喝咖啡的习惯。
She never completely gave up hope.
她从来没有完全放弃希望。
The local media seems to have deserted the pursuit of truth.
当地媒体好像已经放弃了寻求真相。
We jettisoned this plan because it is completely unworkable.
我们放弃了这个计划，因为它完全不可行。
Forget your visional goals. You should realize your current situation.
放弃你不切实际的目标吧。你应该认识到你现在的情况。

人们可不能指望独裁者会放弃他的权力。

这一设计没能提高效率，所以已经被放弃了。

不要放弃尊严苟且求活。

所遭受的打击并没有使他放弃买股票的决心。

我们绝不会放弃这个计划，毕竟他们已经在上面花了太多的时间。

Tā fàngqìle zhè ge jíshǒu de huàtí。

背信弃义的行为
bèixìnqìyì de xíngwéi 
a breach of faith; perfidy
背信弃义地撕毁协定和合同
bèixìnqìyì de sīhuǐ xiédìng hé hétong
perfidiously tear up agreements and contracts
他背信弃义，我只好和他绝交。
Tā bèixìnqìyì，wǒ zhǐhǎo hé tā juéjiāo.
He was dishonest with me so I had no choice but to break up with him.
背信弃义
背弃前言，毫无信义
His treachery was motivated by a number of reasons.
Duō zhǒng yuányīn yǐnfāle tā de bèixìnqìyì。
多种原因引发了他的背信弃义。
It may have given its decision in bad faith.
Tā bèixìnqìyì de zuòle juédìng。
它背信弃义地作了决定。
I was stabbed to the heart by his disloyalty.
Tā de bèixìn-qìyì shēnshēn shānghàile wǒ de xīn。
他的背信弃义深深伤害了我的心。
He was playing perfidiously one side against the other.
Tā bèixìnqìyì de tiǎosuō yìfāng fǎnduì lìng yìfāng。
他背信弃义地挑唆一方反对另一方。
背弃原来的立场
bèiqì yuánlái de lìchǎng 
abandon one\'s original stand
背弃自己的诺言
bèiqì zìjǐ de nuòyán 
go back on one\'s word
他的所谓朋友都背弃了他。
Tā de suǒwèi péngyou dōu bèiqì le tā。
All his so-called friends deserted him.
背弃信仰
bèiqì xìnyǎng
abandon one\'s beliefs
背弃誓言
bèiqì shìyán
go back on one\'s word
背信弃义的行为
bèixìnqìyì de xíngwéi 
a breach of faith; perfidy
背信弃义地撕毁协定和合同
bèixìnqìyì de sīhuǐ xiédìng hé hétong
perfidiously tear up agreements and contracts
他背信弃义，我只好和他绝交。
Tā bèixìnqìyì，wǒ zhǐhǎo hé tā juéjiāo.
He was dishonest with me so I had no choice but to break up with him.
这样做背弃了做人的基本原则。
背弃前言，毫无信义
背信弃义
Jay would have sold her grandmother for Lucy\'s approval.

他们的意见无关紧要，因为他们已经背弃了上帝。
I was stabbed in the back by my best friend.

多种原因引发了他的背信弃义。

Tā bèixìnqìyì de zuòle juédìng。

Tā de bèixìn-qìyì shēnshēn shānghàile wǒ de xīn。

He was playing perfidiously one side against the other.
Tā bèixìnqìyì de tiǎosuō yìfāng fǎnduì lìng yìfāng。
他背信弃义地挑唆一方反对另一方。
She thumped the discarded log book with the back of her hand.
Tā yòng shǒubèi zhòngzhòng zá le nà běn bèi diūqì de rìzhì。
她用手背重重砸了那本被丢弃的日志。

hěn yǒu dǎnliàng 
have plenty of guts (or spunk)
to have the nerve to do sth

have plenty of guts (or spunk)

胆量

缺乏胆量

courage that is wearing thin
日益变小的胆量

我可没胆量那么说。

我想辞职，开间酒吧，但我没那胆量。

约翰胆太小，没胆量和我们一起从这个悬崖上跳下去。

真有胆量！

Wǒ jūn shìqì gāoáng,zúyǐ ràng dírén dǎnxū.
The high morale of our troops is enough to scare the enemies.
他们人多胆壮，不跟我们讲理了。
Tāmen rénduō dǎnzhuàng，bùgēn wǒmen jiǎnglǐ le。
Having a crowd of people, they are fearless and no longer reason with us.
平时看你挺胆儿大，怎么真遇到事就二乎了！
Píngshí kàn nǐ tǐng dǎnr dà，zěnme zhēn yù dào shì jiù èrhu le！
You seem to be bold, but how come you flinch when anything happens?
这鱼怎么发苦啊，是不是把鱼胆弄破了？
Zhè yú zěnme fākǔ a，shìbushì bǎ yúdǎn nòngpò le?
The fish tastes bitter, perhaps its gallbladder is broken.
有你这么一位肝胆照人的朋友我真是幸运！
Yǒu nǐ zhème yíwèi gāndǎn zhàorén de péngyou wǒ zhēnshì xìngyùn！
How lucky I am to have a friend who is exceedingly loyal like you!
你真是狗胆包天，公家的钱也敢挪用？
Nǐ zhēnshì gǒudǎn bāotiān，gōngjiā de qián yě gǎn nuóyòng？
You are monstrously audacious, how dare you misappropriate public funds?
他最爱讲些诡诞的故事，来吓唬胆小的女孩儿。
Tā zuì ài jiǎng xiē guǐdàn de gùshì，lái xiàhǔ dǎnxiǎo de nǚháir。
He is fond of telling exaggerated, and unusual stories to scare cowardly girls.
他有虎胆却没智慧，遇到危险也只管往前冲。
Tā yǒu hǔdǎn què méi zhìhuì，yùdào wēixiǎn yě zhǐguǎn wǎngqián chōng。
He is a man of dauntless courage, but he lacks wisdom. When confronted with danger, he just rushes forward.

The old women with two guns in &quot;Hongyan&quot; make enemies panic-stricken.
裁员这股冷风吹了有一阵，大家整天都提心吊胆的怕这事落在自己身上。

暖水壶的内胆好像是坏了，开水放进去凉得很快。
Nuǎnshuǐhú de nèidǎn hǎo xiàng shì huài le，kāishuǐ fàngjìnqù liáng de hěnkuài。
The glass liner of the vacuum flask seems to be broken, the boiling water will get cold quickly.
他大胆地喷涂各种颜色，纸上呈现出的效果好看。
Tā dàdǎn de pēntú gèzhǒng yánsè，zhǐ shàng chéngxiàn chū de xiàoguǒ hǎokàn。
He sprayed all sorts of colors daringly, and they looked really fantastic on paper.
这种药剂是用蛇胆提炼而成的。
Zhèzhǒng yàojì shì yòng shédǎn tíliànérchéng de。
This medicine was extracted from the gallbladder of snakes.
你不应把这么艰巨的任务交给他，他的胆量比豚鼠还小。
Nǐ bùyīng bǎ zhème jiānjù de rènwù jiāogěi tā，tā de dǎnliàng bǐ túnshǔ hái xiǎo。
